analyzed: de'i phyir gtum mo'i 'dod chags chen po'i bdag nyid kyis thams cad rnam par za ba'o //
translated: Therefore, by the nature of the great passion of Caṇḍālī, all are consumed.

original: brtags pa'i ngag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: brtags pa'i ngag ces bya ba'o //
translated: This is called “the imagined speech.”🔽Thus, the “subtle nāḍī” is the nature of the vāyu, like a vajra.

original: de ltar phra mo'i rtsa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje lta bur rlung gi rang @230b bzhin de de bzhin du bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar phra mo'i rtsa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje lta bur rlung gi rang @230b bzhin de de bzhin du bshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: That is explained in the following.

original: de yang 'dra ba'i ye shes min /
analyzed: de yang 'dra ba'i ye shes min /
translated: That is not the wisdom of similarity.

original: zhes bya ba ni phan yon gyi sgo nas te lus kyi rtsa padma'i rnam par gzhag par 'gyur te de padma nam mkha'i khams kyi lus chos thams cad kyi nang du son pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phan yon gyi sgo nas te lus kyi rtsa padma'i rnam par gzhag par 'gyur te de padma nam mkha'i khams kyi lus chos thams cad kyi nang du son pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: This is in terms of benefit. The body is arranged in the form of a lotus. That lotus is the body of the space element, because of being situated within all phenomena. This is the ascertainment.

original: de lta bu'i ye shes bya ba gang gis 'byung zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bu'i ye shes bya ba gang gis 'byung zhe na /
translated: By what is that sort of knowledge called?

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: brtson 'grus zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyis de sngon du bshad pa'i rigs pas 'gyur ba ste dus thams cad du'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyis de sngon du bshad pa'i rigs pas 'gyur ba ste dus thams cad du'o //
translated: By the power of effort, by the reality of the factors of enlightenment, that is explained by the reasoning previously stated, at all times.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du bshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, in that way, it will be explained.

original: da ni 'di'i sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bdag po'i sgo nas thabs kyi sgrub thabs gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni 'di'i sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bdag po'i sgo nas thabs kyi sgrub thabs gsungs pa /
translated: Now, here, the method of practice is stated in terms of the lord of the maṇḍala wheel:

original: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas dbus su'o zhes bya ba'i bar du rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas dbus su'o zhes bya ba'i bar du rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The maṇḍala, etc., up to in the middle is easy to understand.

original: bsgom pa 'di byang chub kyi sems kyi dus su rtsa'i 'khor lo rnams su ming rnams rdzogs par grags pa des phyag rgya'i dngos grub gsungs pa /
analyzed: bsgom pa 'di byang chub kyi sems kyi dus su rtsa'i 'khor lo rnams su ming rnams rdzogs par grags pa des phyag rgya'i dngos grub gsungs pa /
translated: This meditation is said to be the feat of the consort, by the complete fame of the names in the cakras at the time of the enlightenment spirit.

original: gang de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: That which is called that and so forth.

original: rdzogs par bshad pa'i byang chub kyi sems de nyid rtsa dus thams cad du yid kyis kyang bde ba mi 'dor te /
analyzed: rdzogs par bshad pa'i byang chub kyi sems de nyid rtsa dus thams cad du yid kyis kyang bde ba mi 'dor te /
translated: That very enlightenment spirit explained in the complete [version] is not abandoned by the mind at all times in the cakras.

original: des ha'i yi ge gang gi phyir gyi don te /
analyzed: des ha'i yi ge gang gi phyir gyi don te /
translated: The syllable ha is for the purpose of why?

original: sa gsum gyi snying po'i phyag rgya yis //
analyzed: sa gsum gyi snying po'i phyag rgya yis //
translated: The consort of the essence of the three worlds.

original: zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ste rtsa thams cad kyi'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ste rtsa thams cad kyi'o //
translated: The cakra of speech is called the cakra of body, speech, and mind, that is, of all the cakras.

original: de ltar gang du bsgrub par bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar gang du bsgrub par bya ba gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, having said where it is to be accomplished,

original: gsung gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gsung gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ste /
translated: the cakra of speech is called the cakra of body, speech, and mind, that is, of all the cakras.

original: bco lnga bar gsungs pa'i rim pa ste /
analyzed: bco lnga bar gsungs pa'i rim pa ste /
translated: The stage is said to be the fifteenth.

original: de yang gsang ba'i chen po zhes bya ba ni dbus ma'i nang du ste /
analyzed: de yang gsang ba'i chen po zhes bya ba ni dbus ma'i nang du ste /
translated: The great secret is in the center.

original: le'u der bdag sh'akya thub pas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bshad pa ste //
analyzed: le'u der bdag sh'akya thub pas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bshad pa ste //
translated: In that chapter, the transmission from one to another of the self, Śākyamuni, is explained.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtogs par sla'o //
translated: Thus, and so on are easy to understand.

original: dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzings las rlung gi shugs can ma'i ming gi yi ge'i rab tu sbyor bar dang de bzhin du nye ba'i zhing la sogs pa'i ming gi yi ge'i rnam par gzhag pas sna
analyzed: dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzings las rlung gi shugs can ma'i ming gi yi ge'i rab tu sbyor bar dang de bzhin du nye ba'i zhing la sogs pa'i ming gi yi ge'i rnam par gzhag pas sna
translated: In the commentary on the great ocean of yoginīs, the glorious king of tantras, the ship, the application of the syllables of the name of the one with the speed of the wind, and likewise the arrangement of the syllables of the name of the neighboring country, and so on,

original: tshogs pa'i mdog dang gzugs kyi bdag nyid du bskyed pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i yang sgom pa rgyas par bshad pa ste le'u sum cu rtsa drug pa'i bshad pa'o /🔽// / dang po chang @231a * //
analyzed: tshogs pa'i mdog dang gzugs kyi bdag nyid du bskyed pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i yang sgom pa rgyas par bshad pa ste le'u sum cu rtsa drug pa'i bshad pa'o / // / dang po chang @231a * //
translated: the characteristics of the mudrā generated with various colors and forms, the ritual of the wisdom maṇḍala, and so on, are explained in detail. This is the explanation of the thirty-sixth chapter.

original: 'thung mar btud nas //
analyzed: 'thung mar btud nas //
translated: First, having bowed to Surābhakṣī,

original: dpa' bo'i brda sogs dngos po ni //
analyzed: dpa' bo'i brda sogs dngos po ni //
translated: the signs of the hero and so on,

original: bklags pas grub pa'i man ngag ste //
analyzed: bklags pas grub pa'i man ngag ste //
translated: the instructions for accomplishment through recitation,

original: de yi 'grel pa rgya cher bya //🔽da ni chang 'thung ma'i rab tu sbyor bas le'u sum cu rtsa bdun pa'i cho ga'i bshad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de yi 'grel pa rgya cher bya // da ni chang 'thung ma'i rab tu sbyor bas le'u sum cu rtsa bdun pa'i cho ga'i bshad pa gsungs pa /
translated: Its commentary is extensive.

original: de nas rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste ;
analyzed: de nas rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste ;
translated: Now, the procedure of chapter thirty-seven is stated, beginning with “Then Vajra…etc.”

original: rdo rje phag mo'i sprul pa'i lus chang 'thung ma lta bu rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo'i sprul pa'i lus chang 'thung ma lta bu rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas //
translated: The emanated body of Vajravārāhī, like Surābhakṣī, having made offerings,

original: de ta'i yi ge ni nges par gzung ba ste /
analyzed: de ta'i yi ge ni nges par gzung ba ste /
translated: the syllable “ta” is a specification.

original: ji lta ba'i cho ga'i zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba ji lta ba'i man ngag gi rim pas bla na med pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa'i mchod pa des bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi sku gcig pus mnyes pas tshig 'di gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: ji lta ba'i cho ga'i zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba ji lta ba'i man ngag gi rim pas bla na med pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa'i mchod pa des bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi sku gcig pus mnyes pas tshig 'di gsungs pa ste /
translated: “The procedure as it is” is the procedure that will be explained, by the sequence of the esoteric instructions, with the unsurpassed offerings, the offering of offerings. By that, the Bhagavān, the sole body of gnosis, being pleased, spoke these words:

original: nyon cig lha mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: nyon cig lha mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “Listen, goddess…etc.”

original: rang gis phyag rgya lha bla ma //
analyzed: rang gis phyag rgya lha bla ma //
translated: “One’s own mudrā deity guru”

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: phyag rgya 'di nyid bla ma ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di nyid bla ma ste /
translated: this mudrā is the guru.

original: phyag rgya lha bla ma ste rang gis mngon sum du nyams su myong ba'i gzugs las zhes bya ba'i don no //
analyzed: phyag rgya lha bla ma ste rang gis mngon sum du nyams su myong ba'i gzugs las zhes bya ba'i don no //
translated: The mudra is the guru of the deity, the meaning of which is “from the form that is directly experienced by oneself.”

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: That itself is stated:

original: 'o byed ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'o byed ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “The one called the kṣetrapāla, etc.”

original: rnal 'byor ma drug nang gi bdag nyid can gyi gtor ma dang 'khor lo mchod pa'i dus su dpa' bo rnams kyis brtan par bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma drug nang gi bdag nyid can gyi gtor ma dang 'khor lo mchod pa'i dus su dpa' bo rnams kyis brtan par bya'o //
translated: The heroes should be firm in the inner nature of the six yoginīs at the time of the bali offering and the worship of the wheel.

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis lag pa g-yon pas bya ste des de rnams kyi rang gi rigs rnams su rab tu byed pa por 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis lag pa g-yon pas bya ste des de rnams kyi rang gi rigs rnams su rab tu byed pa por 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The yogins should do it with the left hand, and thereby they will become the agents of their own families.

original: de ltar rnam gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad par bya'o zhes bya bar 'brel to //
analyzed: de ltar rnam gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad par bya'o zhes bya bar 'brel to //
translated: Thus, it should be explained with “the three, etc.”

original: mkhas pa kha sbyor sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: mkhas pa kha sbyor sbyor ba'o //
translated: The wise one is the union of the two.

original: zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil dang rgyab tu der lag pa'i mthil du rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo rnams te rgyab tu yang shes par bya zhes bya ba ste sogs pa'i sgras rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang gti mug mkha' 'gro dang rin chen mkha'
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil dang rgyab tu der lag pa'i mthil du rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo rnams te rgyab tu yang shes par bya zhes bya ba ste sogs pa'i sgras rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang gti mug mkha' 'gro dang rin chen mkha'
translated: This is the yoginīs and heroes on the palm of the left hand and on the back of the hand, and it should be understood that on the back of the hand there are also Vajraḍāka, Mohaḍāka, Ratnaḍāka, and Pāṇḍaravāsinī.🔽

original: 'gro dang padma mkha' 'gro dang sna tshogs mkha' 'gro dang ye shes mkha' 'gro'o //
analyzed: 'gro dang padma mkha' 'gro dang sna tshogs mkha' 'gro dang ye shes mkha' 'gro'o //
translated: The yoginīs and heroes are on the palm of the left hand and on the back of the hand. On the back of the hand one should know the Vajra dakini, the Delusion dakini, the Jewel dakini, the Lotus dakini, the Variety dakini, and the Gnosis dakini.

original: rgyab tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: rgyab tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: de bzhin du don dam par yang lag pa g-yon pa phreng ba ste rlung lnga'i rang bzhin du de'i de ltar sor mo lnga rnams su shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du don dam par yang lag pa g-yon pa phreng ba ste rlung lnga'i rang bzhin du de'i de ltar sor mo lnga rnams su shes par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, ultimately, the left hand is the rosary, the nature of the five winds. Thus, one should know the five fingers.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnas te lag pa'i rgyal po der yang rtsa lnga rnams kyi 'di rnams gcig pa'i bu ga lnga rnams kyi mdud pa ste der lha mo rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnas te lag pa'i rgyal po der yang rtsa lnga rnams kyi 'di rnams gcig pa'i bu ga lnga rnams kyi mdud pa ste der lha mo rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ro //
translated: There, in the abode of the Tathāgatas, the king of hands, there are five channels. In the five holes of these, there are knots. There, the goddesses reside.

original: de ltar lte ba'i @231b gnas su yang ngo //
analyzed: de ltar lte ba'i @231b gnas su yang ngo //
translated: In this way, the navel is also.

original: de bzhin du dbus ma'i mtshams ni snying ga'i bu ga rnams kyis mdud pa ni de la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dbus ma'i mtshams ni snying ga'i bu ga rnams kyis mdud pa ni de la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: In the same way, the middle joints are the openings of the heart. The knots are there.

original: de ltar yang rlung lnga rnams te gnas der lha mo rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: de ltar yang rlung lnga rnams te gnas der lha mo rnams kyang ngo //
translated: Thus, the five winds are there, and the goddesses are there.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lag mthil du zhes bya ba ni mdud pa rnams kyi steng du do lir gyur pa rnams kyi de rnams su rlung rnams kyi gnas rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lag mthil du zhes bya ba ni mdud pa rnams kyi steng du do lir gyur pa rnams kyi de rnams su rlung rnams kyi gnas rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ro //
translated: The Tathāgatas are in the palms of the hands, that is, on the knots. The joints are the places of the winds. They are the places of the Tathāgatas.

original: de ltar sen mo'i nya phor du rtsa lnga las byung ba'i rtse mor srog rnams su mgrin pa'i mdud pa'i bar du dpa' bo rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar sen mo'i nya phor du rtsa lnga las byung ba'i rtse mor srog rnams su mgrin pa'i mdud pa'i bar du dpa' bo rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, the five channels that arise from the five nails are the tips of the life [winds]. They are the places of the heroes up to the throat knot.

original: slar yang mtheb mo'i gnas sna'i rtsa mo'i khar rnams su rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ba ste tshig 'di'o //
analyzed: slar yang mtheb mo'i gnas sna'i rtsa mo'i khar rnams su rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ba ste tshig 'di'o //
translated: Again, the places of the toes are the places of the yoginīs up to the tip of the nose. This is the meaning of the verse.

original: lag pa'i rtse mor do la las gtong ba'i dus su dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi brda bya ste phyi rol du ni 'du ba'i gnas rnams su brtan pa'i bya'o //
analyzed: lag pa'i rtse mor do la las gtong ba'i dus su dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi brda bya ste phyi rol du ni 'du ba'i gnas rnams su brtan pa'i bya'o //
translated: At the time of sending forth the gesture at the tip of the hand, one should make the gesture of the heroes and yoginis, and externally in the places of assembly one should make the gesture of stability.

original: de ltar rgyab kyis gshegs gsol bya //
analyzed: de ltar rgyab kyis gshegs gsol bya //
translated: Thus one should request the departure.

original: zhes bya ba ni lag pa'i rgyab kyis bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lag pa'i rgyab kyis bya'o //
translated: This is done with the back of the hand.

original: 'di byas pas gang zhig gang gi bdag po nyid du 'gyur te nang gi bdag nyid dang rang bzhin du 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'di byas pas gang zhig gang gi bdag po nyid du 'gyur te nang gi bdag nyid dang rang bzhin du 'byung ba'o //
translated: By doing this, one becomes the lord of whatever one desires, and the inner nature arises naturally.

original: de rnams kyi dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi mtshon par bya'o //
translated: One should make the gesture of the heroes and yoginis.

original: de ltar ci byas nas dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams 'byung zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar ci byas nas dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams 'byung zhe na /
translated: In what way do the heroes and yoginis arise by doing this?

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: chang 'thung ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste 'chad par 'gyur ba'i ming gi yi ge'i rab tu sbyor bas so //
analyzed: chang 'thung ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste 'chad par 'gyur ba'i ming gi yi ge'i rab tu sbyor bas so //
translated: The one called “drinking wine,” etc., by the application of the syllables of the names to be explained.

original: de ltar mdor bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i rgyas par bshad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i rgyas par bshad pa gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, having explained the verse of brief explanation, he says:

original: legs par gzung zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste bzang por gzung ba ni legs par bzung ba ste /
analyzed: legs par gzung zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste bzang por gzung ba ni legs par bzung ba ste /
translated: Well-held is good holding.

original: su'i yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: su'i yi ge'i don to //
translated: Whose syllables?

original: des gang du zhe na /🔽yid bzang ma'i nang du bde ba'i sa bon bcings pas phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: des gang du zhe na / yid bzang ma'i nang du bde ba'i sa bon bcings pas phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: By whom?

original: de'i phyir dus thams cad du skyes pa ni dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir dus thams cad du skyes pa ni dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By the yoginīs and heroes, in all circumstances.

original: de ltar dpa' bo rnams kyis phyi rol tu bza' ba dang ston mo la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar dpa' bo rnams kyis phyi rol tu bza' ba dang ston mo la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: Thus, the heroes should do the external eating, feast, etc.

original: de nyid nang gi bdag nyid du ste /
analyzed: de nyid nang gi bdag nyid du ste /
translated: That is the inner nature.

original: ci byas nas 'gyur ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci byas nas 'gyur ba gsungs pa /
translated: Having done what, it is?

original: ha ru zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste r'a'i yi ge'i don gyis so //
analyzed: ha ru zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste r'a'i yi ge'i don gyis so //
translated: It is said: harī, etc. , by the meaning of the syllable ra.

original: ha ru zhes bya ba ni bum pa can gyi rtsa'o //🔽dus kyi me zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rtsa dang / nyi ma zhes bya ba @232a * //
analyzed: ha ru zhes bya ba ni bum pa can gyi rtsa'o // dus kyi me zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rtsa dang / nyi ma zhes bya ba @232a * //
translated: Harī is the nāḍī of the vase.

original: ni g-yas pa'i rtsa ste /
analyzed: ni g-yas pa'i rtsa ste /
translated: The fire of time is the left nāḍī, and the sun is the right nāḍī.

original: de rnams kyi zas su byas pa ni sna'i rtse mor te de bzhin zhes bya ba ste rtse mo ni 'khyil pa'i aa wa dh'u t'i'i rtse mor kyang rnal 'byor gyis bzung bas zas su bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi zas su byas pa ni sna'i rtse mor te de bzhin zhes bya ba ste rtse mo ni 'khyil pa'i aa wa dh'u t'i'i rtse mor kyang rnal 'byor gyis bzung bas zas su bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
translated: The food for those is at the tip of the nose, “just like that,” that is, the tip of the nose is the tip of the coiled avadhūtī, and the yogī should hold it and make it food.🔽

original: 'di byas pas kyang bza' ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas bha'i yi ge'i don te des yul zhes bya ba ni yul gyi sgras sna tshogs pa'i bde ba'i dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: 'di byas pas kyang bza' ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas bha'i yi ge'i don te des yul zhes bya ba ni yul gyi sgras sna tshogs pa'i bde ba'i dbang po rnams so //
translated: The meaning of the syllable bha is stated by “having done this, one should eat” and so on. “ That” is the object, that is, the various sense faculties of pleasure.

original: de'i phyir phra mo gnyis med gzugs can zhes bya ba ste zos nas nang du thim pa zhes bya ba'i don te //
analyzed: de'i phyir phra mo gnyis med gzugs can zhes bya ba ste zos nas nang du thim pa zhes bya ba'i don te //
translated: Therefore, “the subtle, nondual form” is the meaning of “having eaten, one should dissolve internally.”

original: de rnams kyi dpa' bo la sogs pa rnams kyi bdud rtsi lnga phyi rol du bza' ba'i rgyur gsungs pa /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dpa' bo la sogs pa rnams kyi bdud rtsi lnga phyi rol du bza' ba'i rgyur gsungs pa /
translated: The five nectars of those heroes and so on are stated to be the cause of external eating.

original: kshi ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste kshi'i yi ge'i don gyis bshad pa'i nang du son pa'i khams thams cad bdud rtsir bskyed do //
analyzed: kshi ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste kshi'i yi ge'i don gyis bshad pa'i nang du son pa'i khams thams cad bdud rtsir bskyed do //
translated: The meaning of the syllable kṣa is stated by “kṣa” and so on. All the elements that are explained as contained in the syllable kṣa are generated as nectar.

original: der 'dzags pas na'o //
analyzed: der 'dzags pas na'o //
translated: It drips there.

original: der yang rang gis rig pa'i sems kyis bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: der yang rang gis rig pa'i sems kyis bza' bar bya'o //
translated: There also, one should eat with the mind that is known by oneself.

original: me tog ces bya ba ni phyi rol gyi mchod pa'i rgyur me tog rnams so //
analyzed: me tog ces bya ba ni phyi rol gyi mchod pa'i rgyur me tog rnams so //
translated: The flowers are the flowers for the cause of external worship.

original: de yang sems kyi sa bon zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi sa bon gnyis nam mkha'i me tog go //
analyzed: de yang sems kyi sa bon zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi sa bon gnyis nam mkha'i me tog go //
translated: And that is the seed of the mind, the seed of the thought of enlightenment, the two flowers of the sky.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyi rol du 'dir 'thungs nas song ste de rnams kyi rgyu gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyi rol du 'dir 'thungs nas song ste de rnams kyi rgyu gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, etc. Having drunk here externally, he goes, and he declares the cause of those:

original: lte ba zhes bya ba ste lte ba'i dbus su ra sngon zhes bya ba ni ji ltar grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams kyi gnas par 'gyur te der des kyang sna tshogs pa'i su ra rnams kyi sbyor bar byed de 'gro pa rnams kyi dga' don
analyzed: lte ba zhes bya ba ste lte ba'i dbus su ra sngon zhes bya ba ni ji ltar grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams kyi gnas par 'gyur te der des kyang sna tshogs pa'i su ra rnams kyi sbyor bar byed de 'gro pa rnams kyi dga' don
translated: The navel is the middle of the navel. The blue ra is just as the people living in the city become the abode, and there also he makes the union of the various sura-s, the purpose of the pleasure of the goers.

original: du'o // de bzhin du lte ba'i gnas su rtsa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i tshogs gnas par 'gyur te su ra rnams ni mig la sogs pa las byung ba'i lha rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin rnams so //
analyzed: du'o // de bzhin du lte ba'i gnas su rtsa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i tshogs gnas par 'gyur te su ra rnams ni mig la sogs pa las byung ba'i lha rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin rnams so //
translated: In the same way, in the navel region, the collection of all the channel wheels is present. The suras are the gods arising from the eyes, etc., which are of the nature of one's own mind.

original: sngon zhes bya ba ni der sngon du bshad pa'i rim pas byang chub kyi sems sbyar ba'i su ra 'thung ba ste des dus thams cad du dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams dga' bas ra ro ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngon zhes bya ba ni der sngon du bshad pa'i rim pas byang chub kyi sems sbyar ba'i su ra 'thung ba ste des dus thams cad du dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams dga' bas ra ro ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Previously means that there, previously, by the process explained there, one should drink the sura of the application of the thought of awakening. By that, at all times, one becomes intoxicated with the joy of the heroes and yoginis.

original: de ltar sbyar ba zhes bya ba brtan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis byed do //
analyzed: de ltar sbyar ba zhes bya ba brtan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis byed do //
translated: In that way, one should apply means that one should do it with firm yoga.

original: 'dir ni ji ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dir ni ji ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Here, how is it? It is said:

original: gzhu'i dbyug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste zhing gi dang po'i yi ges de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhu'i dbyug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste zhing gi dang po'i yi ges de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: The bow-staff, etc. The first syllable of kṣetra indicates that.

original: ko'i yi ge'i don gyis so //
analyzed: ko'i yi ge'i don gyis so //
translated: By the meaning of the syllable ko.

original: de ltar blangs nas mgo bor gzhu'i dbyug pa'i rnam pa'i srog tu bzang ba ste /
analyzed: de ltar blangs nas mgo bor gzhu'i dbyug pa'i rnam pa'i srog tu bzang ba ste /
translated: Having taken it in that way, on the head, the bow-staff-formed life is good.

original: de'i nang du son @232b pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni mnyam par bzung ba tsam gyis kyang de de bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: de'i nang du son @232b pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni mnyam par bzung ba tsam gyis kyang de de bzhin du bshad do //
translated: The so-called mind that is within it is just the same as that which is grasped in equipoise.

original: de ltar ro mnyam zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: de ltar ro mnyam zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge'i don to //
translated: Thus, the meaning of the syllables ro sam and so forth.

original: des chos thams cad kyi ro myangs pas chos kyi ros tshim pa'o //
analyzed: des chos thams cad kyi ro myangs pas chos kyi ros tshim pa'o //
translated: Since one has tasted the flavor of all phenomena, one is satisfied by the flavor of phenomena.

original: des phyi rol du bshad pa'o //
analyzed: des phyi rol du bshad pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is explained as external.

original: de ltar yang gnas gang du 'gyur ba gsungs ba ;
analyzed: de ltar yang gnas gang du 'gyur ba gsungs ba ;
translated: In that way, it is also said that where is it located?

original: la la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: la la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said in some places and so forth.

original: la'i yi ge'i don te /
analyzed: la'i yi ge'i don te /
translated: This is the meaning of the syllable la.

original: des la la n'a yang dbu ma g-yon nas rtsa thams cad kyi phyi mor gnas pa las so //
analyzed: des la la n'a yang dbu ma g-yon nas rtsa thams cad kyi phyi mor gnas pa las so //
translated: By that, in some places means that it is located in the nāḍī on the left side of the central nāḍī, which is the mother of all nāḍīs.

original: de'i la l'a nas kyang 'ongs pas bde ba'i mthus srog gi sa bon gyi gzugs kyis zag pa med pa ste 'pho ba med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i la l'a nas kyang 'ongs pas bde ba'i mthus srog gi sa bon gyi gzugs kyis zag pa med pa ste 'pho ba med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since it also comes from la la, by the power of bliss, it becomes the form of the seed of life, which is free of outflows, that is, free of transmigration.

original: de ltar brda'i de'i dus su yang de de bzhin du gsungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar brda'i de'i dus su yang de de bzhin du gsungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, at that time, the symbolic meaning is also said to be just like that.

original: de yang dran pa'i stobs kyis bdag nyid kyis sngon gyi ngag gi rjes su gnas pa des rab tu gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de yang dran pa'i stobs kyis bdag nyid kyis sngon gyi ngag gi rjes su gnas pa des rab tu gnas pa ste /
translated: By the power of memory, one’s own previous speech is present, and by that, one is present.

original: dran pa'i byang chub kyi rdo rje sna tshogs ba'i zhing dang nye ba'i zhing la sogs pa rnams su dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi mngal la sogs pa 'chags par byed do //🔽dga' ba dang bcas mchog zhal can //
analyzed: dran pa'i byang chub kyi rdo rje sna tshogs ba'i zhing dang nye ba'i zhing la sogs pa rnams su dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi mngal la sogs pa 'chags par byed do // dga' ba dang bcas mchog zhal can //
translated: The vajra of the enlightenment of memory creates the wombs, etc., of the heroes and yoginīs in the various buddha-fields, such as the buddha-field of the Buddha Vajraketu.

original: zhes bya ba ni rtsa thams cad las byung ba'i sna tshogs pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin las bsam pa zhes bya bar dgongs pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rtsa thams cad las byung ba'i sna tshogs pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin las bsam pa zhes bya bar dgongs pa'i don to //
translated: “ With joy, the supreme face” means that the nature of the mind, which is various, arises from all the channels. The meaning of the intended implication is “thought.”

original: de ltar nang gi bdag nyid kyi rigs pa'i brda dang bral bas thabs gzhan yod pa min pa de de bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: de ltar nang gi bdag nyid kyi rigs pa'i brda dang bral bas thabs gzhan yod pa min pa de de bzhin du bshad do //
translated: Thus, because of the absence of the inner symbolic meaning, there is no other method. That is explained in the same way.

original: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
translated: Also, it is stated:

original: phyag rgya chen po'i brda yis ni //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i brda yis ni //
translated: By the symbolic meaning of the great seal,

original: grol ba'i rgyu rnams rab tu bstan //
analyzed: grol ba'i rgyu rnams rab tu bstan //
translated: the causes of liberation are fully taught.

original: 'khor ba yi ni 'ching ba las //
analyzed: 'khor ba yi ni 'ching ba las //
translated: From the bondage of saṃsāra,

original: de dang bral bas grol mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de dang bral bas grol mi 'gyur //
translated: One will not be liberated by being separated from that.

original: nang gi bdag nyid kyang shes pas //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid kyang shes pas //
translated: Also, by knowing the inner nature,

original: rnal 'byor dga' pa'i sa la gnas //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dga' pa'i sa la gnas //
translated: one abides in the stage of the delight of yoga.

original: lte ba'i 'khor lor rnal 'byor che //
analyzed: lte ba'i 'khor lor rnal 'byor che //
translated: The great yoga is in the navel cakra,

original: dri ma med par son pa'i sems //
analyzed: dri ma med par son pa'i sems //
translated: the mind that has reached the stainless.

original: dga' bcas de las langs nas ni //
analyzed: dga' bcas de las langs nas ni //
translated: Having arisen from that with joy,

original: rang bdag nyid kyi sa la 'gro //
analyzed: rang bdag nyid kyi sa la 'gro //
translated: one goes to one’s own stage.

original: byang chub 'khor lor lha mo rnams //
analyzed: byang chub 'khor lor lha mo rnams //
translated: The goddesses in the enlightenment cakra

original: de yi gzugs su 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: de yi gzugs su 'gro ba'o //
translated: go to that form.

original: sna tshogs phung po la sogs khams //
analyzed: sna tshogs phung po la sogs khams //
translated: The various aggregates and so on are the elements,🔽which are known to be consumed beforehand.

original: sngon du bza' bar yang dag rig / phyi rol la dga' de nyid kyis //
analyzed: sngon du bza' bar yang dag rig / phyi rol la dga' de nyid kyis //
translated: When one is delighted with the external,

original: 'dus pa na ni bza' ba'o //
analyzed: 'dus pa na ni bza' ba'o //
translated: one consumes the union.

original: zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdus pa'o //
translated: This is the summary.

original: da ni de rnams kyi ji lta ba'i thabs kyis bskyed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: da ni de rnams kyi ji lta ba'i thabs kyis bskyed par 'gyur te /
translated: Now, they will be generated by the method of that.

original: rnam pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnam pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa gsungs pa /
translated: The meditation on the maṇḍala wheel with the aspects is stated:

original: rnal 'byor ma'i @233a * //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i @233a * //
translated: The assembly of yoginīs

original: tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste de ltar rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste de ltar rtogs par sla'o //
translated: and so on. It is easy to understand in that way.

original: 'byin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngags kyi rkang pa gnyis gnyis rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi 'byin pa dang sdud pa'i don gyis bshad pa ste do la dang phreng ba'i rim pas so //
analyzed: 'byin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngags kyi rkang pa gnyis gnyis rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi 'byin pa dang sdud pa'i don gyis bshad pa ste do la dang phreng ba'i rim pas so //
translated: The two lines of mantra beginning with “eka” are explained by the meaning of the emission and gathering of all yoginīs, with the order of the garland.

original: lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //🔽dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzings las chang 'thung ma'i rab tu sbyor ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid dang des de ltar phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi lag pa'i brdas kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa dang dkyil
analyzed: lhag ma rtogs par sla'o // dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzings las chang 'thung ma'i rab tu sbyor ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid dang des de ltar phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi lag pa'i brdas kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa dang dkyil
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa rnams kyi rgyas par bstan pa ste le'u sum cu rtsa bdun pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa rnams kyi rgyas par bstan pa ste le'u sum cu rtsa bdun pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: In the commentary on the Great King of Yoginī Tantras, the glorious Ocean of Dakas, in the chapter called “The Procedure of the Practice of Cāmuṇḍā,” the external and internal maṇḍala is taught by the gestures of the hands, and the extensive teaching of the meditation of the maṇḍala wheel is the explanation of the thirty-seventh chapter.

original: // / las rnams thams cad 'dzin pa mo //
analyzed: // / las rnams thams cad 'dzin pa mo //
translated: The one who holds all actions,

original: ljang lha mo la phyag byas nas //
analyzed: ljang lha mo la phyag byas nas //
translated: the green goddess, I pay homage.

original: phag mo'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas //
analyzed: phag mo'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas //
translated: Endowed with the practice of Vārāhī,

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams der rab 'gro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams der rab 'gro //
translated: the yogins go there.

original: rtsa ba'i sngags kyi rgyal mo yi //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags kyi rgyal mo yi //
translated: The queen of root mantras,🔽

original: phag mo la yang phyag byas nas //
analyzed: phag mo la yang phyag byas nas //
translated: Having bowed to the queen of root mantras,🔽to Vārāhī,

original: 'khor lo rnams kyi dang po'i gzugs //
analyzed: 'khor lo rnams kyi dang po'i gzugs //
translated: the form of the first of the wheels,

original: de yi 'khrul 'khor bcu gnyis su //
analyzed: de yi 'khrul 'khor bcu gnyis su //
translated: her machine is twelvefold.

original: des ni 'khor lo rnams 'byin te //
analyzed: des ni 'khor lo rnams 'byin te //
translated: By that, the wheels are produced,

original: bcu gnyis gnod mdzes sngags kyis ni //
analyzed: bcu gnyis gnod mdzes sngags kyis ni //
translated: and by the mantra of Sumbha, the twelve,

original: sngon gyi 'khor lo gnyis brten nas //
analyzed: sngon gyi 'khor lo gnyis brten nas //
translated: relying on the two previous wheels,

original: de ru las ni bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: de ru las ni bsgrub par bya //
translated: the rite is accomplished there.

original: gsang sngags chen po'i tshul dag tu //
analyzed: gsang sngags chen po'i tshul dag tu //
translated: In the method of the great mantra,

original: bcu gnyis rnams kyi rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: bcu gnyis rnams kyi rnal 'byor ma //
translated: the yoginīs of the twelve

original: le'u rnams ni de las byung //
analyzed: le'u rnams ni de las byung //
translated: arise from that chapter.

original: tshig gi rjes 'brang smra bar bya //
analyzed: tshig gi rjes 'brang smra bar bya //
translated: One should speak in accordance with the words.

original: da ni las kyi tshogs kyi dus rnams su gnas pa'i ljang lha mo rnams kyi le'u sum cu rtsa brgyad pa bshad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni las kyi tshogs kyi dus rnams su gnas pa'i ljang lha mo rnams kyi le'u sum cu rtsa brgyad pa bshad pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in the context of the assembly of rites, the thirty-eighth chapter of the green goddesses who abide in the times is explained.

original: de nas lha mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas lha mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, goddess and so on.

original: de nas kyi sgra ni phyag rgya'i le'u rnams kyi de ma thag par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni phyag rgya'i le'u rnams kyi de ma thag par gnas pa'o //
translated: The word then indicates their immediate presence after the chapters on the seals.

original: 'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang las tshogs rnams kyi dang por ljang lha mo ste /
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang las tshogs rnams kyi dang por ljang lha mo ste /
translated: The first of the yogas, mantras, and ritual actions is the green goddess.

original: de'i tshe gzugs brje zhing bsgyur bar gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe gzugs brje zhing bsgyur bar gnas pa ste /
translated: At that time, she is the one who abides in the transformation and change of form.

original: rdo rje phag mo'i gzugs kyis gnas nas sngon du bshad pa'i kun du spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mchod pa'i ngag gis lha mo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo'i gzugs kyis gnas nas sngon du bshad pa'i kun du spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mchod pa'i ngag gis lha mo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Having remained in the form of Vajravārāhī, she is the goddess who is the speech of worship having the character of the conduct explained previously.🔽She is the worship by means of the form of the divine padminī, who holds one’s awareness in the avadhūti.

original: des kyang lha rdzas padma can gyi gzugs kyis aa wa dh'u t'i ra rang gi rig pa bzung bas mchod pa ste dpal he ru ka'i rnam par gzhag pa las te nges pas 'dri ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: des kyang lha rdzas padma can gyi gzugs kyis aa wa dh'u t'i ra rang gi rig pa bzung bas mchod pa ste dpal he ru ka'i rnam par gzhag pa las te nges pas 'dri ba gsungs pa /
translated: The glorious Heruka has spoken this question with certainty:

original: ston zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ston zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “The teacher,” etc.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i bdag po zhes bya ba ni ljang lha @233b mo'i bdag po las kyi tshogs su gang gyur pa de bdag ni bdag gi rdo rje phag mo las te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i bdag po zhes bya ba ni ljang lha @233b mo'i bdag po las kyi tshogs su gang gyur pa de bdag ni bdag gi rdo rje phag mo las te /
translated: The lord of yoginīs is the lord of the green goddess, who is the one who has become the ritual action. He says, “I am,” from his Vajravārāhī.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni kye bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bstan par mdzod ces bya bar 'brel to //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni kye bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bstan par mdzod ces bya bar 'brel to //
translated: The word vajra is connected with O Bhagavān Vajradhara, please teach!

original: de nas bshad par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi lan gyi tshig gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nas bshad par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi lan gyi tshig gsungs pa /
translated: Then, with I will explain, etc., the Bhagavān spoke the words of reply.

original: lha rdzas zhes bya ba ni lha rdzas kyi dbang po'i sgo rnams su nang gi bdag nyid rnams su bstan pas sems can gyi dgos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha rdzas zhes bya ba ni lha rdzas kyi dbang po'i sgo rnams su nang gi bdag nyid rnams su bstan pas sems can gyi dgos par 'gyur ro //
translated: The word divine means that the inner nature is taught in the doors of the divine sense faculties, which will serve the needs of sentient beings.

original: gang gis zhes bya ba ni las kyis so //
analyzed: gang gis zhes bya ba ni las kyis so //
translated: By what, etc., it means by action.

original: dbang la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni dbang dang dgug pa dang rengs pa dang gsad pa dang bskrad pa la sogs pa ste /🔽lha la sogs pa de bzhin 'gyur //
analyzed: dbang la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni dbang dang dgug pa dang rengs pa dang gsad pa dang bskrad pa la sogs pa ste / lha la sogs pa de bzhin 'gyur //
translated: The word control, etc., means control, attraction, immobilization, killing, banishing, and so on.

original: zhes bya ba ni lha dang lha ma yin dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lha dang lha ma yin dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The word also means that gods, asuras, nāgas, yakṣas, cakravartins, and so on will be controlled, attracted, immobilized, killed, banished, and so on.

original: las 'di de sngags gang gis bya zhe na /
analyzed: las 'di de sngags gang gis bya zhe na /
translated: By what mantra should these actions be performed?

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: He said just that:

original: thog ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: thog ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The word first, etc.

original: thog mar sngon du bsnyen pa dang srung ba dang yongs su srung ba la sogs pa bya ste /
analyzed: thog mar sngon du bsnyen pa dang srung ba dang yongs su srung ba la sogs pa bya ste /
translated: First, one should perform the prior service, protection, complete protection, and so forth.

original: rdo rje phag mo'i le'u gnyis par gsungs pa'i de kho na nyid kyi rigs pas rtsa ba'i sngags kyi las 'grub pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo'i le'u gnyis par gsungs pa'i de kho na nyid kyi rigs pas rtsa ba'i sngags kyi las 'grub pa ste /
translated: The root mantra is accomplished by the logic of reality taught in the second chapter of Vajravarahi.

original: de ltar grub pa'i mthus bkas gnang ba ster ro //
analyzed: de ltar grub pa'i mthus bkas gnang ba ster ro //
translated: By the power of thus accomplishing, the permission is granted by the command.

original: ka ling+ga kha'i gnas su grub pa'i tshig gis ljang lha mo sngags kyis bskul bas mngon sum du mthong ngo //
analyzed: ka ling+ga kha'i gnas su grub pa'i tshig gis ljang lha mo sngags kyis bskul bas mngon sum du mthong ngo //
translated: In the place of Kalimpong, by the words of accomplishment, the green goddess is invoked by mantra and is seen in actuality.

original: de gang cis she na /
analyzed: de gang cis she na /
translated: What is that?

original: de'i rigs rnams su rnal 'byor pa'i lus kyi khams kyis ye shes kyi rnam pa'i sngags kyi rnam par gzhag pa la rdo rje phag mo las gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de'i rigs rnams su rnal 'byor pa'i lus kyi khams kyis ye shes kyi rnam pa'i sngags kyi rnam par gzhag pa la rdo rje phag mo las gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
translated: In her family, the yogin's body element is the aspect of gnosis, the arrangement of mantra, by the characteristics taught by Vajravarahi.

original: des hi'i yi ge'i nges par bzung ba'o //
analyzed: des hi'i yi ge'i nges par bzung ba'o //
translated: That is the determination of the letter hi.

original: de'i phyir de'i rigs las byung ba'i ljang lha mo bdag nyid kyi rnam pas de bdag nyid kyi rkyen gyis rang gi bdag nyid du bkas gnang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i rigs las byung ba'i ljang lha mo bdag nyid kyi rnam pas de bdag nyid kyi rkyen gyis rang gi bdag nyid du bkas gnang ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the green goddess born from that family, by her own nature, is permitted by him, by her own condition, in her own nature.

original: grub pa'i gnang ba zhes bya bar dgongs pa'i don to //
analyzed: grub pa'i gnang ba zhes bya bar dgongs pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the intended meaning is called “the permission of accomplishment.”

original: de ltar sngon du sgom pa ci'am ci'i gzugs sgom pa bsgom par bya bar 'gyur ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar sngon du sgom pa ci'am ci'i gzugs sgom pa bsgom par bya bar 'gyur ba gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, having previously meditated on something, or having meditated on the form of something, one should meditate.

original: rtsa bdun zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rtsa bdun zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares, “The seven channels,” and so on.

original: de ltar mchog gi dbang phyug ma bsgom bya //
analyzed: de ltar mchog gi dbang phyug ma bsgom bya //
translated: Thus, one should meditate on the supreme goddess.

original: zhes bya ba ni ljang lha mo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ljang lha mo'o //
translated: The green goddess is so called.

original: de sgom pa dang bral bas min pa ste de de bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: de sgom pa dang bral bas min pa ste de de bzhin du bshad do //
translated: One should not be separated from meditating on her. That is explained in that way.

original: sngags gsungs pa /
analyzed: sngags gsungs pa /
translated: The mantra is stated:

original: aom sha zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //🔽mchog ces bya ba ni bzlas pa dang sgom pa 'di rnams thams @234a * //
analyzed: aom sha zhes bya ba la sogs pas so // mchog ces bya ba ni bzlas pa dang sgom pa 'di rnams thams @234a * //
translated: “Oṃ śrī,” and so on.

original: cad kyi sngon du ji lta ba'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pas bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: cad kyi sngon du ji lta ba'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pas bsgom par bya'o //
translated: “Supreme” means that all of these repetitions and meditations should be meditated on in the stage of manifest realization, as before.

original: phyi nas rdo rje phag mo dang gnyis su med pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyi rab tu sbyor bas 'bad pas sngags kyi bzlas pa la sogs pa bya'o zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: phyi nas rdo rje phag mo dang gnyis su med pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyi rab tu sbyor bas 'bad pas sngags kyi bzlas pa la sogs pa bya'o zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: Then, with the application of the root mantra, which is non-dual with Vajravārāhī, one should strive in the recitation of the mantra, and so on. This is the definitive meaning.

original: da ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi las gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi las gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the external and internal rites are taught:

original: zla mtshan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste zla mtshan gyi me tog gis gos pa'i ras te /
analyzed: zla mtshan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste zla mtshan gyi me tog gis gos pa'i ras te /
translated: The menstrual cloth, etc. The menstrual cloth is a cloth stained by the flower of menstruation.

original: de yang phyogs bcu rnams su gang bskur bar gyur pa'i bgo ba'i gos te yongs su bzung nas bskam par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang phyogs bcu rnams su gang bskur bar gyur pa'i bgo ba'i gos te yongs su bzung nas bskam par bya'o //
translated: That, having been taken up, should be dried in the ten directions, on the cloth of the garment that has been spread out.

original: byi la'i brun dang bsres pa des bdug par bya'o //
analyzed: byi la'i brun dang bsres pa des bdug par bya'o //
translated: It should be fumigated with the ash of a cat's corpse.

original: des bdug pas dngos grub 'dod pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des bdug pas dngos grub 'dod pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
translated: By that fumigation, the desired accomplishment will be accomplished.

original: de yang nye bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de yang nye bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: That is also taught by near, etc.

original: bstan pa des 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: bstan pa des 'gyur ba ste /
translated: By that teaching,

original: de cig na sgrub pa po rnams kyis gang 'dod pa'i mchog ster bar byed de 'di ni phyi'i'o //
analyzed: de cig na sgrub pa po rnams kyis gang 'dod pa'i mchog ster bar byed de 'di ni phyi'i'o //
translated: at one time, the adepts will be given the supreme that is desired. This is the external.

original: nang gi bdag nyid kyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid kyis gsungs pa /
translated: The inner nature is stated:

original: phag mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste ming gi yi ge rnams kyi nges pa'i tshig gi sbyor ba dang ldan par 'gyur bas te /
analyzed: phag mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste ming gi yi ge rnams kyi nges pa'i tshig gi sbyor ba dang ldan par 'gyur bas te /
translated: The syllable pha is the name of the goddess Vārāhī, and so on, because it is endowed with the application of the etymology of the syllables.

original: de de ltar 'di'i tshig 'chad par gsungs pa /
analyzed: de de ltar 'di'i tshig 'chad par gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, it is stated that this is the explanation of the word:🔽The syllable 'ba' is the name of the goddess Vārāhī, and so on, because it is endowed with the application of the etymology of the syllables.

original: g-yon zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste ba'i yi ge'i don gyis so //
analyzed: g-yon zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste ba'i yi ge'i don gyis so //
translated: The meaning of the syllable ba is left, and so on.

original: mthun pa'i rtsa dang lus pas zhes bya ba ni mthun pa'i bde ba 'bab pas ye shes dang shes bya 'dus pa las te /
analyzed: mthun pa'i rtsa dang lus pas zhes bya ba ni mthun pa'i bde ba 'bab pas ye shes dang shes bya 'dus pa las te /
translated: The left channel and body means that the wisdom and the object of knowledge are united because the bliss flows in harmony.

original: 'dir 'gro ba thams cad g-yon las byung zhes bya ba ni 'pho ba med pa steng du 'babs pa'i dus su rang gi sems g-yon du 'khor ba des 'khor ba'i gzugs su 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir 'gro ba thams cad g-yon las byung zhes bya ba ni 'pho ba med pa steng du 'babs pa'i dus su rang gi sems g-yon du 'khor ba des 'khor ba'i gzugs su 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Here, all beings arise from the left means that when the consciousness descends from above without transference, one's mind circulates to the left, and from that, the form of samsara arises.

original: de ltar rang nyid mdzes zhes bya ba la sogs pas ra'i yi ge'i don gyis te /
analyzed: de ltar rang nyid mdzes zhes bya ba la sogs pas ra'i yi ge'i don gyis te /
translated: Thus, one's own beauty and so on is the meaning of the syllable ra.

original: mdzes pa ni 'bar ba ste 'dis mdzes par gyur pa'i rang gis rang rig pa'i bde ba la chags pa'o //
analyzed: mdzes pa ni 'bar ba ste 'dis mdzes par gyur pa'i rang gis rang rig pa'i bde ba la chags pa'o //
translated: Beauty is splendor, and by this one is attached to the bliss of self-knowing self-awareness, which is beautiful.

original: ji srid des 'dir bla mtshan gyi rdul gyi gos su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid des 'dir bla mtshan gyi rdul gyi gos su 'gyur ro //
translated: As long as one is here, one is clothed in the dust of the sign of the guru.

original: brun zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
analyzed: brun zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
translated: By the words “ashes” and so forth,

original: h'ya'i yi ge'i don du shes par bya ste /
analyzed: h'ya'i yi ge'i don du shes par bya ste /
translated: one should understand the meaning of the syllable ha.

original: 'jig rten gsum dang ye shes bsres//
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum dang ye shes bsres//
translated: “The three worlds are mixed with gnosis”

original: zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni //
translated: means

original: lus yid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su gnyis su med par bsres pa ste 'dod chags chen po'i bdag nyid kyi rdul can gyi ras de rnams kyis bdug pas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lus yid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su gnyis su med par bsres pa ste 'dod chags chen po'i bdag nyid kyi rdul can gyi ras de rnams kyis bdug pas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: that the body and mind are mixed nondually in the gnosis of the sameness of mind. The meaning is that one goes to unsurpassed awakening by fumigating with those cloths that are dusty with the nature of great passion.

original: de ltar slar yang byi la zhes bya ba ni byi ba za ba'i don @234b gyis phyi rol du mnyam pa'i dus kyi byi la mthong bas der 'jigs pas brun lhung ngo //
analyzed: de ltar slar yang byi la zhes bya ba ni byi ba za ba'i don @234b gyis phyi rol du mnyam pa'i dus kyi byi la mthong bas der 'jigs pas brun lhung ngo //
translated: Thus, again, “rat” means “eating rats.” Externally, at the time of equality, seeing a rat, one is frightened by that and drops the ashes.

original: des bya'o zhes bya ba ni man ngag go //
analyzed: des bya'o zhes bya ba ni man ngag go //
translated: “By that” means “by the instruction.”

original: nang gi bdag nyid du ni g-yo ba med pa'i sems de yul thams cad kyi 'jigs pas 'jigs pas n'a hy'a'i yi ge'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid du ni g-yo ba med pa'i sems de yul thams cad kyi 'jigs pas 'jigs pas n'a hy'a'i yi ge'i tshig gis so //
translated: The inner nature is the mind that is unmoving, because of being frightened by the fear of all objects, by the syllable a.

original: de ltar ljang gu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ljang lha mo'i yi ge rnams kyi don gyis stong pa nyid dang snying rje gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar ljang gu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ljang lha mo'i yi ge rnams kyi don gyis stong pa nyid dang snying rje gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, green and so forth, by the meaning of the syllables of the green goddess, emptiness and compassion are taught.

original: de ltar 'di'i ming snying rje'i sbyor bas ljang gu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'di'i ming snying rje'i sbyor bas ljang gu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, green is the name of this one, by the application of compassion.

original: lha mo dbus ma de bzhin zhes bya ba ni dbu mar zhugs pa na ste tsa'i yi ges stong pa nyid kyang lha ste ma bcos pa'i ye shes nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: lha mo dbus ma de bzhin zhes bya ba ni dbu mar zhugs pa na ste tsa'i yi ges stong pa nyid kyang lha ste ma bcos pa'i ye shes nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The middle goddess, thus, is when entering the central channel, by the syllable ca, emptiness is also the goddess, because of being the unfabricated pristine consciousness itself.

original: de nyid kyang stong pa nyid du ka ling ka'i yi ge rnams kyis gsal bar gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyang stong pa nyid du ka ling ka'i yi ge rnams kyis gsal bar gsungs pa /
translated: That itself is emptiness, by the syllables of Kaliṅga, it is clearly taught.

original: bde ba ci zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bde ba ci zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: What is bliss? and so forth.

original: ka'i yi ge'i don gyis chos thams cad kyi brjod byar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ka'i yi ge'i don gyis chos thams cad kyi brjod byar 'gyur te /
translated: By the meaning of the syllable ka, all phenomena become the object of expression.

original: chos thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa mi bden pa'i phyir bde ba ci la yod /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa mi bden pa'i phyir bde ba ci la yod /
translated: Since all phenomena are not real, such as the aggregates and so on, how can there be any happiness?

original: gang bdag dang bdag gis ba dang / gzung pa dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ting nge 'dzin gyi zad pa de la 'dir gang rigs /
analyzed: gang bdag dang bdag gis ba dang / gzung pa dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ting nge 'dzin gyi zad pa de la 'dir gang rigs /
translated: What is reasonable here in regard to the exhaustion of meditative concentration in the aspect of the self and that which belongs to the self, the apprehended and the apprehender?

original: gang gi tshe srid pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pas pha rol du sdug bsngal ster ba por mi rigs te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe srid pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pas pha rol du sdug bsngal ster ba por mi rigs te /
translated: When it is not reasonable that the suffering of the other is bestowed by the desire for existence and so on,

original: de'i tshe don dam pa'i spyod yul ci ste phan tshun sgyu mar bltas pa'i dngos pos so //
analyzed: de'i tshe don dam pa'i spyod yul ci ste phan tshun sgyu mar bltas pa'i dngos pos so //
translated: then why is the ultimate domain of the two, the object and subject of knowledge, not mutually illusory?🔽Thus, if it is taught that there is no fault due to being bound, then the doubt of others is great.

original: de ltar yang bstan pas gal te rab tu 'ching bas skyon du mi 'gyur te de'i che skyen yod ces gzhan gyi the tshom ste de rnams kyi des mdzad par bzhed nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar yang bstan pas gal te rab tu 'ching bas skyon du mi 'gyur te de'i che skyen yod ces gzhan gyi the tshom ste de rnams kyi des mdzad par bzhed nas gsungs pa /
translated: In order to explain that, he says:

original: gos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “Contaminated” and so on.

original: li'i yi ge'i don gyis so //
analyzed: li'i yi ge'i don gyis so //
translated: The meaning of the letter li.

original: de ltar gos par gyur pa ste rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba bsgom pa'i rjes su chags pas sems gang la ting nge 'dzin gyi chags pas gos pa ste //
analyzed: de ltar gos par gyur pa ste rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba bsgom pa'i rjes su chags pas sems gang la ting nge 'dzin gyi chags pas gos pa ste //
translated: Thus, “one who is clothed” is called a “great yogi” because of his attachment to the practice of meditation, his mind is clothed with the attachment to samadhi.

original: shin tu mthun pa'i rnam par shes pa lhag mar 'dod ces bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs las skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus lhag ma dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: shin tu mthun pa'i rnam par shes pa lhag mar 'dod ces bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs las skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus lhag ma dang bcas pa ste /
translated: “The remaining consciousness is very compatible” means that the Bodhisattvas who are born from the consciousness aggregate have a remaining body.

original: 'jig rten rnams la chos ston pa'i sgo nas yongs su gzhag par 'dod do zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten rnams la chos ston pa'i sgo nas yongs su gzhag par 'dod do zhes bya ba ste /
translated: They are said to be established in the world by teaching the Dharma.

original: ji ltar sh'akya'i rgyal pos ye shes la rab tu 'jug pa'i dus su byams pa yongs su gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar sh'akya'i rgyal pos ye shes la rab tu 'jug pa'i dus su byams pa yongs su gzhag pa ste /
translated: Just as the King of the Shakyas, at the time of entering into wisdom, established Maitreya,

original: de las byung ba 'di la skyon med do //
analyzed: de las byung ba 'di la skyon med do //
translated: there is no fault in this arising from that.

original: de ltar gnas gang nas rnam par shes pa skyed ce na /
analyzed: de ltar gnas gang nas rnam par shes pa skyed ce na /
translated: Thus, from which abode is consciousness produced?

original: de'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: @235a * // bgrod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: @235a * // bgrod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “The path” and so forth.

original: ga'i yi ge'i don gyis bgrod pa'i dam pa'i dngos po'i bde ba rtsa thams cad dang tshigs so sor bla ma'i man ngag 'dis skye 'gro thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de rnams kyi bdag nyid chen po rnams su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ga'i yi ge'i don gyis bgrod pa'i dam pa'i dngos po'i bde ba rtsa thams cad dang tshigs so sor bla ma'i man ngag 'dis skye 'gro thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de rnams kyi bdag nyid chen po rnams su 'gyur ro //
translated: By the meaning of the syllable ga, the bliss of the true thing to be traversed arises in all the channels and joints, individually, by this esoteric instruction of the guru.

original: las gzhan gsungs pa /
analyzed: las gzhan gsungs pa /
translated: The other rite is stated:

original: thod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: thod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The “skull” and so on.🔽This is the inner fire sacrifice.

original: nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg go / de yang thod pa kha sbyor zhes bya ba ni la la n'a dang ra sa n'a dag kha sbyor ba dbu ma'i nang du bcings la /
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg go / de yang thod pa kha sbyor zhes bya ba ni la la n'a dang ra sa n'a dag kha sbyor ba dbu ma'i nang du bcings la /
translated: Moreover, the “joined skull” is the joining of lalana and rasanā, bound within the central channel.

original: la'a li dang k'a li las byung ba'i yi ge rnams kyis bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa'i phag mo la sogs pa'i sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bris nas der rnam par gzung bar gyur pa'i dgongs pas sa'i snying po la gzhag ste mang la du'o //
analyzed: la'a li dang k'a li las byung ba'i yi ge rnams kyis bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa'i phag mo la sogs pa'i sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bris nas der rnam par gzung bar gyur pa'i dgongs pas sa'i snying po la gzhag ste mang la du'o //
translated: Having written the magic wheel of the mantra of Vārāhī and so on, together with the name of the victim, with the letters arising from la and ka, one should place it in the heart of Kṣitigarbha, with the intention of holding it there, and meditate.

original: de'i rgyab tu skra rnams kyis g-yon can rang bzhin gyi dngos po rnams sbyin sreg rang bzhin med pa'i bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyab tu skra rnams kyis g-yon can rang bzhin gyi dngos po rnams sbyin sreg rang bzhin med pa'i bshad par bya'o //
translated: Behind that, the hair is the oblation of the nature of deceit.

original: phyi rol du yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: phyi rol du yang de bzhin no //
translated: And so also externally.

original: 'di de zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba 'dis me tog gang la mngon par bsngags nas byin na de dgos pa gang dang gang yid kyis bsam pa de dang de byed do //
analyzed: 'di de zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba 'dis me tog gang la mngon par bsngags nas byin na de dgos pa gang dang gang yid kyis bsam pa de dang de byed do //
translated: This is the mantra, By this application, if one gives a flower consecrated with this mantra, then whatever purpose one mentally intends, that he will accomplish.

original: dngos grub thams cad rab ster byed //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad rab ster byed //
translated: It is the bestower of all powers.

original: ces bya ba'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: ces bya ba'i tshig gis so //
translated: By this statement.

original: de slar yang dam tshig ces bya ba la sogs pas so sor bskyangs bas kyang grub pa ste /
analyzed: de slar yang dam tshig ces bya ba la sogs pas so sor bskyangs bas kyang grub pa ste /
translated: And again, by the protection of the pledge, etc., there is success.

original: sngags shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: sngags shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: The yogi who knows the mantra, this is the determination.

original: nang gi bdag nyid du ni thams cad rang bzhin gyis bsregs pas me tog ste nam mkha'i me tog ye shes kyi bdag nyid de byin pas ni bsams pa ste /
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid du ni thams cad rang bzhin gyis bsregs pas me tog ste nam mkha'i me tog ye shes kyi bdag nyid de byin pas ni bsams pa ste /
translated: Internally, all is the flower of the fire, the flower of space, the nature of wisdom, by giving it, one thinks, May all sentient beings be satisfied.

original: bud med dang skyes pa la sogs pa rjes su 'dzin pas de de'i skad cig la de dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: bud med dang skyes pa la sogs pa rjes su 'dzin pas de de'i skad cig la de dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
translated: By maintaining women and men, etc., in that moment he becomes like that.

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la sogs pa dran pas te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la sogs pa dran pas te /
translated: By the mindfulness of the Buddha, etc.,

original: dngos grub ster ba po ste /
analyzed: dngos grub ster ba po ste /
translated: he is the bestower of powers.

original: 'khor ba ni ci /🔽grol ba ni ci /
analyzed: 'khor ba ni ci / grol ba ni ci /
translated: What is samsara?🔽What is liberation?

original: bral ba ni ci zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bral ba ni ci zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: What is separation?

original: de ltar dam tshig so sor skyong bar byed ces bya ba ni gang zhig rgyun du de nyi ma re res 'grub pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar dam tshig so sor skyong bar byed ces bya ba ni gang zhig rgyun du de nyi ma re res 'grub pa ste /
translated: Thus, he who maintains the individual commitments is one who accomplishes them day by day.

original: zla ba'i btung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: zla ba'i btung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
translated: By the words “drinking the moon”

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams dang rtsa rnams kyi rtag tu dus thams cad du kun du spyod pa'i las kyi zla ba ste lhan cig skyes pa chen po'i bde bzhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams dang rtsa rnams kyi rtag tu dus thams cad du kun du spyod pa'i las kyi zla ba ste lhan cig skyes pa chen po'i bde bzhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the moon is the activity of the conduct of all the yoginis and all the channels at all times, the meaning of which is the great innate bliss.

original: ba lang gi sha zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas dngos grub bgrod de phyir zhes bya @235b ba'i bar du thams cad rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: ba lang gi sha zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas dngos grub bgrod de phyir zhes bya @235b ba'i bar du thams cad rtogs par sla'o //
translated: Everything from “beef” up to “having traversed the powers, return” is easy to understand.

original: da ni 'di rnams kyi las kyi dus su yang 'khrul 'khor gang gis bya zhe na /
analyzed: da ni 'di rnams kyi las kyi dus su yang 'khrul 'khor gang gis bya zhe na /
translated: Now, at the time of their action, by which machine are they to be deluded?

original: de'i 'khrul 'khor gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i 'khrul 'khor gsungs pa /
translated: His machine is stated:

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The vajra, etc.

original: rdo rje'i 'khrul 'khor rab tu bya //
analyzed: rdo rje'i 'khrul 'khor rab tu bya //
translated: The vajra machine is to be performed.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rnam par bya ba yang dum bu dang le'u tsher rdo rje bri bar bya ba ste rdo rje'i phreng bas kyang bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rnam par bya ba yang dum bu dang le'u tsher rdo rje bri bar bya ba ste rdo rje'i phreng bas kyang bskor bar bya'o //
translated: The vajra is to be drawn in the form of a piece, or a series of vajras, and is to be surrounded by a vajra garland.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: This is stated:

original: gcig gis dman pa'i lnga bcu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /🔽dum bu bzhi bcu zhe dgu rnams sa gzhi la da lta nyid du bris pa ste /
analyzed: gcig gis dman pa'i lnga bcu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste / dum bu bzhi bcu zhe dgu rnams sa gzhi la da lta nyid du bris pa ste /
translated: Forty-nine pieces, less one, etc.🔽 The forty-nine pieces are to be drawn on the ground at that time, following the action.

original: de'i tshe las kyi rjes su 'brangs pas bri'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe las kyi rjes su 'brangs pas bri'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is stated:

original: dur khrod kyi ras la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: dur khrod kyi ras la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: On a charnel ground cloth, etc. is definite.

original: de ltar der ji ltar rim pas bri bar bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar der ji ltar rim pas bri bar bya ste /
translated: Thus, there, how are they to be drawn in sequence?🔽 Vairocana is the syllable Om.

original: rnam par snang mdzad ni yi ge aom mo //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ni yi ge aom mo //
translated: Vairocana is the syllable Oṃ.🔽

original: ye shes kyi sa bon ni yi ge h'um ngo //
analyzed: ye shes kyi sa bon ni yi ge h'um ngo //
translated: The seed of wisdom is the syllable hūṃ.

original: rig byed rnams kyi dang po'i dbyangs ni yi ge aom mo //
analyzed: rig byed rnams kyi dang po'i dbyangs ni yi ge aom mo //
translated: The first vowel of the Vedas is the syllable oṃ.

original: rlung ni yi ge ya'o //
analyzed: rlung ni yi ge ya'o //
translated: The wind is the syllable ya.

original: yi ge thams cad kyi dbyangs ni yi ge aom mo //
analyzed: yi ge thams cad kyi dbyangs ni yi ge aom mo //
translated: The vowel of all the syllables is the syllable oṃ.

original: 'khor lo bzung zhes bya ba ni g-yon dang g-yas su bskor ba rnams su 'khor lo gnyis bris nas /
analyzed: 'khor lo bzung zhes bya ba ni g-yon dang g-yas su bskor ba rnams su 'khor lo gnyis bris nas /
translated: “Seize the wheel” means that having drawn two wheels in the clockwise and counterclockwise rotations,

original: thod pas dbus su gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: thod pas dbus su gzhag par bya'o //
translated: one should place them in the center with the skull.

original: dbang gi rdzas rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni gur gum la sogs pas 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams kyis so //🔽de ltar 'khrul 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyi 'phro ba bcu gnyis rnams kyi yi ge gnyis rnams su shar ba de nas dbus su sngags mtshon pa dang bral bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbang gi rdzas rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni gur gum la sogs pas 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams kyis so // de ltar 'khrul 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyi 'phro ba bcu gnyis rnams kyi yi ge gnyis rnams su shar ba de nas dbus su sngags mtshon pa dang bral bar bya'o //
translated: “With the substances of power” means with saffron and so forth, as will be explained.🔽Thus, the two syllables of the twelve emanations of the nature of the yantra arise. Then, in the center, one should remove the indication of the mantra.

original: de rnams kyi dbus su bsgrub bya'i yi ge rnams mtshon pa dang bral ba nyid rang gi rdo rje'i bu ga las byung ba'i rtsar rnam par bzung bas dbang du 'gyur ro//
analyzed: de rnams kyi dbus su bsgrub bya'i yi ge rnams mtshon pa dang bral ba nyid rang gi rdo rje'i bu ga las byung ba'i rtsar rnam par bzung bas dbang du 'gyur ro//
translated: In the center of those, one should remove the indication of the syllables of the victim itself, and by holding the nāḍī that arises from the hole of one’s vajra, one will enthrall.

original: de ltar sngags kyis bdud rtsi lnga rnams dbab par bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar sngags kyis bdud rtsi lnga rnams dbab par bya ste /
translated: Thus, with the mantra, one should cause the five nectars to descend.

original: sbyin sreg des nang gi bdag nyid kyi bya ba ste lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: sbyin sreg des nang gi bdag nyid kyi bya ba ste lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
translated: This is the inner rite. The rest is easy to understand.

original: 'di byas pas gzhan las sna tshogs pa rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di byas pas gzhan las sna tshogs pa rnams gsungs pa /
translated: Having done this, the various other rites are taught.

original: de nas las zhes bya ba la sogs pas kyang de yang rtsa bar rab tu grags so //
analyzed: de nas las zhes bya ba la sogs pas kyang de yang rtsa bar rab tu grags so //
translated: Then, beginning with “the rite,” that is also well known in the root text.

original: de ltar rab tu sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar rab tu sbyor ba'o //
translated: Thus, it is applied.

original: de bzhin du gnyis pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du gnyis pa gsungs pa /
translated: Similarly, the second is taught.

original: sa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas te /
analyzed: sa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas te /
translated: Beginning with “the earth,”

original: mngal nas skyes pa'i srog chags kyi khyad par te sa'i lcug ma'o //🔽de ltar mkhas pas dus thams cad du rengs zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i chu skyes su g-yon pa'i ngos su aa wa dh'u @236a * //
analyzed: mngal nas skyes pa'i srog chags kyi khyad par te sa'i lcug ma'o // de ltar mkhas pas dus thams cad du rengs zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i chu skyes su g-yon pa'i ngos su aa wa dh'u @236a * //
translated: the special creature born from a womb is the earth creeper.

original: t'ir zhugs pas sa'i lcug mas byug pa byas pa ste til gyi mar ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: t'ir zhugs pas sa'i lcug mas byug pa byas pa ste til gyi mar ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: Thus, the wise one should always paralyze, that is, with the left lotus, on the left side, by entering into the avadhūti, with the earth creeper, the application of the ointment, the sesame oil, which is bodhicitta.

original: rang mthar gyi sgras rdo rje nor bu ste bsgrub bya'i sems rang gi sems kyis dus su mnyes pas thams cad rang bzhin gyis dbang du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dgongs pa'i don to//
analyzed: rang mthar gyi sgras rdo rje nor bu ste bsgrub bya'i sems rang gi sems kyis dus su mnyes pas thams cad rang bzhin gyis dbang du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dgongs pa'i don to//
translated: The meaning of the intended sense is that the mind to be subjugated, the vajra gem, is pleased by one's own mind at the proper time, and everything is naturally subjugated.

original: rab tu sbyor ba gzhan gsungs pa /
analyzed: rab tu sbyor ba gzhan gsungs pa /
translated: Another application is stated:

original: pa th'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: pa th'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: pāṭhā, etc.

original: rab tu sbyor ba bya ba ste des kyang ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab tu sbyor ba bya ba ste des kyang ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: The application is to be done, and by that, it will be as stated.

original: de'i sman rnams ni rab tu grags pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sman rnams ni rab tu grags pa'o //
translated: The medicines for that are well-known.

original: ra dza ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas bcud len gyi rab tu sbyor ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: ra dza ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas bcud len gyi rab tu sbyor ba gsungs pa /
translated: Rājani, etc. states the application of the elixir:

original: ra dza ni zhes bya ba ni yung ba nag po'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: ra dza ni zhes bya ba ni yung ba nag po'i khyad par ro //
translated: Rājani is a special type of black turmeric.

original: de ltar byas pas de de bzhin du gsungs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar byas pas de de bzhin du gsungs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: By doing that, it will be as stated.

original: 'on kyang dngul chu dang lhan cig bsdu bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni man ngag go //
analyzed: 'on kyang dngul chu dang lhan cig bsdu bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni man ngag go //
translated: However, it should be combined with mercury - this is the instruction.

original: de ltar sbyor ba mchog ces bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'i rdzas bsdu ba gtso bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ltar sbyor ba mchog ces bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'i rdzas bsdu ba gtso bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Thus, the so-called supreme union is the principal collection of various substances.

original: spre'u'i mchil ma zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: spre'u'i mchil ma zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i khyad par ro //
translated: The so-called monkey saliva is a special fruit.

original: rang gi dbang po yang dag ldan //
analyzed: rang gi dbang po yang dag ldan //
translated: Endowed with one's own organ.

original: zhes bya ba ni thog ma'i me tog dang ldan pa dang / 'dus pa las byung ba ste de dang yang dag par ldan pas bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thog ma'i me tog dang ldan pa dang / 'dus pa las byung ba ste de dang yang dag par ldan pas bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This means that it should be made in union with the initial flower and the assembled substances.🔽Without transformation and blood.

original: rnam 'gyur med pa dang ni khrag / ces bya ba ni rnam 'gyur med pa ni bya rgod kyi nor bu'o //
analyzed: rnam 'gyur med pa dang ni khrag / ces bya ba ni rnam 'gyur med pa ni bya rgod kyi nor bu'o //
translated: The so-called without transformation is the vulture gem.

original: tsandal'i'i bu mo'i thog ma'i khrag dang lhan cig byas nas sgrub pa pos /
analyzed: tsandal'i'i bu mo'i thog ma'i khrag dang lhan cig byas nas sgrub pa pos /
translated: Having made it together with the initial blood of the daughter of Candali, the practitioner

original: dur khrod chen por rigs pas rdo rje phag mo'i sngags kyis mi gang zhig mi mthong ste /
analyzed: dur khrod chen por rigs pas rdo rje phag mo'i sngags kyis mi gang zhig mi mthong ste /
translated: in a great charnel ground, with the mantra of Vajravarahi, should smear a man with it.

original: de reg pa tsam gyis mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de reg pa tsam gyis mi mthong ngo //
translated: By merely touching it, he becomes invisible.

original: phye ba zhes bya ba ni skyes bu'i gzugs spangs nas bya rgod kyi gzugs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phye ba zhes bya ba ni skyes bu'i gzugs spangs nas bya rgod kyi gzugs su 'gyur ro //
translated: The so-called opened means that, having abandoned the human form, one becomes a vulture form.

original: yang na rnam 'gyur med pa sna tshogs pa'i thod pa rnams su ras bal gyi sa bon rnams btab la thod pa gang yin pa de'i bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa yongs su bzung ste dbang bskur ba sbyin pa dang gtor ma dang bsrung ba la sogs pa
analyzed: yang na rnam 'gyur med pa sna tshogs pa'i thod pa rnams su ras bal gyi sa bon rnams btab la thod pa gang yin pa de'i bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa yongs su bzung ste dbang bskur ba sbyin pa dang gtor ma dang bsrung ba la sogs pa
translated: Or else, having planted cotton seeds in various skulls without holes, having taken up the five ambrosias, etc. of whichever skull, one should give the consecration, the sacrificial cake, protection, etc.

original: byas nas de'i thod pa'i steng gi ras bal blangs nas bu mos /
analyzed: byas nas de'i thod pa'i steng gi ras bal blangs nas bu mos /
