analyzed: bdun pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngon du bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas na de rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams kyis ston te /
translated: The seventh and so on and so forth. The letters of their samādhi and so on are explained by the samādhi of the bodhisattva branch of awakening that was previously explained.

original: ci'i don ston zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i don ston zhe na /
translated: If it is asked what meaning is explained,🔽in that way, first, the meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.

original: de ltar thog ma nyid du sa'i yi ge'i don gyis sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid dbus su zhes bya ba ste /🔽sems can thams cad kyi thog ma nyid rang gi sems gsad par bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar thog ma nyid du sa'i yi ge'i don gyis sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid dbus su zhes bya ba ste / sems can thams cad kyi thog ma nyid rang gi sems gsad par bya ste /
translated: The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.

original: thams cad kyi bdag nyid du gang gi tshe 'gyur ba ste brtan pa dang 'gro ba la sogs pa'i khyab pa por ro //
analyzed: thams cad kyi bdag nyid du gang gi tshe 'gyur ba ste brtan pa dang 'gro ba la sogs pa'i khyab pa por ro //
translated: The meaning of the letter of the stage is the thirty-seventh.🔽The meaning of the letter

original: de'i tshe sngon du bshad pa'i 'khor lo gnyis sum cu rtsa drug rnams kyi nang du rdo rje'i rlung lha'i rnam pa'i gzugs su bsgom par bya zhing 'dir thams cad bsad pa'i las rnams kyis ni sems pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i tshe sngon du bshad pa'i 'khor lo gnyis sum cu rtsa drug rnams kyi nang du rdo rje'i rlung lha'i rnam pa'i gzugs su bsgom par bya zhing 'dir thams cad bsad pa'i las rnams kyis ni sems pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: At that time, one should meditate on the vajra winds in the form of deities within the thirty-six channel-wheels explained previously. The meaning of “here, by all the killing rites, one should think” is that all of this is accomplished by mere imagination.

original: 'di byas pas phyi rol tu sdang ba'i sems can de rnams la bstan par bya bar gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di byas pas phyi rol tu sdang ba'i sems can de rnams la bstan par bya bar gsungs pa /
translated: Having done this, it is said that one should show this to the hostile beings outside.

original: gang gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “Whatever, whatever” and so on.

original: de rnams kyis byed pa ste bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis byed pa ste bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub po zhes bya'o //
translated: “By them” means that it is accomplished by mere imagination.

original: de ltar 'di rnams kyis bsad pa'i 'khrul 'khor bri'i de'i slar yang snag tsha gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar 'di rnams kyis bsad pa'i 'khrul 'khor bri'i de'i slar yang snag tsha gsungs pa /
translated: Having drawn the killing machine in this way, the ink is again taught.

original: dug ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dug ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “Poison” and so on.

original: rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: rtogs par sla'o //
translated: It is easy to understand.

original: gshin rje'i 'khrul 'khor @243a * //
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'khrul 'khor @243a * //
translated: The Yama machine

original: zhes bya ba ni ma he'i gzugs can la bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ma he'i gzugs can la bri bar bya'o //
translated: is drawn on the form of a buffalo.

original: de yang sngon du bshad pa ste /
analyzed: de yang sngon du bshad pa ste /
translated: That is also explained previously.

original: le'u tshe bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i bdag nyid can la'o //
analyzed: le'u tshe bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i bdag nyid can la'o //
translated: It has forty-nine squares.

original: de la sngags kyi phreng ba 'di dgong bar bya zhes bya ba ni sngags nyid phreng ba ste /
analyzed: de la sngags kyi phreng ba 'di dgong bar bya zhes bya ba ni sngags nyid phreng ba ste /
translated: Here, this rosary of mantras is the rosary itself, which is the mantra.

original: sngags kyi phreng ba ni gnod mdzes rgyal po'i'o ;
analyzed: sngags kyi phreng ba ni gnod mdzes rgyal po'i'o ;
translated: The rosary of mantras is that of Ucchusma.

original: / de ltar thog mar zhes bya ba ni re'u mig thog ma la ste rnam par snang mdzad ni yi ge aom mo //
analyzed: / de ltar thog mar zhes bya ba ni re'u mig thog ma la ste rnam par snang mdzad ni yi ge aom mo //
translated: Thus, first is in the first square, and Vairochana is the syllable OM.

original: rig byed dang po yang de nyid du /
analyzed: rig byed dang po yang de nyid du /
translated: The first Veda is also that.

original: lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: da ni rta rna ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni rta rna ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, he teaches the meditation of the wheel of the mandala of Hayagriva:

original: sa bon yi ge zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste rtogs sla'o ;
analyzed: sa bon yi ge zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste rtogs sla'o ;
translated: The seed syllable, etc. is easy to understand.

original: /'on kyang kun du spyod pa la sogs pas sngon du bshad pa'i rigs pas bsgom par bya ba ste /
analyzed: /'on kyang kun du spyod pa la sogs pas sngon du bshad pa'i rigs pas bsgom par bya ba ste /
translated: Nevertheless, one should meditate by the previously explained reasoning of the conduct, etc.

original: rdo rje phag mo'i gsum pa'i 'khrul 'khor sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnams su'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo'i gsum pa'i 'khrul 'khor sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnams su'o //
translated: In the third wheel of the mantra wheel of Vajravarahi's wheel of magic,

original: slar yang ngo mtshar zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor rnams kyi dang / de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i dpa' bo mtha' med pa spro zhing rab tu dga' ba thob pa rnams kyi rnam par dpyad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: slar yang ngo mtshar zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor rnams kyi dang / de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i dpa' bo mtha' med pa spro zhing rab tu dga' ba thob pa rnams kyi rnam par dpyad pa gsungs pa /
translated: Again, beginning with “astonished,” he declares the analysis of the retinue of yoginīs such as Vajravārāhī, and likewise, of the heroes such as Vajrapāṇi, who emanate infinitely, and attain supreme joy.

original: sems can shin tu bsam pa chung pa la sogs pa rnams la bltas nas des skrag ste /
analyzed: sems can shin tu bsam pa chung pa la sogs pa rnams la bltas nas des skrag ste /
translated: Looking at those sentient beings who are of very little thought, and so on, he is frightened by them.

original: 'ga' zhig gis thos pa dang bsam pa la sogs pa byas pas de bzhin du yang shes rab dman pas mi shes te phyin ci log gi lam de rnams su 'gro ba'i mu stegs can la sogs pa de rnams la bltas nas 'gyel te phyi ma'i dus su
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gis thos pa dang bsam pa la sogs pa byas pas de bzhin du yang shes rab dman pas mi shes te phyin ci log gi lam de rnams su 'gro ba'i mu stegs can la sogs pa de rnams la bltas nas 'gyel te phyi ma'i dus su
translated: Looking at those non-Buddhists, and so on, who go to those paths of error by means of the inferior insight that comes from hearing and contemplating, and so on, he falls down.

original: chud zos pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa gang gis byang chub mi thob pa ste shin tu rig pa'o //
analyzed: chud zos pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa gang gis byang chub mi thob pa ste shin tu rig pa'o //
translated: In the future, he will know the thoughts of those sentient beings who are wasting away and who will not attain enlightenment.

original: de'i phyir kye ma zhes bya ba la sogs pas mchog tu ngo mtshar ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi ste //
analyzed: de'i phyir kye ma zhes bya ba la sogs pas mchog tu ngo mtshar ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi ste //
translated: Therefore, “Alas!” and so on, with those who are endowed with supreme wonder.

original: tshul 'di zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'i mtshan nyid kyis te /
analyzed: tshul 'di zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'i mtshan nyid kyis te /
translated: “ This method” is by the characteristic of the explanation.

original: gang gis zhes bya ba ni de de bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: gang gis zhes bya ba ni de de bzhin du bshad do //
translated: “ By whom” is that which is explained in that way.

original: de ltar yid la bsam pa btang nas yid kyis ngo mtshar bskyed de /
analyzed: de ltar yid la bsam pa btang nas yid kyis ngo mtshar bskyed de /
translated: Thus, having given up mental consideration, mental wonder arises.

original: de'i tshe rang nyid la yid ches pa rnams kyis bdag gi shes pa des slar yang ding zhes bya ba la sogs pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe rang nyid la yid ches pa rnams kyis bdag gi shes pa des slar yang ding zhes bya ba la sogs pa de de bzhin no //
translated: At that time, those who have confidence in themselves, with that knowledge of mine, again say, “That is so!” and so on.

original: de nas dbus nas yang langs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas dbus nas yang langs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, “arising again from the middle” and so on.

original: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i de @243b bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa mtha' med cing mu med pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas ji lta ba bzhin zhu ba byed pa ste /
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i de @243b bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa mtha' med cing mu med pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas ji lta ba bzhin zhu ba byed pa ste /
translated: Having made offerings to all the tathāgatas, such as Vajrapāṇi, and to the bodhisattvas, and so on, without end or limit, they ask as follows.

original: bcom ldan 'das la bdag 'dri'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la bdag 'dri'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “ I ask the Bhagavān” and so on.

original: phyed dang bcas pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis so //
analyzed: phyed dang bcas pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis so //
translated: Two and a half verses.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: He says just that:

original: kye bcom ldan 'das bdag po khyab bdag ston pa ci yis bdag ces bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa dang dpa' bo thams cad gal te bdag cag 'bras bu dang rgyu'i rang bzhin du rnam par gzhag na de'i tshe khyed nyid gang gi rang
analyzed: kye bcom ldan 'das bdag po khyab bdag ston pa ci yis bdag ces bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa dang dpa' bo thams cad gal te bdag cag 'bras bu dang rgyu'i rang bzhin du rnam par gzhag na de'i tshe khyed nyid gang gi rang
translated: “O Lord, O Pervader, O Teacher, by what am I?”—Vajrapāṇi and so forth, all the heroes, if we are established in the nature of effect and cause, then at that time, what is your nature, O Lord, in which you are established?

original: bzhin du rnam par bzhag ces bdag gi the tshom yod de /
analyzed: bzhin du rnam par bzhag ces bdag gi the tshom yod de /
translated: I have this doubt.

original: 'dir ci la bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzhag ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dir ci la bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzhag ces bya ba ste /
translated: Here, what is the Blessed One established in?

original: dpyod pa thog ma'o //
analyzed: dpyod pa thog ma'o //
translated: This is the beginning of the analysis.

original: gnyis pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: gnyis pa gsungs pa /
translated: The second is stated:

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “If” and so forth.

original: gal te de srid khyed nyid bcom ldan 'das 'bras bu'i gzugs yin na de'i tshe ji ltar gsad pa de de ltar khyod nyid kyis 'dra bar gsungs pa 'di la the tshom yod do //
analyzed: gal te de srid khyed nyid bcom ldan 'das 'bras bu'i gzugs yin na de'i tshe ji ltar gsad pa de de ltar khyod nyid kyis 'dra bar gsungs pa 'di la the tshom yod do //
translated: If you are the Blessed One, the form of the effect, then at that time, how is it that you yourself have said that you are like the one to be killed? There is a doubt about this.

original: gsum pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: gsum pa gsungs pa /
translated: The third is stated:

original: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Or else, etc.

original: yang na bcom ldan 'das rgyu'i gzugs kyis rnam par gnas na 'bras bu'i gzugs kyis skyes bu ste /
analyzed: yang na bcom ldan 'das rgyu'i gzugs kyis rnam par gnas na 'bras bu'i gzugs kyis skyes bu ste /
translated: Or else, if the Blessed One abides in the form of the cause, then the form of the result is the person.

original: de'i tshe de rnams kyi ji ltar gsod par byed /
analyzed: de'i tshe de rnams kyi ji ltar gsod par byed /
translated: At that time, how do they kill?

original: 'di ni dgongs pa ste 'bras bu'i gzugs kyis chos kyi dbyings la zer ro //
analyzed: 'di ni dgongs pa ste 'bras bu'i gzugs kyis chos kyi dbyings la zer ro //
translated: This is the intention: the form of the result refers to the dharmadhatu.🔽The Blessed One, etc.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du de nyid rgyu'i gzugs kyis sprul pa'i sku'i bdag nyid kyi gzugs 'di ni skyes bu ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du de nyid rgyu'i gzugs kyis sprul pa'i sku'i bdag nyid kyi gzugs 'di ni skyes bu ste /
translated: In the same way, that very [dharmadhatu] in the form of the cause is the form of the emanation body. This is the person.

original: de'i tshe 'di rnams kyi ji ltar gsod pa la sbyor bar byed ;
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di rnams kyi ji ltar gsod pa la sbyor bar byed ;
translated: At that time, how do they engage in killing?

original: som nyi 'dis phyi rab kyi sems can rnams phyag na rdo rje thugs kyis gzigs nas the tshom dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: som nyi 'dis phyi rab kyi sems can rnams phyag na rdo rje thugs kyis gzigs nas the tshom dang bcas pa ste /
translated: By this doubt, future sentient beings, seeing Vajrapani with doubt,

original: gzhung 'di rnams bstan pas gsungs shig pa'o //
analyzed: gzhung 'di rnams bstan pas gsungs shig pa'o //
translated: speak of these passages as taught.

original: bdag gi zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje la chos ston pa'i dus su bdag po zhes bya ba ste bcom ldan 'das the tshom gsum sel ba'i lan gsum dris pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje la chos ston pa'i dus su bdag po zhes bya ba ste bcom ldan 'das the tshom gsum sel ba'i lan gsum dris pa'o //
translated: The phrase my own refers to Vajrapāṇi, who is the master at the time of teaching the Dharma, and the Blessed One asked him three times to resolve his doubts.

original: gsungs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi lan no //
analyzed: gsungs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi lan no //
translated: The Blessed One's response is indicated by the phrase he said, etc.,

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa la'o //
translated: and vajra refers to Vajrapāṇi and so on.

original: nyon zhes bya ba ni nyan pa la sbyor pa'o //🔽tshig ces bya ba ni nga'i tshig la rtse gcig pa'i @244a * //
analyzed: nyon zhes bya ba ni nyan pa la sbyor pa'o // tshig ces bya ba ni nga'i tshig la rtse gcig pa'i @244a * //
translated: The phrase listen well means to apply oneself to listening.

original: sems kyis so //
analyzed: sems kyis so //
translated: The phrase to my words means with a one-pointed mind.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: He himself said this:

original: 'bras bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The phrase the result, etc.,

original: las kyi rjes mthun zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: las kyi rjes mthun zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: refers to the various [results] such as pacification and so on,

original: yang na dkyil 'khor bri ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang na dkyil 'khor bri ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: or to the drawing of the maṇḍala and so on.

original: mdor nang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gang cung zad mig gi dbang po la sogs pas mthong ba'am len pa la sogs pa rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs des de dang 'dra ba'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis 'bras bur 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: mdor nang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gang cung zad mig gi dbang po la sogs pas mthong ba'am len pa la sogs pa rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs des de dang 'dra ba'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis 'bras bur 'gro ba ste /
translated: In brief, whatever is seen by the eye faculty, etc., in the world and beyond the world, or whatever is taken up, etc., by the eye faculty, etc., that form is the cause of the form of the result that is similar to it.

original: 'bras bu'i gzugs kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i gzugs kyi phyir ro //
translated: For the sake of the form of the result.

original: 'on kyang bdag bde ba thams cad kyi gnas zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i gzugs la sogs pa thams cad kyi rten ni chos kyi sku ste de'i yon tan nye bar spyod pa nyid pas bdag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang bdag bde ba thams cad kyi gnas zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i gzugs la sogs pa thams cad kyi rten ni chos kyi sku ste de'i yon tan nye bar spyod pa nyid pas bdag ces bya ba'o //
translated: However, the support of all the forms of the result, etc., is the Dharma Body, and it is called the self because it is the enjoyment of its qualities.

original: bde ba'i gnas zhes bya ba ni bde ba rnams kyi gzhi ni bde ba'i gnas te /
analyzed: bde ba'i gnas zhes bya ba ni bde ba rnams kyi gzhi ni bde ba'i gnas te /
translated: The basis of the blissful ones is the basis of the blissful ones.

original: bde ba thams cad ni lhan cig skyes pa la sogs pa la dmigs pa gang gi phyir de rnams kyis yang chos kyi sku'i rten gyis gzugs te de rnams kyi las kyi dbang gis dang / 'bras bu'i gzugs la sogs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs par 'gyur ba ste khyed phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa bzhin no //🔽de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin kyang ste las rnams ni 'bras bu la chos kyi sku'i rgyud bsgrubs pa gcig tu gyur cing gnyis su med pa rnams kyis sems spros pa dang bcas pa dang spros pa med pa dang bral bas rnam par gnas pa ni🔽sangs rgyas rnams so //
analyzed: bde ba thams cad ni lhan cig skyes pa la sogs pa la dmigs pa gang gi phyir de rnams kyis yang chos kyi sku'i rten gyis gzugs te de rnams kyi las kyi dbang gis dang / 'bras bu'i gzugs la sogs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs par 'gyur ba ste khyed phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa bzhin no // de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin kyang ste las rnams ni 'bras bu la chos kyi sku'i rgyud bsgrubs pa gcig tu gyur cing gnyis su med pa rnams kyis sems spros pa dang bcas pa dang spros pa med pa dang bral bas rnam par gnas pa ni sangs rgyas rnams so //
translated: All happiness is based on the innate, etc., because they are the support of the Dharma Body, i.e., the form of the Dharma Body. By the power of their karma, all form, etc., becomes the Buddha, the Bodhisattva, etc., just like you, Vajrapani, etc.

original: spyod pa dang po gsal ba'o //🔽gnyis pa'i gsungs pa ;🔽rgyud bcas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: spyod pa dang po gsal ba'o //🔽gnyis pa'i gsungs pa ;🔽rgyud bcas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Thus, the nature of cause and effect is also the same, i.e., the karma that is the cause of the effect is the Dharma Body. The karma that is the cause of the effect is the Dharma Body. original: dngos po thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa'i rgyu de'i rkyen mkhas pas las ni rkyen zhes bya ba ste gsad pa la sogs pa'i las bya ba ste /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa'i rgyu de'i rkyen mkhas pas las ni rkyen zhes bya ba ste gsad pa la sogs pa'i las bya ba ste /
translated: The cause of all things is nondual. The wise call that “the condition.” The action is the act of killing, etc.

original: des bcom ldan 'das 'bras bu'i gzugs kyis byas pa'i phyir de dang 'dra bar bshad de ;
analyzed: des bcom ldan 'das 'bras bu'i gzugs kyis byas pa'i phyir de dang 'dra bar bshad de ;
translated: Because it is done by the form of the result, the Bhagavān, it is explained as being like that.

original: gsad pa zhes bya ba ni rang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs nyid kyis so //
analyzed: gsad pa zhes bya ba ni rang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs nyid kyis so //
translated: “ Killing” is done by one’s own form of the Bhagavān.

original: 'di ni gang 'di'i dri ba gnyis pa gsal ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gang 'di'i dri ba gnyis pa gsal ba'o //
translated: This is the clarification of the second question here.

original: gsum pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: gsum pa gsungs pa /
translated: The third is stated:

original: dmag dpung zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dmag dpung zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “Army” and so on.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i bdag nyid can gyi skyes bu rnams kyi dpung ste g-yul @244b ngo la sogs pa'i bya ba ngan pa'i las chen po'i sa'i 'jig rten la bltas nas mkhas pa'i sbyor ba 'dzin pa rnams kyis de de'i tshe gnyis su med par bya ste des
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i bdag nyid can gyi skyes bu rnams kyi dpung ste g-yul @244b ngo la sogs pa'i bya ba ngan pa'i las chen po'i sa'i 'jig rten la bltas nas mkhas pa'i sbyor ba 'dzin pa rnams kyis de de'i tshe gnyis su med par bya ste des
translated: The wise who hold the application look at the world of the great action of evil deeds, such as the battle, of the beings who are of the nature of the Buddha’s body. At that time, they should make it nondual.

original: de ltar thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi sems rnam pa sna tshogs par 'gro ba'i don du bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi sems rnam pa sna tshogs par 'gro ba'i don du bya'o //
translated: Thus, the mind, which is the nature of all things, should be made to go in various ways for the sake of beings.

original: de'i phyir 'dir gsod pa dang mi ldan pa ste mi 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir gsod pa dang mi ldan pa ste mi 'gyur ba'am /
translated: Therefore, here, it is not killed, i.e., it does not change,

original: gal te 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gal te 'gyur ba'o //
translated: or, if it does change,

original: de'i tshe dmag dpung la sogs pa mthong bas 'dres pa'i gzugs kyis sems skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe dmag dpung la sogs pa mthong bas 'dres pa'i gzugs kyis sems skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: then, at that time, the mind arises with a mixed form, seeing the army, etc.

original: de yang so sor gsal bar gyur pa skyes bu la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnams kyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'brel ba rnams kyi gnyis su med pa rnams kyis bya'o //
analyzed: de yang so sor gsal bar gyur pa skyes bu la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnams kyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'brel ba rnams kyi gnyis su med pa rnams kyis bya'o //
translated: And that also should be made non-dual by the individual clear forms of the aspects of the person, etc., in the connection of cause and effect.

original: de ltar yang phyed dang bcas pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis gsal bar bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar yang phyed dang bcas pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis gsal bar bya ba gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, he states the clarification in three and a half verses:

original: bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa nas nges par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa nas nges par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: The self, etc. up to is ascertained.

original: de ltar sngar dang gzhan thams cad rtogs sla'o //
analyzed: de ltar sngar dang gzhan thams cad rtogs sla'o //
translated: Thus, all the rest is easy to understand.

original: 'on kyang gang bshad pa brjod par bya ba dang brjod pa'i mtshan nyid de thams cad rdo rje phag mo'i 'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang 'khor lo gsum par bya'o zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang gang bshad pa brjod par bya ba dang brjod pa'i mtshan nyid de thams cad rdo rje phag mo'i 'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang 'khor lo gsum par bya'o zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: However, all that is to be explained, the characteristics of the explanation, should be made into the three: the machine, the mantra, and the wheel of Vajravarahi.🔽This is the determination.

original: dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzings las rta rna ma'i lha mo rnams dang dpa' bo gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas gsad pa la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs ye shes nges pa'i tshig gis rim pa'i mtshan
analyzed: dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzings las rta rna ma'i lha mo rnams dang dpa' bo gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas gsad pa la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs ye shes nges pa'i tshig gis rim pa'i mtshan
translated: In the commentary on the great yoga tantra king of the glorious Ocean of Dakas, the Ship, the characteristics of the sequence of the words of wisdom of the assembly of actions such as killing by the union of the goddesses of Hayakarni with the heroes,

original: nyid dang yi ge'i don gyi ming rnams dang go cha'i sngags la sogs pas gshin rje'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid rgyas par bstan pa ste /
analyzed: nyid dang yi ge'i don gyi ming rnams dang go cha'i sngags la sogs pas gshin rje'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid rgyas par bstan pa ste /
translated: the characteristics of the rites of the wheel of the machine of Yama and the wheel of the mandala, and so on, by the armor mantra, and so on, and the names of the meanings of the syllables are extensively taught.

original: le'u bzhi bcu pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u bzhi bcu pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the fortieth chapter.

original: // / las kyi sbyor bas gnas pa mo //
analyzed: // / las kyi sbyor bas gnas pa mo //
translated: The one who abides by the application of action

original: bya gdong lha mor phyag byas nas //
analyzed: bya gdong lha mor phyag byas nas //
translated: Having bowed to the goddess with the face of a bird,

original: rlung dang rnam shes rnal 'byor mas //
analyzed: rlung dang rnam shes rnal 'byor mas //
translated: the yoginīs of wind and consciousness,

original: ma lus smyo bar byed pa dang ; / yi dags 'khor lo nyid lha mo //
analyzed: ma lus smyo bar byed pa dang ; / yi dags 'khor lo nyid lha mo //
translated: the one who maddens all, and the goddess of the yāma circle,

original: kun rdzob bden pa'i gzugs can ma /
analyzed: kun rdzob bden pa'i gzugs can ma /
translated: having the form of conventional truth,

original: de yi 'grel pa rtogs byed pa //
analyzed: de yi 'grel pa rtogs byed pa //
translated: the one who is to be understood as its commentary,

original: 'dod pa kun ster bdag gis bshad //
analyzed: 'dod pa kun ster bdag gis bshad //
translated: I, the bestower of all desires, will explain.

original: da ni bya gdong ma'i le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni bya gdong ma'i le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the explanation of the forty-first chapter is stated:

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, etc.

original: @245a * // rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i'o //
analyzed: @245a * // rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i'o //
translated: The application is the one to be explained.

original: thams cad ces bya ba ni sems can thams cad smyo bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni sems can thams cad smyo bar byed pa ste /
translated: All means all sentient beings are maddened.

original: rnyed dka' ba ni gang gis de ltar lam bzang por rab tu 'jug cing lam ngan pa spong ba ste /
analyzed: rnyed dka' ba ni gang gis de ltar lam bzang por rab tu 'jug cing lam ngan pa spong ba ste /
translated: Difficult to attain is that by which one enters the good path and abandons the bad path,

original: sems can thams cad kyi dbyug pa la sogs pas sna tshogs pa'i sdug bsngal ster ba po nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dbyug pa la sogs pas sna tshogs pa'i sdug bsngal ster ba po nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the giver of the various sufferings of all sentient beings with sticks and so forth.

original: de ltar gang gis bsgrub par bya zhe na /🔽gsungs pa // bya gdong ma yi rab sbyor bas //
analyzed: de ltar gang gis bsgrub par bya zhe na / gsungs pa // bya gdong ma yi rab sbyor bas //
translated: If it is asked, By what means is that accomplished?🔽it is said:

original: zhes bya ba ste /🔽de bzhin du /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste / de bzhin du /
translated: By the practice of the bird-faced one.

original: brtson 'grus byang chub yan lag chos //
analyzed: brtson 'grus byang chub yan lag chos //
translated: Thus, The quality of diligence is the limb of awakening,

original: zhes bya ba dang / hi ma la ya zhes bya ba'i mdor bstan pa'i tshig rnams kyi yi ge rnams kyi bsgrub par bya ba yang ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / hi ma la ya zhes bya ba'i mdor bstan pa'i tshig rnams kyi yi ge rnams kyi bsgrub par bya ba yang ste /
translated: and the words of the brief explanation of the Himalaya, the syllables of the practice,

original: de rnams bshad par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams bshad par bya ba'o //
translated: are to be explained.

original: mdor bsdus pa'i zhes bya ba ni nyung du bsdus pa ste rgyud gzhan rnams su ni rgya che ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa'i zhes bya ba ni nyung du bsdus pa ste rgyud gzhan rnams su ni rgya che ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The brief is the concise few, because in other tantras it is extensive.

original: de ltar slar yang gang du bsgom par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar slar yang gang du bsgom par bya zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, Where is that again to be cultivated?🔽it is said:

original: gsungs pa / lte ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / lte ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: at the navel, and so on.

original: 'khor lo'i gtso mo zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i gtso mo zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: The wheel mistress is the nature of the maṇḍala wheel that will be explained.

original: da ni yi ge re re'i rgyas par bshad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni yi ge re re'i rgyas par bshad pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the extensive explanation of each syllable is stated:

original: mkha' gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: mkha' gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: the space form, and so on.

original: kha'i yi ge'i don te thog ma nyid du kha g'a na n'a yis so //
analyzed: kha'i yi ge'i don te thog ma nyid du kha g'a na n'a yis so //
translated: The meaning of the syllable KHA is the beginning itself, with KHA GA NA NA.

original: de ltar bdag nyid mkha'i gzugs te /
analyzed: de ltar bdag nyid mkha'i gzugs te /
translated: Thus, one's own nature is the form of space.

original: pho nya zhes bya ba ni 'dir pho nya'i sgras rang gis rig pa 'bab pa'i rtsa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa spangs pa 'dis nam mkha'i gzugs kyi bdag nyid du gnas so //
analyzed: pho nya zhes bya ba ni 'dir pho nya'i sgras rang gis rig pa 'bab pa'i rtsa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa spangs pa 'dis nam mkha'i gzugs kyi bdag nyid du gnas so //
translated: The so-called messenger here is the downward-voiding channel, which is grasped by the word messenger. This is free from the aspects of subject and object. One abides in the nature of the form of space.

original: gang gi tshe de'i tshe rkan dang rdo rje chu skyes dbus su zhes bya ba ni rab sbyor ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de'i tshe rkan dang rdo rje chu skyes dbus su zhes bya ba ni rab sbyor ba gsungs pa /
translated: When that is the case, in the middle of the palate and the vajra lotus, this is the statement of the practice.

original: rkan ni mgo bo'i dbus te /
analyzed: rkan ni mgo bo'i dbus te /
translated: The palate is in the middle of the head.

original: rdo rje chu skyes kyi dbus su zhes bya ba ni lnga pa'i don gyi gnyis pa ste rdo rje dang chu skyes kyi dbus nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje chu skyes kyi dbus su zhes bya ba ni lnga pa'i don gyi gnyis pa ste rdo rje dang chu skyes kyi dbus nas so //
translated: In the middle of the vajra lotus is the second of the fifth case, meaning from the middle of the vajra and lotus.

original: steng du bskyod ces bya ba la sogs pa shin tu phra ba'i rnam par shes pa dang rlung gis byang chub kyi sems kyis so//
analyzed: steng du bskyod ces bya ba la sogs pa shin tu phra ba'i rnam par shes pa dang rlung gis byang chub kyi sems kyis so//
translated: The statement arousing upward and so on is the extremely subtle consciousness and wind of bodhicitta.

original: lhan cig ces bya ba ni 'di dang de ltar ldan pa gsungs pa //
analyzed: lhan cig ces bya ba ni 'di dang de ltar ldan pa gsungs pa //
translated: Together is the statement of being endowed with this and that.

original: lus zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: lus zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The body, etc.

original: g'a'i yi ge'i don gyis te /
analyzed: g'a'i yi ge'i don gyis te /
translated: The meaning of the syllable ga is:

original: lus ni 'dar bar bya zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lus ni 'dar bar bya zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The body is to be made to tremble,

original: des de'i dus su mda'i shugs kyis gyen du bskyod pa ste rang gi sems kyi sbyor bas lus thams cad 'dar @245b bar bya ste /
analyzed: des de'i dus su mda'i shugs kyis gyen du bskyod pa ste rang gi sems kyi sbyor bas lus thams cad 'dar @245b bar bya ste /
translated: by which, at that time, it is shaken upward by the force of the arrow, and the entire body is made to tremble by the application of one's mind.

original: des de ltar mi 'pho ba ste /
analyzed: des de ltar mi 'pho ba ste /
translated: By that, it is not emitted,

original: drag shul sbyor ba'i bya bas so //
analyzed: drag shul sbyor ba'i bya bas so //
translated: by the action of the fierce yoga.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
translated: This is the meaning of the word.

original: de ltar bya zhes bya ba ni goms par gyur bas rtag tu dus thams cad du'o //
analyzed: de ltar bya zhes bya ba ni goms par gyur bas rtag tu dus thams cad du'o //
translated: Thus, one should do means that, through practice, at all times,

original: rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mchog tu zag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mchog tu zag pa med pa'o //
translated: the yogi, the best of yogis, is without outflows.

original: phyi rol tu rtsed mo'i dus su yang 'pho ba med pa 'grub ste /
analyzed: phyi rol tu rtsed mo'i dus su yang 'pho ba med pa 'grub ste /
translated: Even externally, at the time of play, non-emission is accomplished.

original: de rnams ni g-yo min zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams ni g-yo min zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Those are the non-wavering, etc.

original: na'i yi ge'i don gyis gsal bar gsungs pa /
analyzed: na'i yi ge'i don gyis gsal bar gsungs pa /
translated: The meaning of the syllable na is clearly stated:

original: ji srid rnal 'byor pa mi 'dod kyi bar du ste bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mgo bo'i dbus nas rlung dang rnam par shes pa rnams kyis mi g-yo ba de srid du rab tu 'bab pa ste /
analyzed: ji srid rnal 'byor pa mi 'dod kyi bar du ste bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mgo bo'i dbus nas rlung dang rnam par shes pa rnams kyis mi g-yo ba de srid du rab tu 'bab pa ste /
translated: As long as the yogi does not desire, i.e., as long as the concentration described does not cause the winds and consciousnesses to be unmoving from the center of the head, so long it is “descending.🔽”

original: skad cig nas brtsams nas lo stong phrag la sogs par ro //
analyzed: skad cig nas brtsams nas lo stong phrag la sogs par ro //
translated: Beginning from the moment, for a thousand years, etc.

original: brgya la zhig na rnal 'byor pa rang gi 'dod pa'am mi 'dod pas mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brgya la zhig na rnal 'byor pa rang gi 'dod pa'am mi 'dod pas mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If at some time the yogi desires or does not desire, the characteristics will arise.

original: de 'khrul pa ste sna zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de 'khrul pa ste sna zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: That is the error.

original: na'i yi ge'i don gyis 'chad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: na'i yi ge'i don gyis 'chad pa gsungs pa /
translated: The meaning of the syllable ni is explained:

original: de ltar sna'i bu gar son pa'i srog ces bya ba ni rkan du rnam par 'khor ba las yang 'ongs pa'i srog go //
analyzed: de ltar sna'i bu gar son pa'i srog ces bya ba ni rkan du rnam par 'khor ba las yang 'ongs pa'i srog go //
translated: Thus the life-force that has reached the aperture of the nose, i.e., the life-force that has come from the circulation in the palate,

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: why is that?

original: lte ba'i dbus su g-yo ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lte ba'i dbus su g-yo ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It moves in the center of the navel.

original: rdo rje'i lam nas lte ba'i bar du 'ong ba gang gi tshe lte ba'i gnas su kun du 'pho ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje'i lam nas lte ba'i bar du 'ong ba gang gi tshe lte ba'i gnas su kun du 'pho ba ste /
translated: When it comes from the vajra path to the navel, it moves in the place of the navel.

original: rnam par 'pho ba las zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: rnam par 'pho ba las zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i dbye bas so //
translated: The phrase from the transference means from the division into left and right.

original: de'i phyir mnyam par rab tu 'bab pa'i dus su bya'o zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir mnyam par rab tu 'bab pa'i dus su bya'o zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said, at the time of the even flow, which is a determination.

original: de gsal bar bya ba'i don du gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsal bar bya ba'i don du gsungs pa /
translated: In order to clarify that, it is said:

original: lte ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: lte ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: navel and so on.

original: de de bzhin du gsungs so //
analyzed: de de bzhin du gsungs so //
translated: That is stated as it is.

original: de ltar byas pas cir 'gyur ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar byas pas cir 'gyur ba gsungs pa /
translated: What happens by doing that is stated:

original: 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: wheel and so on.

original: rlung dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i glen pa'i dngos por smyo ba bzhin du 'khor ba ste /
analyzed: rlung dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i glen pa'i dngos por smyo ba bzhin du 'khor ba ste /
translated: The consciousness along with the wind, like a drunkard, circles.

original: des de'i dus zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste dngos po thams cad mthong ba ni rkang gnyis la sogs pa de dang 'dra bar sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: des de'i dus zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste dngos po thams cad mthong ba ni rkang gnyis la sogs pa de dang 'dra bar sgrub par byed do //
translated: By that, it is said, at that time and so on. Seeing all things, like the two feet and so on, is accomplished.

original: lhag ma ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as it is.

original: slar yang de ltar rnal 'byor hi ma la ya'i yi ge rnams kyis sngon gyi sbyor ba de nyid kyi nye bar spyod pa bstan pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: slar yang de ltar rnal 'byor hi ma la ya'i yi ge rnams kyis sngon gyi sbyor ba de nyid kyi nye bar spyod pa bstan pa gsungs pa /
translated: Again, in this way, the yogī, by means of the syllables of the Himālayas, teaches the enjoyment of that very prior union.

original: hi yig ces bya ba la sogs pas te //
analyzed: hi yig ces bya ba la sogs pas te //
translated: He says, “The syllable hi,” and so on.

original: 'phyang ba'i ye shes zhes bya ba ni rkan gyi dbus su ye shes @246a * //
analyzed: 'phyang ba'i ye shes zhes bya ba ni rkan gyi dbus su ye shes @246a * //
translated: “The knowledge that hangs” is the knowledge in the middle of the palate.

original: aa wa dh'u t'i hi'i yi ge'i rnam pa dang n'a da'i gzugs kyis te /
analyzed: aa wa dh'u t'i hi'i yi ge'i rnam pa dang n'a da'i gzugs kyis te /
translated: In the form of the syllable hi of the avadhūti and in the form of nāda,

original: der rlung dang rnam par shes pa 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: der rlung dang rnam par shes pa 'gro ba'o //
translated: the winds and consciousness go there.

original: de ltar rab tu sbyor ba dpa' bo rang gis mngon sum du ste rlung dang rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid pas gsungs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar rab tu sbyor ba dpa' bo rang gis mngon sum du ste rlung dang rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid pas gsungs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, the hero who practices this directly himself, by means of the nature of the winds and consciousness, is said to be “the speaker.”

original: de bzhin du ma'i yi ge'i gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du ma'i yi ge'i gsungs pa /
translated: In the same way, the syllable ma is the speaker.

original: ma yig rang gis rig bzhes bya ba ni bdag nyid nam mkha'i gzugs skyes te de nyid pho nya ste rang gis rig pa'i bdag nyid sngon gyi'o //
analyzed: ma yig rang gis rig bzhes bya ba ni bdag nyid nam mkha'i gzugs skyes te de nyid pho nya ste rang gis rig pa'i bdag nyid sngon gyi'o //
translated: “The syllable ma is known by oneself” means that one is born in the form of space and is the very same messenger, known by oneself, as before.

original: de'i phyir / bdag nyid rnam pa'i go 'phang gnas //
analyzed: de'i phyir / bdag nyid rnam pa'i go 'phang gnas //
translated: Therefore, “one abides in the state of the form.”

original: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kyang ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kyang ngo //
translated: This is the meaning of the words.

original: de'i phyir thim pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dang ya'i yi ge gnyis kyi don gyis te /
analyzed: de'i phyir thim pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dang ya'i yi ge gnyis kyi don gyis te /
translated: Therefore, “dissolves” and so forth, by the meaning of the two “and” syllables.

original: sngon gyi rdo rje dang chu skyes kyi dbus su longs spyod do //
analyzed: sngon gyi rdo rje dang chu skyes kyi dbus su longs spyod do //
translated: In the middle of the previous vajra and lotus, one enjoys.

original: rkan gyi dbus su thim pa ste /
analyzed: rkan gyi dbus su thim pa ste /
translated: In the middle of the palate, it dissolves.

original: de cis na mchog tu zag pa med pa'i bde ba'i rnam pa'i gzugs su rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral pa'i rtog pa'i bar 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: de cis na mchog tu zag pa med pa'i bde ba'i rnam pa'i gzugs su rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral pa'i rtog pa'i bar 'gro ba ste /
translated: By what? By the form of supreme, uncontaminated bliss, free from all conceptuality, up to the conceptual thought.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku zhes bya ba ni sngon du glen par gyur pa'i smyon pa'i 'du shes kyis so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku zhes bya ba ni sngon du glen par gyur pa'i smyon pa'i 'du shes kyis so //
translated: The “buddha body” is due to the previous perception of a madman.

original: rnam par shes pa rlung dang bcas pa'i rgyus der thim pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs sku 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rlung dang bcas pa'i rgyus der thim pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs sku 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By the cause of consciousness together with the wind, it dissolves there, and the form body of the buddha body goes. This is the meaning of the words.

original: de ltar zad pas ci byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar zad pas ci byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: What is the use of that dissolution?

original: rang gis rig pa'i bdag nyid rig pa'i sems can rnams kyi lam 'di 'dra ba bstan pa byas pas sems can de rnams kyi don byas pa'i nges pas de'i tshe byang chub kyi yul rnams su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: rang gis rig pa'i bdag nyid rig pa'i sems can rnams kyi lam 'di 'dra ba bstan pa byas pas sems can de rnams kyi don byas pa'i nges pas de'i tshe byang chub kyi yul rnams su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'o //
translated: Having taught this path to sentient beings who are of the nature of self-awareness, one has done what is to be done for those sentient beings, and at that time one goes to the fields of enlightenment and passes into parinirvāṇa.

original: de ltar sbyor ba rnams kyi dang por ci bsgom par bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar sbyor ba rnams kyi dang por ci bsgom par bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, for those who are engaged in this way, it is said that one should first meditate on what is to be meditated upon, and so forth.

original: bdun zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /🔽las kyi rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba ni bya gdong ma smyo ba'i las byed pa mo'am /
analyzed: bdun zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste / las kyi rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba ni bya gdong ma smyo ba'i las byed pa mo'am /
translated: Seven, etc.

original: rnal 'byor ma las rnams sgrub pa mo'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma las rnams sgrub pa mo'o //
translated: The “yoginī of action” is the one who performs the action of the intoxicated face of the bird, or the yoginī who accomplishes the actions.

original: lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: da ni 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo gsungs pa //
analyzed: da ni 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo gsungs pa //
translated: Now, the wheel of the machine is explained:

original: 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “Machine,” etc.

original: ji ltar sngon gyi rjes mthun pa //
analyzed: ji ltar sngon gyi rjes mthun pa //
translated: Just as before,

original: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar sngon du bshad pa'i dum bu gcig gis dman pa lnga bcu'i bdag nyid can du de rnams rab tu bshad par bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar sngon du bshad pa'i dum bu gcig gis dman pa lnga bcu'i bdag nyid can du de rnams rab tu bshad par bya ba'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the fifty-one parts as previously explained.

original: yi dags kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni khyi'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ram de'i rnam pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: yi dags kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni khyi'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ram de'i rnam pa nyid kyis so //
translated: The wheel of the hungry ghosts is because of the nature of the dog or because of its form.

original: sngags @246b kyi phreng ba ni gnod mdzes rgyal po'i sngags te de rnams dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: sngags @246b kyi phreng ba ni gnod mdzes rgyal po'i sngags te de rnams dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The mantra garland is the mantra of Sumbha-rāja. One should arrange them means

original: ji ltar yongs su rim pas so //
analyzed: ji ltar yongs su rim pas so //
translated: as they are in the order.

original: thog ma zhes bya ba re'u mig thog ma ste /
analyzed: thog ma zhes bya ba re'u mig thog ma ste /
translated: The first means the first square.

original: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba ni aom gyi yi ge'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba ni aom gyi yi ge'o //
translated: Vairocana is the letter Oṃ.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni mbha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni mbha'i yi ge'o //
translated: That itself is the letter Mbh.

original: rig byed dang po ni yi ge aom mo //
analyzed: rig byed dang po ni yi ge aom mo //
translated: The first Veda is the letter Oṃ.

original: lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: da ni 'khrul 'khor drug rnams kyi bar skabs su rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid dang 'gros kyi rnam par gzhag pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni 'khrul 'khor drug rnams kyi bar skabs su rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid dang 'gros kyi rnam par gzhag pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in the middle of the six maṇḍalas, the arrangement of the nature, characteristics, and movements is stated:

original: chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste yi dags ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la rgyu ba'i rnam pa nyid kyi khyi'o //🔽ro ni yi dgas 'byung po nyid pas te lam nye bar spyod pas so //
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste yi dags ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la rgyu ba'i rnam pa nyid kyi khyi'o // ro ni yi dgas 'byung po nyid pas te lam nye bar spyod pas so //
translated: The Dharma and so on are the ghosts, since they move in the nature of the dharmadhatu.

original: gshin rje rtog pa za bas so //
analyzed: gshin rje rtog pa za bas so //
translated: The corpse is the ghost, since it is the source of the bhutas, and it is the path, since it is the object of practice.🔽Yama is the conceptualizer, since he devours the conceptualizations.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la sogs pa de rnams za ba'i phyir 'dir de lta'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la sogs pa de rnams za ba'i phyir 'dir de lta'i rigs pas so //
translated: Since he devours the conceptualizations of the five aggregates and so on, he is the conceptualizer.

original: rta yang gnas dang gnas min par //
analyzed: rta yang gnas dang gnas min par //
translated: The horse is the non-place and place.

original: zhes bya ba ni thams cad du de ltar rim gyis ma yin par spyod pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thams cad du de ltar rim gyis ma yin par spyod pa ste /
translated: The horse is the non-place and place, since it moves everywhere in a non-sequential manner.

original: sna tshogs pa'i rtsa rnams su des gnas la sogs par 'gro ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i rtsa rnams su des gnas la sogs par 'gro ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it moves in the various channels as the place and so on.

original: rdo rje snying po'i byang chub kyis //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po'i byang chub kyis //
translated: The vajra essence is the enlightenment.

original: zhes bya ba ni snying po ni rdo rje'i tshul te mchog tu zag pa med pa la sogs pa'i ye shes de 'dis rab tu rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snying po ni rdo rje'i tshul te mchog tu zag pa med pa la sogs pa'i ye shes de 'dis rab tu rtogs pa ste /
translated: The essence is the vajra way, and this is the supreme, uncontaminated and so on, gnosis.

original: gang zhig gis byang chub kyis te de de bzhin du bshad do //🔽klu zhes bya ba ni klu'i 'khrul 'khor te de'i ji ltar 'khyogs pa nyid kyis bgrod pa ste de bzhin du skye 'gro thams cad theg pa chen po la gnas pa rnams kyis shin tu phra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khams kyis 'gro ba dang
analyzed: gang zhig gis byang chub kyis te de de bzhin du bshad do // klu zhes bya ba ni klu'i 'khrul 'khor te de'i ji ltar 'khyogs pa nyid kyis bgrod pa ste de bzhin du skye 'gro thams cad theg pa chen po la gnas pa rnams kyis shin tu phra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khams kyis 'gro ba dang
translated: He who is enlightened, i.e., who has the nature of enlightenment, is so described.🔽A naga is a magical creation of a naga; it is a path that is crooked, and in the same way, all living beings are on the Great Vehicle, and they go to all the subtle Buddha-fields by means of the element.

original: 'jug pa'o // ro langs zhes bya ba ni ro langs kyi 'khrul 'khor 'chad par 'gyur ba nyid kyis te de'i dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'dres pa'i las rnams su 'gro zhing 'gro bar gyur pas /
analyzed: 'jug pa'o // ro langs zhes bya ba ni ro langs kyi 'khrul 'khor 'chad par 'gyur ba nyid kyis te de'i dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'dres pa'i las rnams su 'gro zhing 'gro bar gyur pas /
translated: A zombie is a magical creation of a zombie; it is a path that is a mixture of virtue and nonvirtue, and in the same way, all living beings are on the Great Vehicle, and they go to all the subtle Buddha-fields by means of the element.

original: de'i tshe sems can de rnams slu bas rtags brtan pa dang ye shes kyi sems so //
analyzed: de'i tshe sems can de rnams slu bas rtags brtan pa dang ye shes kyi sems so //
translated: At that time, those beings are deceived, and their minds are firm in the signs and in the gnosis.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas gzhan gyi 'khrul 'khor rnams theg pa gsum la sogs pas de de bzhin du bshad pa ste lhag ma sngon bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas gzhan gyi 'khrul 'khor rnams theg pa gsum la sogs pas de de bzhin du bshad pa ste lhag ma sngon bzhin no //
translated: The other is the other machines explained in the following order, which are explained in that way by the three vehicles, etc., and the rest is as before.

original: de ltar yang rdo rje phag mo'i bzhi pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnams su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang rdo rje phag mo'i bzhi pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnams su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: Thus, it should be understood in the wheels of the machine of Vajravarahi's fourth [seal], and this is the conclusion.

original: @247a * // dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzings las /
analyzed: @247a * // dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzings las /
translated: In the commentary on the great king of yoginl tantras, the glorious Ocean of Dakas,

analyzed: bya gdong ma'i ming gi yi ge la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes su gnas pas smyo bar byed pa'i rab tu sbyor ba dang sangs rgyas kyi gnas skabs bsgrubs pa dang de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa dang yi dags
translated: the wisdom nature endowed with the syllables of the name of the bird-faced [dakinis] and so forth, abiding as the wisdom of insanity, the practice of insanity, the accomplishment of the state of buddhahood, and likewise the meditation of the mandala circle, the mandala of the dakinis, the mandala of the heroes, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and dakinis, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes and heroines, the mandala of the heroes

original: kyi 'gros kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang khyad par du byed pa 'khrul 'khor rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa byed pa'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin rgyas par bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: kyi 'gros kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang khyad par du byed pa 'khrul 'khor rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa byed pa'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin rgyas par bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: The nature of the characteristics of the rite of the cakra of the machine of the gait of the goose, and in particular, the machine, is explained extensively.

original: // /'khor shugs ma la phyag byas nas //
analyzed: // /'khor shugs ma la phyag byas nas //
translated: Having bowed to the goose-gaited one,

original: dge ba bsgom pa bshad bya ste //🔽rengs pa'i don gyi las rnams kyi //
analyzed: dge ba bsgom pa bshad bya ste // rengs pa'i don gyi las rnams kyi //
translated: the cultivation of virtue is explained.🔽The machine of the gait of the nāgas is

original: 'khrul 'khor klu yi 'gros de bzhin //
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor klu yi 'gros de bzhin //
translated: the same as the rites of the purpose of immobilization.

original: ye shes bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: ye shes bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin te //
translated: The nature of the nectar of wisdom

original: rnal 'byor ye shes rnam spel ba //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ye shes rnam spel ba //
translated: increases the wisdom of yoga.

original: tha snyad don du de'i 'grel pa //
analyzed: tha snyad don du de'i 'grel pa //
translated: The commentary on that for the purpose of convention

original: chen po bdag gis bshad par bya //
analyzed: chen po bdag gis bshad par bya //
translated: is explained by me, the great one.

original: da ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'i rengs pa'i las la sogs pa le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'i rengs pa'i las la sogs pa le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the explanation of the forty-second chapter is stated, beginning with the rites of immobilization of the goose-gaited one.

original: de nas brang 'gro'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nas brang 'gro'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Then, the chapter called “The Cakra of the Goose”

original: brang 'gro ni klu'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: brang 'gro ni klu'i rnam pa'o //
translated: is the form of the nāgas.

original: 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rengs pa'i las rnams su'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rengs pa'i las rnams su'o //
translated: “Wheel” refers to the activities of immobilization that will be explained.

original: 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'chad pa ste ji lta ba'i rim pas so //
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'chad pa ste ji lta ba'i rim pas so //
translated: The “wheel of the machine” is explained as being in the order of the [above] explanation.

original: gang gi rab tu sbyor bas 'chad par gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gi rab tu sbyor bas 'chad par gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that by the application of which [the wheel of the machine] is explained.

original: 'khor shugs ma yi rab sbyor bas //
analyzed: 'khor shugs ma yi rab sbyor bas //
translated: The application of the wheel of the machine

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: is explained as follows.🔽The meaning of each of these letters is as follows:

original: 'di rnams kyi yi ge so so'i don gyis dang de bzhin du pre ta pu ri'i 'di rnams dang dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi don gyis te /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi yi ge so so'i don gyis dang de bzhin du pre ta pu ri'i 'di rnams dang dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi don gyis te /
translated: and likewise, the meaning of these pretapuris is “joy,” which is the meaning of the branch of enlightenment of joy.

original: de la sogs pa rengs par bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la sogs pa rengs par bya ba gsungs pa /
translated: Immobilization is taught to be like this, and so forth.

original: byis pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: byis pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “All childish beings” is said.

original: byis pa'i rigs can tha mal par skyes pa rnams kyi rmongs pa nang dang nang du rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ma byas pa de'i dus su byung ba rnams kyi de ltar rengs par byed pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: byis pa'i rigs can tha mal par skyes pa rnams kyi rmongs pa nang dang nang du rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ma byas pa de'i dus su byung ba rnams kyi de ltar rengs par byed pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The delusion of ordinary beings born in the class of childish beings, the samadhi of yogis that is not performed, and those that arise at that time—immobilization is like that in two ways.

original: gcig ni bshad pa'i las kyis bskyed pa rnams kyi sngon du mthong ba la sogs pa'i las rnams byed pa'o //
analyzed: gcig ni bshad pa'i las kyis bskyed pa rnams kyi sngon du mthong ba la sogs pa'i las rnams byed pa'o //
translated: One is the function of the karma that is generated by the act of explanation, which is the performance of the acts of seeing and so on.

original: gnyis pa ni de'i dus su rnam @247b par chad pa rnams kyi bskyed pa'i rgyur nang gi bdag nyid kyi las rnams so //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni de'i dus su rnam @247b par chad pa rnams kyi bskyed pa'i rgyur nang gi bdag nyid kyi las rnams so //
translated: The second is the function of the internal self that is the cause of the generation of the acts that are cut off at that time.

original: des de ltar mngon sum du sngon gyi las can rnams kyis sdang ba'i sems can rnams la dran pas de ltar byed do //
analyzed: des de ltar mngon sum du sngon gyi las can rnams kyis sdang ba'i sems can rnams la dran pas de ltar byed do //
translated: Thus, by the power of the direct perception of the karma of the past, the angry sentient beings are remembered and acted upon in that way.

original: 'dir yang 'khor los sgyur sogs zhes bya ba ni rgyal po rnams sam rgyal po'i blon po rnams kyi dpung dag gis g-yul ngor mngon par phyogs pas bltas nas der rengs pa'i las byed pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang 'khor los sgyur sogs zhes bya ba ni rgyal po rnams sam rgyal po'i blon po rnams kyi dpung dag gis g-yul ngor mngon par phyogs pas bltas nas der rengs pa'i las byed pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Here also, the “wheel-turning kings and so on” are the armies of the kings or the king’s ministers, who, facing the battlefield, look and perform the act of immobilizing there.

original: 'khrul 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir rdzas rnams gsungs pa /🔽yung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas te /
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir rdzas rnams gsungs pa / yung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas te /
translated: The substances for drawing the maṇḍala are stated:🔽“The ink is made from human bone,” and so on.

original: mi la sogs pa'i thod pa'i te de de bzhin du bshad do//
analyzed: mi la sogs pa'i thod pa'i te de de bzhin du bshad do//
translated: The skull of a human and so on is explained as follows.

original: da ni yi ge re re'i rab tu sbyor ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni yi ge re re'i rab tu sbyor ba gsungs pa /
translated: Now he teaches the application of each syllable.

original: spyod ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: spyod ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The meaning of the word conduct and so forth is as follows.

original: thog ma nyid du rtsa'i yi ge'i don gyis te /
analyzed: thog ma nyid du rtsa'i yi ge'i don gyis te /
translated: First, by the meaning of the syllable of the nāḍī,

original: lte ba'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i 'og rtsa'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: lte ba'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i 'og rtsa'i gnas su'o //
translated: below the navel means in the location of the nāḍī below the navel.

original: phyed bcas gsum zhes bya ba ni phyed dang bcas pa gsum ro langs kyi rnam pa'i gzugs kyi bdag nyid can 'khyil pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: phyed bcas gsum zhes bya ba ni phyed dang bcas pa gsum ro langs kyi rnam pa'i gzugs kyi bdag nyid can 'khyil pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: Three and a half means three and a half, which is the form of the nature of a zombie, the form of a coil.

original: der dus thams cad du srog rgyu'o //
analyzed: der dus thams cad du srog rgyu'o //
translated: The life force always moves there.

original: der gnas nas thams cad du 'gro bas de'i 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rengs par byed de g-yo ba med pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: der gnas nas thams cad du 'gro bas de'i 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rengs par byed de g-yo ba med pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since one goes everywhere by abiding there, the coming and going there is arrested, meaning that it does not move.

original: de'i rab tu sbyor ba'i sgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i rab tu sbyor ba'i sgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: The practice of that application is explained.

original: rim pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rim pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The syllables of the word stage and so forth are as follows.

original: sgra'i yi ge'i don gyis te //
analyzed: sgra'i yi ge'i don gyis te //
translated: By the meaning of the syllable of the word,

original: rim gyis dbugs ni dbyung ba ste //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rim gyis dbugs ni dbyung ba ste //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
translated: the exhalation is gradual.

original: 'og dang steng du rnam par bzung bar 'gyur bas de'i dus su shin tu yang ba nyid kyis rim gyis steng du dbugs dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'og dang steng du rnam par bzung bar 'gyur bas de'i dus su shin tu yang ba nyid kyis rim gyis steng du dbugs dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: Then, since it is held above and below, at that time, by its lightness, it should gradually be exhaled above.🔽That is,

original: de ni / phyag rgya bzang mor bcas pas /
analyzed: de ni / phyag rgya bzang mor bcas pas /
translated: together with the good seal.

original: so ; / zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid la sogs pas bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi gtum mo la sogs pa'i 'dod chags kyi mes aa wa dh'u t'ir rab tu gzhug pa ste de nyid lha rdzas kyi phyag rgya'i yan lag can ma ste de'i thim pa
analyzed: so ; / zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid la sogs pas bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi gtum mo la sogs pa'i 'dod chags kyi mes aa wa dh'u t'ir rab tu gzhug pa ste de nyid lha rdzas kyi phyag rgya'i yan lag can ma ste de'i thim pa
translated: The yogis who have gone by means of emptiness and so forth, by the fire of passion of the fierce fire and so forth, enter the avadhūtī. That itself is the goddess seal, the branch, her dissolution

original: rnam par shes pa bde ba'i dbus rnams su ste thams cad kyi bdag nyid du'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bde ba'i dbus rnams su ste thams cad kyi bdag nyid du'o //
translated: in the middle of the consciousness, the bliss, in all of the self.

original: bde ba nyid kyang lus thams cad la thim nas 'gro ste khyab bdag ces bya ba'i tshig go so //🔽de ltar g-yos par byed pa la sogs pas pa'i yi ge'i don gyis so //
analyzed: bde ba nyid kyang lus thams cad la thim nas 'gro ste khyab bdag ces bya ba'i tshig go so // de ltar g-yos par byed pa la sogs pas pa'i yi ge'i don gyis so //
translated: The bliss itself dissolves into the whole body and goes, the word “pervading” .🔽Thus, by the meaning of the syllables “moving” and so forth,

original: dpag tshad ces bya ba la sogs pas ga'i don gyis te //
analyzed: dpag tshad ces bya ba la sogs pas ga'i don gyis te //
translated: by the meaning of the syllables “yojana” and so forth,

original: 'khor lo'i shugs can @248a * //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i shugs can @248a * //
translated: “The one with the speed of a wheel”🔽is the meaning of the letter ṇ.

original: ma'i'o // de bzhin du pre ta pu ri'i gsungs pa /
analyzed: ma'i'o // de bzhin du pre ta pu ri'i gsungs pa /
translated: Similarly, the one from Pretapuri says:

original: bskyod ces bya ba la sogs pas pre'i yi ge'i don gyis so //
analyzed: bskyod ces bya ba la sogs pas pre'i yi ge'i don gyis so //
translated: “Shaking” and so forth is the meaning of the letter ṇ.

original: de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ta'i yi ge'i don gyis so //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ta'i yi ge'i don gyis so //
translated: “That” and so forth is the meaning of the letter ṭ.

original: slar yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas bu'i yi ge'i don gyis so //
analyzed: slar yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas bu'i yi ge'i don gyis so //
translated: “Again” and so forth is the meaning of the letter ḍ.

original: ri ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ra'i yi ge'i don gyis te //
analyzed: ri ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ra'i yi ge'i don gyis te //
translated: “The mountain” and so forth is the meaning of the letter ṇ.

original: thams cad rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: thams cad rtogs par sla'o //
translated: All of this is easy to understand.🔽However,

original: 'on kyang / byang chub yan lag dga' las skyes //
analyzed: 'on kyang / byang chub yan lag dga' las skyes //
translated: “The joy of the limbs of awakening”

original: zhes bya ba ni dga' ba dang byang chub kyi yan lag ni shin tu rjes su chags pa'i tshul gyis thams cad kyi rang bzhin du byung ba ste 'di ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dga' ba dang byang chub kyi yan lag ni shin tu rjes su chags pa'i tshul gyis thams cad kyi rang bzhin du byung ba ste 'di ni khyad par ro //
translated: is that joy and the limbs of awakening arise as the nature of everything in the manner of complete passion. This is the difference.

original: de ni de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas las kyi tshogs la sogs pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa rnams gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: de ni de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas las kyi tshogs la sogs pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa rnams gsungs pa ste /
translated: “That” and so forth explains the accumulation of karma and so on and the meditation of the maṇḍala wheel.

original: gzhan no zhes bya ba'i bar du rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan no zhes bya ba'i bar du rtogs par sla'o //
translated: It is easy to understand up to “another.”

original: da ni 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the wheel of the machine is stated:

original: 'khor lo yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'khor lo yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The wheel also, etc.

original: sngon du brjod pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar sngon du byas pa de de bzhin du thog ma zhes bya ba ni thog ma'i re'u mig la'o //
analyzed: sngon du brjod pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar sngon du byas pa de de bzhin du thog ma zhes bya ba ni thog ma'i re'u mig la'o //
translated: The previously stated is just as it was done before.

original: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba ni yi ge aom mo //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba ni yi ge aom mo //
translated: Vairocana is the syllable oṃ.

original: rlung gi sa bon zhes bya ba ni yi ge ya'o //
analyzed: rlung gi sa bon zhes bya ba ni yi ge ya'o //
translated: The seed of wind is the syllable ya.

original: lhag ma rtogs sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rtogs sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: 'on kyang de ltar thams cad rdo rje phag mo'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo lnga par rab tu bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang de ltar thams cad rdo rje phag mo'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo lnga par rab tu bya ba ste /
translated: However, in this way, everything is to be done in the five wheels of the machine of Vajravārāhī.

original: kun du spyod pa yang sngon bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: kun du spyod pa yang sngon bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: The conduct is also as before. This is the determination.

original: dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzings las /
analyzed: dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzings las /
translated: In the commentary on the great king of yoginī tantras, the glorious Ḍāka Ocean, this completes the tenth chapter.

original: 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'i rab tu sbyor ba la sogs pas nang gi bdag nyid kyi dang phyi ma'i yang rengs par bya ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa dang brang 'gro'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i nye ba'i snying po'i sngags kyi cho ga'i mtshan nyid
analyzed: 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'i rab tu sbyor ba la sogs pas nang gi bdag nyid kyi dang phyi ma'i yang rengs par bya ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa dang brang 'gro'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i nye ba'i snying po'i sngags kyi cho ga'i mtshan nyid
translated: The characteristics of the yoga of the inner and outer immobilizations by means of the application of Cakravegā, and so on, the meditation of the maṇḍala wheel, and the characteristics of the mantra ritual of the essence mantra of the machine of the female yakṣa,

original: rnams rgyas par bstan pa ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: rnams rgyas par bstan pa ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: are taught extensively. This is the explanation of the forty-second chapter🔽of the Tantrarāja Śrī Kālacakra and the commentary on it.

original: // / rab tu sbyor ba sgrub mchog ma //
analyzed: // / rab tu sbyor ba sgrub mchog ma //
translated: The supreme practice of the application

original: dum skyes ma la phyag byas nas //
analyzed: dum skyes ma la phyag byas nas //
translated: is the homage to Khaṇḍarohā.

original: sbyin sreg thabs rjes mthun rnams su //
analyzed: sbyin sreg thabs rjes mthun rnams su //
translated: In the rituals that are in accord with the fire sacrifice,

original: las thams cad kyis bskrad pa ste //
analyzed: las thams cad kyis bskrad pa ste //
translated: all activities are expelled.

original: rgyud rnams kun du rnyed dka' ba //
analyzed: rgyud rnams kun du rnyed dka' ba //
translated: This is difficult to find in all the tantras,

original: rnal 'byor rnams la yang 'chad pa'i //🔽dgos pa rnyed sla'i 'grel pa ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnams la yang 'chad pa'i // dgos pa rnyed sla'i 'grel pa ni //
translated: and it is also taught to the yogins.🔽I will speak well, having been permitted,

original: gnang bas bdag @248b gis rab smra bya //
analyzed: gnang bas bdag @248b gis rab smra bya //
translated: of the commentary that is easy to find.

original: da ni le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'i du ma skyes ma'i bshad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'i du ma skyes ma'i bshad pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to explain the forty-third chapter, the one called “Khaṇḍarohā,” it is said:

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, the Bhagavān said to the bodhisattva mahāsattva Maitreya, “Maitreya, it is so!🔽

original: las thams cad pa'i thabs zhes bya ba ni le'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi par bshad pa'i mtshan nyid kyis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: las thams cad pa'i thabs zhes bya ba ni le'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi par bshad pa'i mtshan nyid kyis shes par bya'o //
translated: Now, the means of all rites should be understood by the characteristics explained in the twenty-fourth chapter.

original: cho ga mthong bas zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba de bltas nas de'i cho ga las rnams rab tu sbyor bar bya'o //
analyzed: cho ga mthong bas zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba de bltas nas de'i cho ga las rnams rab tu sbyor bar bya'o //
translated: Having seen the rite, one should perform the rites of that rite.

original: bskrad par bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rang gi sems la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: bskrad par bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rang gi sems la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: One should accomplish the expulsion of one's own mind, etc.

original: de ltar dum skyes ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yi ge'i rab tu sbyor ba rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar dum skyes ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yi ge'i rab tu sbyor ba rnams gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, having stated the employment of the syllables of Vajrayoginī, etc.,

original: nam mkha'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste ;
analyzed: nam mkha'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste ;
translated: the employment of the syllables of the sky-farers is stated: the sky, etc.

original: kha'i yi ge'i don gyis te nam mkha'i bu ga zhes bya ba ni kha ga mu kha dang / rdo rje dang chu skyes kyi sbyor bas de rnams kyi dbus su gang lhung ba'i byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: kha'i yi ge'i don gyis te nam mkha'i bu ga zhes bya ba ni kha ga mu kha dang / rdo rje dang chu skyes kyi sbyor bas de rnams kyi dbus su gang lhung ba'i byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: The meaning of the syllable kha is the sky-cavity, and by the combination of the vajra and lotus, the bodhicitta falls in their middle.

original: tsitt'i yi ges sems kyis de'i steng du bskyod nas 'dod chags chen po zhes bya ba ni 'dir ni 'dzag pa ni thur sel dang mchu des btsir bas des steng du 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: tsitt'i yi ges sems kyis de'i steng du bskyod nas 'dod chags chen po zhes bya ba ni 'dir ni 'dzag pa ni thur sel dang mchu des btsir bas des steng du 'gro ba'o //
translated: The syllable of the heart moves the mind above that, and “great passion” is the upward movement by the pressing of the downward-voiding wind and the lips.

original: der slar yang skam bya a'a'i rnam pa yis zhes bya ba ni a'a'i rnam pa can ni bum pa can gyi sbyor bas rnam par bzung bar gyur pas thams cad du thim nas 'gro ba ste khams thams cad du bsdu ba byas slar yang mgo bo'i dbus su
analyzed: der slar yang skam bya a'a'i rnam pa yis zhes bya ba ni a'a'i rnam pa can ni bum pa can gyi sbyor bas rnam par bzung bar gyur pas thams cad du thim nas 'gro ba ste khams thams cad du bsdu ba byas slar yang mgo bo'i dbus su
