translated: “There again, by the form of the letter A” means that the form of the letter A is the retention through the practice of vase yoga. Having dissolved everywhere, all the elements are gathered, and again,

original: 'ong ba ste mgo bor rnam par gzung bar bya zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: 'ong ba ste mgo bor rnam par gzung bar bya zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
translated: “it comes to the middle of the head.” The phrase “it should be retained in the head” is stated.

original: der gnas pa slar yang nda'i yi ge'i don gyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: der gnas pa slar yang nda'i yi ge'i don gyis gsungs pa /
translated: The meaning of the syllable of the heart is stated again by “there.”

original: nda zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: nda zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “The disease” and so on.

original: 'gro bar bya zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi chad par thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba goms pas rtsa thams cad du bgrod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro bar bya zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi chad par thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba goms pas rtsa thams cad du bgrod par bya'o //
translated: “It should be moved” means that through the practice of the union of method and wisdom without break, it should be moved through all the channels.

original: 'di byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'di byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the result of this?

original: mda'i shugs kyis yongs su 'khor zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mda'i shugs kyis yongs su 'khor zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is said: “the complete revolution of the wind-energy. ”

original: ji ltar mda'i shugs kyis 'gro ba de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems dang srog yongs su 'khor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar mda'i shugs kyis 'gro ba de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems dang srog yongs su 'khor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as the force of the arrow goes, so does the bodhicitta and life-force.

original: de ltar slar yang brten par byed par gsungs pa /🔽rlung gi dkyil 'khor can bsgom bya //
analyzed: de ltar slar yang brten par byed par gsungs pa / rlung gi dkyil 'khor can bsgom bya //
translated: Thus, it is said that one should again rely on it.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: One should meditate on the mandala of wind.

original: byang chub kyi sems srog gi thig le de zla ba phyed pa'i rnam par gyur to //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems srog gi thig le de zla ba phyed pa'i rnam par gyur to //
translated: The bodhicitta, the drop of life-force, becomes the form of a half-moon.

original: gang du zhe na /
analyzed: gang du zhe na /
translated: Where?

original: mgo bo'i dbus su dang 'phang bar de nyid rgyal mtshan te longs spyod kyi rlabs gnyis rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par reg pas so //
analyzed: mgo bo'i dbus su dang 'phang bar de nyid rgyal mtshan te longs spyod kyi rlabs gnyis rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par reg pas so //
translated: In the middle of the head, in the navel.
What is to be done there?

original: ci bya ba ro'i yi ges gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci bya ba ro'i yi ges gsungs pa /
translated: The syllable “ro” says: “One should generate. ”

original: bskyed par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste rnam par shes pa der gzhag par bya ba ste /
analyzed: bskyed par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste rnam par shes pa der gzhag par bya ba ste /
translated: The consciousness should be placed there.

original: 'di'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyis dpag tshad 'bum phrag stong phrag ste nye bar mtshan pa cam mo //
analyzed: 'di'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyis dpag tshad 'bum phrag stong phrag ste nye bar mtshan pa cam mo //
translated: The meaning is that it is the measure of a hundred thousand leagues, which is the extent of the knowledge-being.

original: 'on kyang grangs med pa'i dpag tshad rnams su ye shes lhung ngo //
analyzed: 'on kyang grangs med pa'i dpag tshad rnams su ye shes lhung ngo //
translated: But the knowledge-being falls into the numberless leagues.

original: de ltar byas pas 'thob pa'i phyir de de bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: de ltar byas pas 'thob pa'i phyir de de bzhin du bshad do //
translated: Since it is obtained by doing it that way, it is explained in that way.

original: de ltar lhar yang ci dang ldan pas bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar lhar yang ci dang ldan pas bya ba gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, it is said that one should do it with what is possessed by the deity.

original: h'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste h'a'i yi gi'i don gyis te /
analyzed: h'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste h'a'i yi gi'i don gyis te /
translated: The meaning of the syllable HA is by the yoga of the dakinis.🔽The meaning of the syllable HA is by the yoga of the dakinis.

original: mkha' 'gro'i sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la zhen pas bltas pa ste shin tu 'khyug pa nyid kyis srog 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro'i sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la zhen pas bltas pa ste shin tu 'khyug pa nyid kyis srog 'bab pa'o //
translated: Looking with attachment to the sky, the life force falls by the extreme agility.

original: der rang gi sems kyis brgad  pa ste h'a h'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa byas pas sngon du bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: der rang gi sems kyis brgad  pa ste h'a h'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa byas pas sngon du bshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: There, one should laugh with one's mind, saying HA HA and so on, as previously explained.

original: rnal 'byor ma byed de der rang gi rtsa rgyun du gyen du 'pho bar bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni rtsa thams cad nas aa wa dh'u t'i'i nang du rab tu 'bab par bya ba ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma byed de der rang gi rtsa rgyun du gyen du 'pho bar bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni rtsa thams cad nas aa wa dh'u t'i'i nang du rab tu 'bab par bya ba ste /
translated: Do not practice yoga, but rather make it ascend in one's own channel-continuum, that is, make it descend into the central channel from all the channels.

original: mkha' spyod du 'gro ba'i bya bas bdag nyid kyi de de ltar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mkha' spyod du 'gro ba'i bya bas bdag nyid kyi de de ltar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By the action of going to the celestial realm, one's own that becomes like that, that is, the central channel.

original: de ltar gri'i yi ges gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar gri'i yi ges gsungs pa /
translated: Thus it is said by the letter KṢ.

original: khyim ni dbu ma'i nang du ste /
analyzed: khyim ni dbu ma'i nang du ste /
translated: The house is the interior of the central channel.

original: 'chi ba ni rnam par thim pa nyid du 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba ni rnam par thim pa nyid du 'gro ba'o //
translated: Death is going to dissolution.

original: de'i phyir rang gi rtsa rgyun du gyen du 'pho bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi rtsa rgyun du gyen du 'pho bar bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, make it ascend in one's own channel-continuum.

original: 'di byas pas ha'i yi ge don gyis 'phrog pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di byas pas ha'i yi ge don gyis 'phrog pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: By doing this, the meaning of the letter HA is seize, and so on.

original: de bzhin du de'i yi ge'i don gyis sbyin zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: de bzhin du de'i yi ge'i don gyis sbyin zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: Similarly, by the meaning of the letter DE, give, and so on.

original: ba'i yi ge'i don gyis kyang rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs bas so //
analyzed: ba'i yi ge'i don gyis kyang rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs bas so //
translated: By the meaning of the letter BA, vajra, and so on.

original: slar yang ha'i yi ge'i don gyis de srid ces bya ba la sogs pa ste thams cad rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: slar yang ha'i yi ge'i don gyis de srid ces bya ba la sogs pa ste thams cad rtogs par sla'o //
translated: Again, by the meaning of the letter H, “as long as” and so forth, all is easy to understand.

original: rab tu zhes bya ba la sogs par chos thams cad gsal ba rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i ye shes dang shes bya'i bdag nyid rnams su'o //
analyzed: rab tu zhes bya ba la sogs par chos thams cad gsal ba rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i ye shes dang shes bya'i bdag nyid rnams su'o //
translated: In “clearly” and so forth, all phenomena are the wisdom that has reached the end of clarity, and they are the nature of the knowable.

original: sbyor ba rdzogs par bya ba ste de'i phyir byang chub 'thob par byed pa ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba rdzogs par bya ba ste de'i phyir byang chub 'thob par byed pa ste /
translated: The perfection of union is the cause of attaining enlightenment.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ba ni de de bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ba ni de de bzhin du bshad do //
translated: The branches of enlightenment are explained in the same way.

original: de ltar shes byas nas zhes bya ba ni rig pa byas nas so //
analyzed: de ltar shes byas nas zhes bya ba ni rig pa byas nas so //
translated: Having understood thus, having understood,

original: bye brag chos zhes bya ba ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de de bzhin no //
analyzed: bye brag chos zhes bya ba ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de de bzhin no //
translated: the specific Dharma is the reality of phenomena, just as it is.

original: theg pa chen po zhes bya ba ni de'i gzugs nyid pas bskrad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: theg pa chen po zhes bya ba ni de'i gzugs nyid pas bskrad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The Great Vehicle is the form of that, and it is expelled.

original: 'on kyang phyi rol du ni dran pa tsam gyis dang @249b bklags pas 'grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang phyi rol du ni dran pa tsam gyis dang @249b bklags pas 'grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: However, externally, it is accomplished merely by mindfulness and recitation.

original: 'di de'i don du sbyin sreg gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di de'i don du sbyin sreg gsungs pa /
translated: For that purpose, the fire offering is taught here.

original: bya rog ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bya rog ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Crow and so forth.

original: go cha'i rnal 'byor ma'i sngags rnams kyis des bya ba de gzhan rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: go cha'i rnal 'byor ma'i sngags rnams kyis des bya ba de gzhan rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The activities of those are easily understood by others through the mantras of the Vajrayoginis.

original: da ni rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi dang po'i rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi dang po'i rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, having explained the first yoga of all the yoginis, he explains the meditation on the mandala wheel.

original: rtsa bdun zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rtsa bdun zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Seven channels and so forth.

original: thams cad sngon bzhin no //
analyzed: thams cad sngon bzhin no //
translated: All is as before.

original: lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The rest is easily understood.

original: da ni ro langs zhes bya ba'i 'khrul 'khor bshad par bya ste gang gis bsam pa tsam gyis bskrad pa'i las 'grub pa ste /
analyzed: da ni ro langs zhes bya ba'i 'khrul 'khor bshad par bya ste gang gis bsam pa tsam gyis bskrad pa'i las 'grub pa ste /
translated: Now, the wheel of the zombie will be explained, by which the activity of expulsion is accomplished merely by thinking of it.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: He says just that:

original: 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Wheel and so forth.

original: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba ni yi ge aom mo //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba ni yi ge aom mo //
translated: Vairochana is the syllable OṀ.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni yi ge aom de nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni yi ge aom de nyid do //
translated: Just that is that very syllable OṀ.

original: dza yig dang por sbyin par bya //
analyzed: dza yig dang por sbyin par bya //
translated: The letter JA should be given at the beginning.

original: zhes bya ba ni dum bu 'di la h'um gi yi ge'i dang por dza'i yi ge sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dum bu 'di la h'um gi yi ge'i dang por dza'i yi ge sbyin par bya'o //
translated: This means that on this piece, the syllable JA of the letter HŪṀ should be given at the beginning.

original: sum cu pa la de nyid ces bya ba ni h'um gi yi ge sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: sum cu pa la de nyid ces bya ba ni h'um gi yi ge sbyin par bya'o //
translated: In the thirty-first, that is the syllable hūṃ.

original: ro langs zhes bya ba ni stag gi rnam par byas nas de'i kha ru'o //
analyzed: ro langs zhes bya ba ni stag gi rnam par byas nas de'i kha ru'o //
translated: The zombie is the tiger, in whose mouth [the syllable is placed].

original: lhag ma rtogs sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rtogs sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: de ltar yang thams cad rdo rje phag mo'i 'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang 'khor lo drug par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang thams cad rdo rje phag mo'i 'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang 'khor lo drug par bya'o //
translated: Thus, all [the mantras] are the wheel of Vajravārāhī, and the wheel is sixfold.

original: kun du spyod pa yang sngon du bshad pa'i cho gas so //🔽dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzings las /
analyzed: kun du spyod pa yang sngon du bshad pa'i cho gas so // dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzings las /
translated: The conduct is also as previously explained.

original: dum skyes ma'i ming gi yi ge la sogs pa'i rab tu sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pas bskrad pa'i las kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'i bshad
analyzed: dum skyes ma'i ming gi yi ge la sogs pa'i rab tu sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pas bskrad pa'i las kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'i bshad
translated: This concludes the explanation of the forty-third chapter of the Great King of Yoginī Tantras called “The Ocean of Dakas,” called “The Detailed Explanation of the Characteristics of the Wheel of the Magical Wheel of the Zombie Goddess, the Procedure of the Names and so on of Vajravārāhī, and the Wheel of the Ritual Actions of Expelling by Meditating on the Wheel of the Mandala.”

original: pa'o / // / dbye ba'i las ni byed pa mo //
analyzed: pa'o / // / dbye ba'i las ni byed pa mo //
translated: The ritual action is performed by the one who is divided.

original: chang 'tshod mar rgyun bdag btud nas //
analyzed: chang 'tshod mar rgyun bdag btud nas //
translated: Having bowed to the distiller of liquor,

original: ming gi yi ge rab sbyor bas //
analyzed: ming gi yi ge rab sbyor bas //
translated: the application of the syllables of the name,

original: 'khrul 'khor zung du gnas pa mo //
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor zung du gnas pa mo //
translated: the machine that abides in pairs,

original: sems can kun la rjes chags phyir //
analyzed: sems can kun la rjes chags phyir //
translated: in order to follow all sentient beings,

original: phyi rol bklags pas grub pa mo //
analyzed: phyi rol bklags pas grub pa mo //
translated: the external accomplishment by recitation,

original: nang bdag nyid du rtag grub bya'i //
analyzed: nang bdag nyid du rtag grub bya'i //
translated: the internal accomplishment by oneself,

original: 'grel pa yang ni bshad par bya //
analyzed: 'grel pa yang ni bshad par bya //
translated: the commentary will be explained.

original: da ni chang 'tshong ma'i le'u bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni chang 'tshong ma'i le'u bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the explanation of the forty-fourth chapter on the liquor seller is stated:

original: de nas ro langs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas ro langs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, zombie and so on.

original: 'dir ro langs zung gi 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba @250a * //
analyzed: 'dir ro langs zung gi 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba @250a * //
translated: Here, the so-called zombie pair machine

original: ni rtsangs pa dang ro langs su bcas pas lhan cig gnas pa ste de de bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: ni rtsangs pa dang ro langs su bcas pas lhan cig gnas pa ste de de bzhin du bshad do //
translated: is the simultaneous abiding of the lizard and zombie, which is explained accordingly.

original: dgra rnams phyogs gcig par gnas par de'i tshe de rnams kyi dbye ba bya ba'o //
analyzed: dgra rnams phyogs gcig par gnas par de'i tshe de rnams kyi dbye ba bya ba'o //
translated: When the enemies abide in one direction, at that time their division should be made.

original: gang rnams kyis bya zhe na /
analyzed: gang rnams kyis bya zhe na /
translated: By whom should it be done?

original: rta dang ma he'i 'khrul 'khor dag gi bya ba'o //
analyzed: rta dang ma he'i 'khrul 'khor dag gi bya ba'o //
translated: By the machine of the horse and buffalo.

original: yang na dbye ba zhes bya ba ni las kyi khyad par te de rnams mthar thug par mdor bsdus pa rab bshad bya zhes bya ba ni nyung du bsdus pa ste sgrub pa po rnams kyi bsams pa'i 'bras bu ste rab po ste /
analyzed: yang na dbye ba zhes bya ba ni las kyi khyad par te de rnams mthar thug par mdor bsdus pa rab bshad bya zhes bya ba ni nyung du bsdus pa ste sgrub pa po rnams kyi bsams pa'i 'bras bu ste rab po ste /
translated: “ I will explain” means “I will teach” the ultimate, the concise, the best, the result of the thought of the adepts.

original: de yang chang 'tshong ma'i rab tu sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur pa'i yi ge so so'i nges pa'i tshig gis dang de bzhin du soo rashta'i ming dang byang chub kyi yan lag gi mdor bsdus nas bstan pa dang de'i rgyas par bshad pa rab
analyzed: de yang chang 'tshong ma'i rab tu sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur pa'i yi ge so so'i nges pa'i tshig gis dang de bzhin du soo rashta'i ming dang byang chub kyi yan lag gi mdor bsdus nas bstan pa dang de'i rgyas par bshad pa rab
translated: “ Also, by the application of the barmaid” means that the individual definitions of the individual syllables that will be explained, and likewise the name of the Saurashtra language and the summary of the factors of enlightenment, will be explained in detail.

original: tu bshad par bya'o zhes bya bar 'brel to //
analyzed: tu bshad par bya'o zhes bya bar 'brel to //
translated: “ I will explain” is connected to that.

original: de rnams su gsungs pa /
analyzed: de rnams su gsungs pa /
translated: Those are stated:

original: sbyor byed ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sbyor byed ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “The application” and so on.

original: myos byed chen mo zhes bya ba ni le'u thog ma nas brtsams nas skabs 'di'i bar du byang chub kyi sems kyi sna tshogs pa'i man ngag bsgoms pas bdud rtsi rgyun mi 'chad par gsal bar mthar phyin par yang dag par bskyed do //
analyzed: myos byed chen mo zhes bya ba ni le'u thog ma nas brtsams nas skabs 'di'i bar du byang chub kyi sems kyi sna tshogs pa'i man ngag bsgoms pas bdud rtsi rgyun mi 'chad par gsal bar mthar phyin par yang dag par bskyed do //
translated: The great intoxicant is the perfect generation of the stream of nectar, which is the culmination of the clear manifestation of the uninterrupted stream of nectar through the practice of the various instructions of the bodhicitta, beginning from the first chapter up to this point.

original: de nyid myos byed chen mo ste bde ba thams cad du gnas pa nyid pas bshad du med pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid myos byed chen mo ste bde ba thams cad du gnas pa nyid pas bshad du med pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: That itself is the great intoxicant, because it is the abode of all bliss, and it is the inexpressible bliss, is the meaning.

original: de ltar shoo'i yi ges rab tu bshad //
analyzed: de ltar shoo'i yi ges rab tu bshad //
translated: Thus it is explained by the syllable śo.

original: ces bya ba ni shoo ni shi ba'i ro ste chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du bdud rtsi 'dzag pa ste de ni myos byed de des shoo'i yi ges bshad pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni shoo ni shi ba'i ro ste chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du bdud rtsi 'dzag pa ste de ni myos byed de des shoo'i yi ges bshad pa'o //
translated: The syllable śo is a dead corpse, and the dripping of nectar in the nature of the dharmadhātu is that intoxicant, and it is explained by the syllable śo.

original: de'i phyir mchog gi bcud len te bcud len thams cad kyi dbus su gyur pa dam pa'i dngos po'i ro mchog gi bdud rtsi'i bcud len te de 'dzin pa ni yongs su 'dzin par byed de /
analyzed: de'i phyir mchog gi bcud len te bcud len thams cad kyi dbus su gyur pa dam pa'i dngos po'i ro mchog gi bdud rtsi'i bcud len te de 'dzin pa ni yongs su 'dzin par byed de /
translated: Therefore, it is the supreme elixir, the best of all elixirs, the elixir of the supreme taste of the sublime substance, and it is held, that is, it is grasped.

original: mchog gi gtso bo ste brdzod  du med pa'i bdud rtsi'o //
analyzed: mchog gi gtso bo ste brdzod  du med pa'i bdud rtsi'o //
translated: the supreme essence, the nectar that is not to be denied.

original: padmar zhes bya ba ni khams thams cad so sor gyur nas sna tshogs pa'i rtsa la sogs pa de rnams kyi mchog gi padmar rnam par gnas pa ste mang po'i tshig go //
analyzed: padmar zhes bya ba ni khams thams cad so sor gyur nas sna tshogs pa'i rtsa la sogs pa de rnams kyi mchog gi padmar rnam par gnas pa ste mang po'i tshig go //
translated: The lotus is the supreme lotus of all the elements, which are transformed individually, of the various channels, etc., and so on means that it is located in the supreme lotus, and is a word of many meanings.

original: de ltar 'di'i sbyor ba sngon du rgya che bar bshad de /
analyzed: de ltar 'di'i sbyor ba sngon du rgya che bar bshad de /
translated: Thus, its application is explained extensively beforehand.

original: da ni mi nus pas mdor bsdus pas bshad bya ba'o //
analyzed: da ni mi nus pas mdor bsdus pas bshad bya ba'o //
translated: Now, since that is not possible, it is explained in brief.

original: de rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: de rnams gsungs pa /
translated: Those are stated:

original: smin ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: smin ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The eyebrows, etc.

original: de ltar na snal ma ba thag gzhon nu lta bu'i rgyun mi 'chad par bsam @250b par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na snal ma ba thag gzhon nu lta bu'i rgyun mi 'chad par bsam @250b par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should imagine the uninterrupted stream like a young girl's thread.

original: snyoms 'jug ces bya ba ni rlung dang rnam par shes pa byang chub kyi sems dang lhan cig snal ma'i dbus su 'joms par byas nas goms par bya'o //
analyzed: snyoms 'jug ces bya ba ni rlung dang rnam par shes pa byang chub kyi sems dang lhan cig snal ma'i dbus su 'joms par byas nas goms par bya'o //
translated: The union is the wind and consciousness together with the bodhicitta, which should be imagined in the middle of the thread.

original: der skyes par gyur par rig tu mi btub ces bya ba ni reg pa med pa ste rang gis ni ye shes dang rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid can gyi chos nam mkha'i gzugs can chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: der skyes par gyur par rig tu mi btub ces bya ba ni reg pa med pa ste rang gis ni ye shes dang rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid can gyi chos nam mkha'i gzugs can chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not to be known as born there, that is, it is not to be touched, and it is the Dharma of the nature of wisdom and consciousness, having the form of space, the meaning of which is called the nature of the realm of phenomena.

original: lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: da ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, he teaches the meditation of the wheel of the maṇḍala:

original: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The maṇḍala, etc.

original: gtso mo mchog ces bya ba ni chang 'tshong ma nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang nyams par byed pa'i phyir mchog go //
analyzed: gtso mo mchog ces bya ba ni chang 'tshong ma nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang nyams par byed pa'i phyir mchog go //
translated: The supreme chief is the barmaid, who is supreme because she destroys all the afflictions and secondary afflictions.

original: mtshon cha rnams zhes bya ba ni sngon bzhin no //
analyzed: mtshon cha rnams zhes bya ba ni sngon bzhin no //
translated: The weapons, etc. are as before.

original: gzhan rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: da ni 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo bri ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo bri ba gsungs pa /
translated: Now, he teaches the drawing of the wheel of the yantra:

original: dus khrod sol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dus khrod sol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The charnel ground charcoal, etc.🔽

original: sman thams cad ces bya ba ni nang gi bdag nyid du 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: sman thams cad ces bya ba ni nang gi bdag nyid du 'chad pa'o //
translated: All medicines means that it is explained as being internal.

original: de'i rgyu skar rgyal la sogs pas zhes bya ba ni ji ltar phyi rol du rgyal la sogs pa'i sbyor bas sman thams cad blang bar bya ba ste /🔽rgyu skar so so'i rjes su mthun pa yis kyang ngo //
analyzed: de'i rgyu skar rgyal la sogs pas zhes bya ba ni ji ltar phyi rol du rgyal la sogs pa'i sbyor bas sman thams cad blang bar bya ba ste / rgyu skar so so'i rjes su mthun pa yis kyang ngo //
translated: By the lunar mansions such as Puṣya, etc. means that just as all medicines are to be taken externally by the application of Puṣya, etc.

original: de bzhin du nang gi bdag nyid kyi sman khams mnyam pas ro thams cad gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du nang gi bdag nyid kyi sman khams mnyam pas ro thams cad gzung bar bya'o //
translated: , so too, internally, by the humors being in balance, all tastes are to be taken.

original: rang gi sems snang tshas bri bar bya ba ni 'jug par bya ba ste rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi sems snang tshas bri bar bya ba ni 'jug par bya ba ste rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should draw with the brush of one’s own mind means that one should enter into it, the meaning of which is “the nature of one’s own awareness.”

original: de ltar 'khor lo gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar 'khor lo gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, the wheel is taught.

original: 'khor lo sngon zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'khor lo sngon zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The wheel is previously, etc.

original: phan tshun zung zhes bya ba ni grub zhi rnams bskor zhing bskor bas brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: phan tshun zung zhes bya ba ni grub zhi rnams bskor zhing bskor bas brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: Mutual pairs means that the pairs of success and peace are to be described as revolving and revolving.

original: de ltar rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba ni aom gyi yi ge'o //
analyzed: de ltar rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba ni aom gyi yi ge'o //
translated: Thus, Vairocana means the syllable oṃ.

original: sgo bzhi stong pa zhes bya ba ni sgo bzhi rnams kyi dum bu bzhi rnams su yi ge rnams mi sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: sgo bzhi stong pa zhes bya ba ni sgo bzhi rnams kyi dum bu bzhi rnams su yi ge rnams mi sbyin pa'o //
translated: The four doors are empty means that the letters are not placed in the four parts of the four doors.

original: lhag ma zhes bya ba ni dum bu gzhan rnams te /
analyzed: lhag ma zhes bya ba ni dum bu gzhan rnams te /
translated: The rest are the other parts.

original: de ltar thog ma'i phreng rnams su zhes bya ba ni de ltar gnyis gsum lnga drug pa rnams su ste /
analyzed: de ltar thog ma'i phreng rnams su zhes bya ba ni de ltar gnyis gsum lnga drug pa rnams su ste /
translated: Thus, in the first garland means thus, in the second, third, fifth, and sixth garlands.

original: dum bu bzhi rnams su rim pa ji lta bas sngags kyi yi ge 'di rnams dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: dum bu bzhi rnams su rim pa ji lta bas sngags kyi yi ge 'di rnams dgod par bya'o //
translated: In the four parts, the letters of the mantra are to be arranged in order.

original: de ltar ha'i yi ge gnyis par ro //
analyzed: de ltar ha'i yi ge gnyis par ro //
translated: Thus, the letter ha is in the second.

original: su'i yi ge gsum par ro //
analyzed: su'i yi ge gsum par ro //
translated: The letter su is in the third.

original: mbh'a'i yi ge lnga par ro //
analyzed: mbh'a'i yi ge lnga par ro //
translated: The letter mbha is in the fifth.

original: gri'i yi ge drug par ro /
analyzed: gri'i yi ge drug par ro /
translated: The letter gri is in the sixth.

original: @251a * // de ltar gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni phreng gnyis pa rnams la ste re'u mig bdun rnams la ji lta ba'i rim pas yi ge rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: @251a * // de ltar gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni phreng gnyis pa rnams la ste re'u mig bdun rnams la ji lta ba'i rim pas yi ge rnams gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, in the second means in the second garland, in the seven squares, the letters are stated in order.

original: brgyad par gri /
analyzed: brgyad par gri /
translated: In the eighth, gri.

original: dgu par yi ge ya dang yi ge ho dag go //
analyzed: dgu par yi ge ya dang yi ge ho dag go //
translated: In the ninth, the letters ya and ho.

original: bcu par yi ge gri //
analyzed: bcu par yi ge gri //
translated: In the tenth, the letter gri.

original: bcu gcig par bha'i yi ge dang ga'i yi ge dag go ;
analyzed: bcu gcig par bha'i yi ge dang ga'i yi ge dag go ;
translated: In the eleventh, the letters bha and ga.

original: / bcu gnyis par sa'i yi ge dang ya'i yi ge dag go //
analyzed: / bcu gnyis par sa'i yi ge dang ya'i yi ge dag go //
translated: In the twelfth, the letters of the earth and ya.

original: bcu gsum par yi ge w'an dang yi ge ba'i dag go //
analyzed: bcu gsum par yi ge w'an dang yi ge ba'i dag go //
translated: In the thirteenth, the letters va and ba.

original: bcu bzhi par yi ge da'o //
analyzed: bcu bzhi par yi ge da'o //
translated: In the fourteenth, the letter da.

original: gsum pa zhes bya ba ni phreng gsum pa rnams la ste /
analyzed: gsum pa zhes bya ba ni phreng gsum pa rnams la ste /
translated: The “third” is the three-row [mantras].

original: dbus ma'i logs zhes bya ba ni dum bu bdun rnams kyi dbus ma'i dum bu stong ba ste de'i logs gnyis dag tu gsum gsum rnams su sngags kyi yi ge rnams sbyin par bya ba ste /
analyzed: dbus ma'i logs zhes bya ba ni dum bu bdun rnams kyi dbus ma'i dum bu stong ba ste de'i logs gnyis dag tu gsum gsum rnams su sngags kyi yi ge rnams sbyin par bya ba ste /
translated: The “two sides of the middle section” are the two sides of the empty middle section of the seven sections. The mantra letters are to be placed there in groups of three.🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / de ltar bco lnga pa la yi ge phat do //
analyzed: gsungs pa / de ltar bco lnga pa la yi ge phat do //
translated: In the fifteenth, the letter phaṭ.

original: bcu drug pa la yi ge hna /
analyzed: bcu drug pa la yi ge hna /
translated: In the sixteenth, the letter ha.

original: bcu bdun pa la yi ge h'um /
analyzed: bcu bdun pa la yi ge h'um /
translated: In the seventeenth, the letter hūṃ.

original: bcu dgu pa la yang yi ge h'um /
analyzed: bcu dgu pa la yang yi ge h'um /
translated: In the nineteenth, again the letter hūṃ.

original: nyi shu pa la yi ge hna /
analyzed: nyi shu pa la yi ge hna /
translated: In the twentieth, the letter ha.

original: nyi shu rtsa gcig pa la yi ge ni sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa gcig pa la yi ge ni sbyin par bya'o //
translated: In the twenty-first, the letter ni is to be placed.

original: bzhi pa zhes bya ba ni phreng bzhi pa rnams su ste /
analyzed: bzhi pa zhes bya ba ni phreng bzhi pa rnams su ste /
translated: The “fourth” is the four-row [mantras].

original: dbus ma las 'di rnams thams cad ces bya ba ni dum bu bdun rnams kyi dbus su gsum stong pa'o //
analyzed: dbus ma las 'di rnams thams cad ces bya ba ni dum bu bdun rnams kyi dbus su gsum stong pa'o //
translated: In the middle one, all these means the three thousand in the middle of the seven sections.

original: de bzhin du sgo'i logs su re re stong pa spangs par bya ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du sgo'i logs su re re stong pa spangs par bya ba ste /
translated: Similarly, in the side of the door, one should omit each one thousand.

original: lho dang byang gi dum bu gnyis su yi ge rnams gnyis gnyis su gsungs pa //
analyzed: lho dang byang gi dum bu gnyis su yi ge rnams gnyis gnyis su gsungs pa //
translated: In the two sections of the south and the north, the letters are stated as two by two.

original: de ltar nyi shu rtsa gsum par yi ge ya dang yi ge na dag go //
analyzed: de ltar nyi shu rtsa gsum par yi ge ya dang yi ge na dag go //
translated: Thus, in the twenty-third, the letters ya and na.

original: nyi shu rtsa bdun par yi ge ty'a dang yi ge ra dag go //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa bdun par yi ge ty'a dang yi ge ra dag go //
translated: In the twenty-seventh, the letters tya and ra.

original: lnga pa'i phreng rnams dgod do zhes bya ba ni dum bu gsum pa'i phreng bzhin bya ba ste /
analyzed: lnga pa'i phreng rnams dgod do zhes bya ba ni dum bu gsum pa'i phreng bzhin bya ba ste /
translated: One should set down the strings of the fives, as in the string of the third section.

original: 'di'i yi ge rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di'i yi ge rnams gsungs pa /
translated: The letters of this are stated:

original: nyi shu rtsa dgu par yi ge h'um /
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa dgu par yi ge h'um /
translated: In the twenty-ninth, the letter hūṃ.

original: sum cu pa la yi ge pa dang yi ge ya dag go //
analyzed: sum cu pa la yi ge pa dang yi ge ya dag go //
translated: In the thirtieth, the letters pa and ya.

original: sum cu rtsa gcig par yi ge h'um /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gcig par yi ge h'um /
translated: In the thirty-first, the letter hūṃ.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum par yi ge h'um /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum par yi ge h'um /
translated: In the thirty-third, the letter hūṃ.

original: sum cu rtsa bzhi par yi ge gri / sum cu rtsa lnga par yi ge su dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa bzhi par yi ge gri / sum cu rtsa lnga par yi ge su dgod par bya'o //
translated: In the thirty-fourth, the letter kṣa. In the thirty-fifth, the letter su should be set down.

original: de bzhin du drug pa'i phreng gi dum bu rnams la rim pa ji lta bas bdun rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du drug pa'i phreng gi dum bu rnams la rim pa ji lta bas bdun rnams gsungs pa /
translated: Likewise, the seven syllables of the sixth line are taught in the same order.

original: de ltar sum cu rtsa drug pa la yi ge hr'a /
analyzed: de ltar sum cu rtsa drug pa la yi ge hr'a /
translated: In the thirty-sixth [square], the syllable hrīḥ.

original: so bdun pa la yi ge a'a dang yi ge na dag go //
analyzed: so bdun pa la yi ge a'a dang yi ge na dag go //
translated: In the thirty-seventh, the syllables a and na.

original: sum cu rtsa brgyad par yi ge h'um dang yi ge h'um dag go //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa brgyad par yi ge h'um dang yi ge h'um dag go //
translated: In the thirty-eighth, the syllables hūṃ and hūṃ.

original: sum cu rtsa dgu par yi ge h'um dang yi ge phat dag go //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa dgu par yi ge h'um dang yi ge phat dag go //
translated: In the thirty-ninth, the syllables hūṃ and phaṭ.

original: bzhi bcu par yi ge phat do //
analyzed: bzhi bcu par yi ge phat do //
translated: In the fortieth, the syllable phaṭ.

original: bzhi bcu rtsa gcig par yi ge dza @251b dang yi ge h'um dag go //
analyzed: bzhi bcu rtsa gcig par yi ge dza @251b dang yi ge h'um dag go //
translated: In the forty-first, the syllables ja and hūṃ.

original: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis par yi ge pha'o //
analyzed: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis par yi ge pha'o //
translated: In the forty-second, the syllable pha.

original: bdun par zhes bya ba ni phreng bdun pa'i dum bu bdun pa rnams la dbus kyi dum bu gcig sgor dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdun par zhes bya ba ni phreng bdun pa'i dum bu bdun pa rnams la dbus kyi dum bu gcig sgor dor bar bya'o //
translated: The seventh is the seventh part of the seventh line. One square in the middle is to be omitted.

original: lhag ma drug rnams te logs gnyis su gsum gsum rnams rim pa ji lta bas sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: lhag ma drug rnams te logs gnyis su gsum gsum rnams rim pa ji lta bas sbyin par bya ste /
translated: The remaining six, three each on the two sides, are to be given in the same order.

original: de rnams kyi yi ge gsungs pa //
analyzed: de rnams kyi yi ge gsungs pa //
translated: The syllables of those are taught.

original: bzhi bcu rtsa gsum par sngon du aom sbyin no //
analyzed: bzhi bcu rtsa gsum par sngon du aom sbyin no //
translated: In the forty-third, the syllable oṃ is given first.

original: bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi par yi ge h'um /
analyzed: bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi par yi ge h'um /
translated: In the forty-fourth, the syllable hūṃ.

original: bzhi bcu rtsa lnga par yi ge h'um de nyid do //
analyzed: bzhi bcu rtsa lnga par yi ge h'um de nyid do //
translated: In the forty-fifth, that very syllable hūṃ.

original: bzhi bcu rtsa bdun par yi ge mbhr'o //
analyzed: bzhi bcu rtsa bdun par yi ge mbhr'o //
translated: In the forty-seventh, the syllable mbhaḥ.

original: bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad par yi ge h'um ngo //
analyzed: bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad par yi ge h'um ngo //
translated: In the forty-eighth, the syllable hūṃ.

original: grva la sngon bzhin no //
analyzed: grva la sngon bzhin no //
translated: In the corners, as before.

original: ro langs zhes bya ba ni srin po chen po'i rnam par bya'o //
analyzed: ro langs zhes bya ba ni srin po chen po'i rnam par bya'o //
translated: The so-called zombie is to be done in the form of a great demon.

original: lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: de ltar slar yang kun du spyod pa la sogs pa thams cad rdo rje phag mo'i 'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang 'khor lo bdun par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar slar yang kun du spyod pa la sogs pa thams cad rdo rje phag mo'i 'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang 'khor lo bdun par shes par bya ste /
translated: Thus, again, all the conduct and so forth should be understood in the seven cakras of the mantra and the machine of Vajravārāhī.

original: sbyor ba nges so //
analyzed: sbyor ba nges so //
translated: The application is finished.

original: dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzir sa las //
analyzed: dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzir sa las //
translated: From the commentary on the glorious Ocean of Dakas Great Tantra of Yoginīs, the ship that delivers one to the island of liberation, the twenty-first chapter.

original: chang 'tshong ma'i ming la sogs pas rab tu sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pas kyang dbye ba'i las kyi 'khrul 'khor rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan pa ste /
analyzed: chang 'tshong ma'i ming la sogs pas rab tu sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pas kyang dbye ba'i las kyi 'khrul 'khor rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan pa ste /
translated: The wheel of the maṇḍala, and also by the name of the barmaid, and so on, and by the meditation of the maṇḍala wheel, is the wheel of activity of the rite of separation, the nature of the mantra of eight lines, the characteristics of the extensive rite taught.

original: le'u bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the forty-fourth chapter on the extensive characteristics of the rite.

original: // /'khor lo'i go cha'i rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: // /'khor lo'i go cha'i rnal 'byor ma //
translated: Homage to the yoginī Cakravarmiṇī,

original: don chen mdzad mar phyag 'tshal nas //
analyzed: don chen mdzad mar phyag 'tshal nas //
translated: the one who performs great deeds.

original: de yi ting 'dzin bsgrubs nas ni //
analyzed: de yi ting 'dzin bsgrubs nas ni //
translated: Having accomplished her samādhi,

original: lkugs pa'i las rnams bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: lkugs pa'i las rnams bsgrub par bya //
translated: one should accomplish the rite of muteness.

original: srin po'i rnam pa'i 'khrul 'khor du //
analyzed: srin po'i rnam pa'i 'khrul 'khor du //
translated: In the wheel of the form of the rākṣasa,

original: sems ni lkugs pa nyid du blang //🔽'grel pa rgya che bar byed pa //
analyzed: sems ni lkugs pa nyid du blang // 'grel pa rgya che bar byed pa //
translated: one should take the mind to be mute.🔽I will explain in brief

original: mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad par bya //
analyzed: mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad par bya //
translated: the extensive commentary.

original: da ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma'i le'u bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma'i le'u bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the explanation of the forty-fifth chapter on Cakravarmiṇī is as follows.

original: de yang 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de yang 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “Wheel” and so on.

original: ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i ming gi yi ge rnams kyis rgyas par 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i ming gi yi ge rnams kyis rgyas par 'chad pa'o //
translated: “Samādhi” is the extensive explanation of the syllables of the name to be explained.

original: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni shin tu gsal bas rim pa ji lta bas bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni shin tu gsal bas rim pa ji lta bas bshad par bya'o //
translated: “Clear” means very clear, as will be explained.

original: de ltar ting nge 'dzin bcings pa'i sbyor bas lkugs pa nyid kyis las ni rab tu rgol ba 'di rnams thams cad kyi dang mnyam pa nyid du byed pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar ting nge 'dzin bcings pa'i sbyor bas lkugs pa nyid kyis las ni rab tu rgol ba 'di rnams thams cad kyi dang mnyam pa nyid du byed pa ste /
translated: Thus, by the application of binding samādhi, all of these objections are made equal by the mute one.

original: de ltar @252a * //
analyzed: de ltar @252a * //
translated: Thus,

original: 'di'i sbyor ba'i mdor bstan pa'i tshig rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di'i sbyor ba'i mdor bstan pa'i tshig rnams gsungs pa /
translated: the root text states the words that summarize the application:

original: 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “wheel,” etc.

original: rkang pas dman pa'i tshigs bcad gnyis kyis so //
analyzed: rkang pas dman pa'i tshigs bcad gnyis kyis so //
translated: [This is] with two verses lacking one line each.

original: 'di'i rgyas par bshad par gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di'i rgyas par bshad par gsungs pa /
translated: The extensive explanation of this is stated:

original: lha dang lha min zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /🔽mtshams kyi skad kyis 'di rnams 'dir lha rnams ni mig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lha dang lha min zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste / mtshams kyi skad kyis 'di rnams 'dir lha rnams ni mig la sogs pa'o //
translated: “gods and demigods,” etc.

original: lha ma yin rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: lha ma yin rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa ste /
translated: Here, the gods are the eyes, etc., and the demigods are the forms, etc.

original: de rnams kyi 'thab mo chen po nang du son pa'i yid kyis bsnun pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi 'thab mo chen po nang du son pa'i yid kyis bsnun pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: The mind that has entered into the great battle of those is the one that is struck.

original: mi'i 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni mi rnams la 'jug pas na mi'i 'jug pa ste rnam par shes pa son pa'i ro'i lus la slar yang mi'i lus la sogs par rnam par shes pa skyed par byed de /
analyzed: mi'i 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni mi rnams la 'jug pas na mi'i 'jug pa ste rnam par shes pa son pa'i ro'i lus la slar yang mi'i lus la sogs par rnam par shes pa skyed par byed de /
translated: The so-called human engagement is the human engagement because it engages humans. The consciousness that has entered the body of the essence of the one who has gone again generates consciousness in the human body, etc.

original: n'a r'a ya na zhes bya bar brjod par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: n'a r'a ya na zhes bya bar brjod par bya ba'i don to //
translated: It should be expressed as nārayaṇa.

original: de yang yul dang dbang po rnams mi sdu bar gyur pas glen pa'i dngos por rnam par gnas pa ste der thim pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de yang yul dang dbang po rnams mi sdu bar gyur pas glen pa'i dngos por rnam par gnas pa ste der thim pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Moreover, it is the state of stupidity due to the unpleasantness of the objects and faculties, and it abides there due to dissolution into it.

original: gang gis rnal 'byor gyis she na gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gis rnal 'byor gyis she na gsungs pa /
translated: By what yoga? It is said:

original: 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: By the samādhi of the cakra.

original: de ltar yi ge gnyis kyis 'chad pa ni tsa'i yi ge dang kra'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: de ltar yi ge gnyis kyis 'chad pa ni tsa'i yi ge dang kra'i yi ge'o //
translated: Thus, the explanation by the two syllables is the syllable ca and the syllable kra.

original: de 'dir 'khor lo'i sgras so sor sdud pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de 'dir 'khor lo'i sgras so sor sdud pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Here, the cakra is the collection of the samādhis of withdrawal, etc.

original: des de'i tshe gzugs chen po ste rang gi sems bar snang la bltas pas g-yo ba'i sems 'ching ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: des de'i tshe gzugs chen po ste rang gi sems bar snang la bltas pas g-yo ba'i sems 'ching ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: At that time, the great form, one’s own mind, is seen in space. The moving mind is called “the fetter.”

original: tsa'i yi ge'i don gyis de sngon gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis de bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: tsa'i yi ge'i don gyis de sngon gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis de bzhin du bshad do //
translated: By the meaning of the letter ca, that is explained as before by the samādhi.

original: de ltar gnon pa zhes bya ba ni kra'i yi ge'i don gyis te gnon pa ste yongs su gnon pa rnam par shes pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni gang mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams su rnam par gnas pa ste de ltar gzugs kyi dbus su thim
analyzed: de ltar gnon pa zhes bya ba ni kra'i yi ge'i don gyis te gnon pa ste yongs su gnon pa rnam par shes pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni gang mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams su rnam par gnas pa ste de ltar gzugs kyi dbus su thim
translated: Thus, “pressing” is by the meaning of the letter ṭa. Pressing, that is, fully pressing, is the “phenomenon of consciousness.” That which is situated in the eye and so on is the sense organ. Thus, the form that dissolves in the middle

original: pa rnams te /
analyzed: pa rnams te /
translated: is the two.

original: gnyis po de la bltas pas 'gyur ba ste khyad par ro //
analyzed: gnyis po de la bltas pas 'gyur ba ste khyad par ro //
translated: By looking at those two, there is a change, that is, a difference.

original: de ltar tsa'i yi ges rnam par shes pa la 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar tsa'i yi ges rnam par shes pa la 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Thus, by the letter ca, consciousness is apprehended.

original: de bzhin du chos su 'dzin pas rma'i yi ge ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du chos su 'dzin pas rma'i yi ge ste /
translated: Likewise, by apprehending phenomena, there is the letter ḍa.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni rma'i yi ge'i phyi mo ai'i yi ge te ai mi'i rkyen gyi ni'i yi ge'i yang don to //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni rma'i yi ge'i phyi mo ai'i yi ge te ai mi'i rkyen gyi ni'i yi ge'i yang don to //
translated: “This” is the letter ḍa. The letter i of the letter ḍa is the letter i of the condition of i.

original: ai ni ni rgyud 'dis so sor sdud pa la sogs pa de yang bshad pa ste chos kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyis te /
analyzed: ai ni ni rgyud 'dis so sor sdud pa la sogs pa de yang bshad pa ste chos kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyis te /
translated: The i is the explanation of the individual withdrawal, and so on, by this tantra, by the characteristic of the doctrine seal.

original: ha'i yi ge gang gi phyir gyi don te nam mkha' @252b la zhen pas ston gyi nam mkha' dri ma med pa nyi ma gung gi nam mkha'i rnam pa'i sems kyi rgyun ye shes dang shes bya de rnams gnyis su med par ston par bltas pas zhes bya
analyzed: ha'i yi ge gang gi phyir gyi don te nam mkha' @252b la zhen pas ston gyi nam mkha' dri ma med pa nyi ma gung gi nam mkha'i rnam pa'i sems kyi rgyun ye shes dang shes bya de rnams gnyis su med par ston par bltas pas zhes bya
translated: The ha syllable is for the purpose of why? It is seen that the continuum of the mind, the stainless sky at noon, the aspect of the sky, is taught to be the nondual gnosis and the object of knowledge.

original: ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: This is the ascertainment.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di'i sbyor ba'i las kyi tshogs te /
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di'i sbyor ba'i las kyi tshogs te /
translated: The collection of the karma of the application of this, beginning with thus, is as follows.

original: sngon gyi spyod par spyod ces bya ba ni mdor bsdus pas ji ltar sngon du bshad pa'i ste /
analyzed: sngon gyi spyod par spyod ces bya ba ni mdor bsdus pas ji ltar sngon du bshad pa'i ste /
translated: The conduct of former conduct is as previously explained in brief.

original: le'u thams cad kyi man ngag ces bya ba ni le'u 'di rnams thams cad kyi man ngag las kyi sbyor ba'i phyag rgya de'i rgyur gzugs bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: le'u thams cad kyi man ngag ces bya ba ni le'u 'di rnams thams cad kyi man ngag las kyi sbyor ba'i phyag rgya de'i rgyur gzugs bsgom pa'o //
translated: The instruction of all the chapters is the meditation on the form of the cause of the karma application of the seal of this, all of these chapters.

original: de ltar thams cad rim pas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de de bzhin du bshad pa rnams bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar thams cad rim pas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de de bzhin du bshad pa rnams bya'o //
translated: Thus, all of them are to be explained in that way, beginning with “in sequence.”

original: sbas pa zhes bya ba ni bsam du med par ro //
analyzed: sbas pa zhes bya ba ni bsam du med par ro //
translated: “ Hidden” means inconceivable.

original: de ltar byas pas phung po lnga yang nam mkha' lngar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar byas pas phung po lnga yang nam mkha' lngar 'gyur te /
translated: By doing it that way, the five aggregates become the five space-element aggregates.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: “Space” is Vairocana.

original: nam mkha' med ces bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'o ;
analyzed: nam mkha' med ces bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'o ;
translated: “ Non-space” is Akṣobhya.

original: / nam mkha' chen po zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //🔽shin tu nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: / nam mkha' chen po zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan no // shin tu nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: “ Great space” is Ratnasaṃbhava.🔽“ Ultimate space” is Amitābha.

original: nam mkha' min zhes bya ba ni don yod pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' min zhes bya ba ni don yod pa'o //
translated: “ Non-space” is Amoghasiddhi.

original: de ltar nam mkha' lnga rnams snying gar rtsa lnga rnams te de rnams kyang nam mkhar gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ji srid ri ma mthong gi bar du ste /
analyzed: de ltar nam mkha' lnga rnams snying gar rtsa lnga rnams te de rnams kyang nam mkhar gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ji srid ri ma mthong gi bar du ste /
translated: Thus, the five spaces are the five channels at the heart. In order to visualize them as space, [the visualization] is maintained as long as one can see the tip of one’s nose.

original: 'di ni mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin gyis rtsa nam mkha' dbus mi mthong ste srog gi yongs su sbyor bas kha steng du bltas par 'bab ste /
analyzed: 'di ni mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin gyis rtsa nam mkha' dbus mi mthong ste srog gi yongs su sbyor bas kha steng du bltas par 'bab ste /
translated: This is the nature of Akshobhya. The central channel is not seen, since the life force is completely bound.

original: de rnams shi bar 'gyur pa rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur te nam mkha' rnam par song ba na'o //
analyzed: de rnams shi bar 'gyur pa rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur te nam mkha' rnam par song ba na'o //
translated: Those who die see it fall, facing upward, into the sky.

original: de srid ces bya ba ni de'i tshe 'thab pa ste /
analyzed: de srid ces bya ba ni de'i tshe 'thab pa ste /
translated: As long as means at that time, the battle.

original: rgyun mi 'chad pa 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: rgyun mi 'chad pa 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: The uninterrupted clear light.

original: ci yang dga' ba las skyes pa'i bde ba rtog pa dang bcas pa 'dres pa de srid pa'i bde bas bsgom pa brtags pa'i ming ye shes 'dres pas gang gis skyes 'gro thams cad rkang gnyis pa la sogs pa bag chags dang bcas pa las byung ba'o //
analyzed: ci yang dga' ba las skyes pa'i bde ba rtog pa dang bcas pa 'dres pa de srid pa'i bde bas bsgom pa brtags pa'i ming ye shes 'dres pas gang gis skyes 'gro thams cad rkang gnyis pa la sogs pa bag chags dang bcas pa las byung ba'o //
translated: As long as that bliss born of supreme joy, mixed with conceptualization, is meditated on with the bliss of existence, it is called the imagined pristine consciousness, by which all migrating beings, with their traces, arise as the two legged, etc.

original: de'i phyir dngos po med pa ma yin pa'i gzugs kyi bdag nyid 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa dngos po med pa'i ye shes des brtan pa dang 'gro ba la sogs pa thams cad kyi bde ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po med pa ma yin pa'i gzugs kyi bdag nyid 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa dngos po med pa'i ye shes des brtan pa dang 'gro ba la sogs pa thams cad kyi bde ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, by that pristine consciousness of non-entity, the aspect of clear light that is the nature of form that is not a non-entity, all the bliss of moving, standing, and so on is called “bliss.”

original: bde ba'i gzugs su len pas 'di'i @253a * //
analyzed: bde ba'i gzugs su len pas 'di'i @253a * //
translated: Since one takes on the form of bliss,

original: lam la gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin gang dang der stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su der ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi gzugs kyi bdag nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: lam la gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin gang dang der stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su der ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi gzugs kyi bdag nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: the consciousness and pristine consciousness of one who abides in this path become the nature of the form of all sentient beings in the worlds of the great trichiliocosm.

original: gzugs de rnams su ye shes lkugs pa'i rnam pa bzhin du gnas pa ste rang gi sems bcings pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs de rnams su ye shes lkugs pa'i rnam pa bzhin du gnas pa ste rang gi sems bcings pa'o //
translated: That form abides like the aspect of a mute pristine consciousness, bound to one’s mind.

original: phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phyag rgya chen por 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phyag rgya chen por 'gro ba'o //
translated: “Mudrā” and so on means going to the great seal.

original: 'dis zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyis te /
analyzed: 'dis zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyis te /
translated: “By this” means by the pristine consciousness of the great seal.

original: dgra bzhin zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'am rnam par rtog pa'i lus la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dgra bzhin zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'am rnam par rtog pa'i lus la sogs pa ste /
translated: The enemy is the eye, etc., or the body, etc. of conceptualization.

original: de'i phyir thams cad 'phags pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang yul la sogs pa la'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad 'phags pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang yul la sogs pa la'am /
translated: Therefore, all are Āryas means that form, objects, etc. are pierced,

original: lus la sogs pa dang yul la 'bigs pa po nyid kyi phyir yang ngo //
analyzed: lus la sogs pa dang yul la 'bigs pa po nyid kyi phyir yang ngo //
translated: or the body, etc. and objects are pierced.

original: de rnams kyis lkugs par 'gro ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyis lkugs par 'gro ste /
translated: By them, one goes to muteness.

original: bltas pas gyur pa la sogs pas yul la sogs pa ste yul rnams thams cad cung zad kyang rig pa med pa rnam par rtog pa nyid rjes su spyod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bltas pas gyur pa la sogs pas yul la sogs pa ste yul rnams thams cad cung zad kyang rig pa med pa rnam par rtog pa nyid rjes su spyod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By looking, etc., means that objects, etc. are pierced. All objects are not known in the least. The meaning is that one should practice conceptualization.

original: 'di byas pas rdo rje 'chang kyang lkugs pa nyid du 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: 'di byas pas rdo rje 'chang kyang lkugs pa nyid du 'gro ba ste /
translated: By doing this, even Vajradhara goes to muteness.

original: ci slar yang dran pa tsam gyis skye 'gro phra mo mu stegs can la sogs pa bstan pa la gnod pa byed pa gang gi tshe mu stegs can de rnams dbang phyug la sogs pa byed pa por smra ba'o //
analyzed: ci slar yang dran pa tsam gyis skye 'gro phra mo mu stegs can la sogs pa bstan pa la gnod pa byed pa gang gi tshe mu stegs can de rnams dbang phyug la sogs pa byed pa por smra ba'o //
translated: Again, means that by the mere recollection, the subtle beings of the world, such as tīrthikas, who harm the teachings, are taught. When those tīrthikas speak of Īśvara, etc. as the creator,

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: that is said.

original: byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The agent, etc.

original: thams cad rig pa byed po byed ces bya ba ni mdor na dang las gang byed pa de dag thams cad de de rnams thams cad rig pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad rig pa byed po byed ces bya ba ni mdor na dang las gang byed pa de dag thams cad de de rnams thams cad rig pa'o //
translated: All of that is the agent of the agent means that in brief, whatever actions are performed, all of that is the agent of that.

original: gang gi phyir na de byed pa po byed de'i gzugs can zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir na de byed pa po byed de'i gzugs can zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since that is the agent of the agent, it is formless.🔽 Therefore, since it is not without an agent, it is not produced from a separation from an agent.

original: de'i phyir byed pa med pa ma yin te byed pa dang bral ba las 'byung ba ma yin pas 'dir byed par smra ba grub bo //
analyzed: de'i phyir byed pa med pa ma yin te byed pa dang bral ba las 'byung ba ma yin pas 'dir byed par smra ba grub bo //
translated: Here, the assertion of an agent is established.

original: de rnams kyis kyang lkugs pa'i las de rnams kyis byed de ;
analyzed: de rnams kyis kyang lkugs pa'i las de rnams kyis byed de ;
translated: Those are the actions of the mute.

original: de bzhin du yang lung gi rigs pa dang ldan pa'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang lung gi rigs pa dang ldan pa'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsungs pa /
translated: In the same way, the reply endowed with the reasoning of scripture is the reply of the Bhagavān:

original: yid bzang ma nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: yid bzang ma nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: O Subhadrā! and so on.

original: gser gling gi yi ge rnams kyis so //
analyzed: gser gling gi yi ge rnams kyis so //
translated: The letters of Suvarṇadvīpa.

original: sngon du bshad pa'i spyod pa yang 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pas rtsa'i yi ge'i don @253b to ;
analyzed: sngon du bshad pa'i spyod pa yang 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pas rtsa'i yi ge'i don @253b to ;
translated: The meaning of the nāḍī syllables is explained by the conduct explained previously and so on.

original: / de bzhin du rim pas thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pas kra'i yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: / de bzhin du rim pas thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pas kra'i yi ge'i don to //
translated: In the same way, all and so forth in order is the meaning of the letter KṢ.

original: steng du 'bab ces bya ba la sogs pas ba'i yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: steng du 'bab ces bya ba la sogs pas ba'i yi ge'i don to //
translated: Falling above and so forth is the meaning of the letter B.

original: 'dres zhes bya ba la sogs pas rmi'i yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: 'dres zhes bya ba la sogs pas rmi'i yi ge'i don to //
translated: Mixed and so forth is the meaning of the letter R.

original: len zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni'i yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: len zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni'i yi ge'i don to //
translated: Taking and so forth is the meaning of the letter N.

original: de ltar yid bzang ma zhes bya ba ni su'i yi ge'i don gyis lan 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar yid bzang ma zhes bya ba ni su'i yi ge'i don gyis lan 'chad pa'o //
translated: Thus, good mind is the meaning of the letter S.

original: de ltar byed pa po dang las rnams kyi bya bar gyur pas mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar byed pa po dang las rnams kyi bya bar gyur pas mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the agent and actions are not made by that.

original: de ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is that not so?🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / yid bzang ma gang zag nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / yid bzang ma gang zag nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: The person is the good mind.

original: bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid du skad cig ma zad pas kyang bsam du med pas dngos po thams cad du gang zag gi bdag med pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid du skad cig ma zad pas kyang bsam du med pas dngos po thams cad du gang zag gi bdag med pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro //
translated: The characteristic of selflessness is also not imagined by the momentary destruction of all things, so the self of the person is the form of selflessness.

original: de ltar rig pa gang gi tshe de'i dus su rang gi las su grub pa ste dge ba'am dge ba ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar rig pa gang gi tshe de'i dus su rang gi las su grub pa ste dge ba'am dge ba ma yin pa ste /
translated: Thus, when one’s own karma is accomplished, whether virtuous or non-virtuous,

original: 'di las rnams kyi byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di las rnams kyi byed pa ma yin no //
translated: it is not the agent of those actions.

original: de'i phyir rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas ba'i yi ge'i don gyis te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas ba'i yi ge'i don gyis te /
translated: Therefore, with the meaning of the syllable “va” in “vajra,” etc.,

original: rdo rje'i theg pa zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi theg pa chen po de la gnas pa dang ldan pa'i man ngag ste sangs rgyas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa'i chos kyi bdag nyid pa'i ye shes 'dod par byed pa ste thob
analyzed: rdo rje'i theg pa zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi theg pa chen po de la gnas pa dang ldan pa'i man ngag ste sangs rgyas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa'i chos kyi bdag nyid pa'i ye shes 'dod par byed pa ste thob
translated: the “Vajra Vehicle” is the Great Vehicle of Mantra. The instruction for abiding in that is the knowledge of the nature of phenomena, which is naturally selfless, that is desired by the Buddhist yogins.

original: par byed pa'o //
analyzed: par byed pa'o //
translated: It is attained.

original: 'di byas par gyur pas kyang brjod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di byas par gyur pas kyang brjod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Even though this is done, there is no expression, etc.

original: mdor bsdus pa'i don gyis brjod pa tsam kyang med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa'i don gyis brjod pa tsam kyang med par 'gyur te /
translated: The meaning in brief is that even mere expression does not exist.

original: sbyor ba mthong bas te slar yang byed pa la sogs pa ci la yod do //
analyzed: sbyor ba mthong bas te slar yang byed pa la sogs pa ci la yod do //
translated: What is the use of seeing the application and doing it again?

original: de ltar slar yang rnal 'byor chen po la sogs pa'i bstan bcos dang dngos po thams cad gang las byung zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar slar yang rnal 'byor chen po la sogs pa'i bstan bcos dang dngos po thams cad gang las byung zhe na /
translated: Thus, again, from where do the treatises such as the Great Yoga arise?🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / de las langs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / de las langs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: arising from that and so forth.

original: rna yig ces bya ba ni de'i don 'chad pas gzhan gyi dngos po rnams med ces bya ba ste rnal 'byor chen po la sogs pa byung ba'o //
analyzed: rna yig ces bya ba ni de'i don 'chad pas gzhan gyi dngos po rnams med ces bya ba ste rnal 'byor chen po la sogs pa byung ba'o //
translated: The syllable na means that the entities of others do not exist, explained by its meaning. The Great Yoga and so forth arise.

original: de 'di thog ma spyi gtsug rkang mtha' can zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de 'di thog ma spyi gtsug rkang mtha' can zhes bya ba ste /
translated: That is the beginning, ending with the foot means

original: rkang pa'i mthe bo'i bar du ste de la langs pa bsrub cing srubs pa ni srog dang thur sel gnyis te lte ba'i gnas su byas pas so //
analyzed: rkang pa'i mthe bo'i bar du ste de la langs pa bsrub cing srubs pa ni srog dang thur sel gnyis te lte ba'i gnas su byas pas so //
translated: up to the toe. Arising from that, churning and being churned are the two, life and downward-voiding, by making the navel the place.

original: de ltar sbyor ba byas pas kyang sbyor ba 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar sbyor ba byas pas kyang sbyor ba 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: By practicing like that, the practice will arise.

original: ji ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu rnams kyis 'grel par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu rnams kyis 'grel par 'gyur ro //
translated: How do the causes and effects pervade?

original: de nyid gsungs @254a * //🔽pa ; 'bras bu rgyu la rgyas gdab cing //
analyzed: de nyid gsungs @254a * // pa ; 'bras bu rgyu la rgyas gdab cing //
translated: That itself is said:🔽The effect seals the cause,

original: rgyu yis 'bras bu las rgyas gdab //
analyzed: rgyu yis 'bras bu las rgyas gdab //
translated: and the cause seals the effect.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis dag gis //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis dag gis //
translated: By the two, cause and effect,

original: 'dod pa'i dgos pa 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dgos pa 'gro ba'o //
translated: the desired purpose is accomplished.

original: s'a li las ni s'a li skyes //
analyzed: s'a li las ni s'a li skyes //
translated: From rice, rice is produced,

original: slar yang de yis de ltar 'byung //
analyzed: slar yang de yis de ltar 'byung //
translated: and again, it is produced in that way.

original: dag pa'i shel lta bu las ni //
analyzed: dag pa'i shel lta bu las ni //
translated: From the pure crystal,

original: lus kyi khams rnams 'byung phyir ro //
analyzed: lus kyi khams rnams 'byung phyir ro //
translated: the elements of the body arise.

original: ji ltar s'a lu'i lo tog sogs //
analyzed: ji ltar s'a lu'i lo tog sogs //
translated: Just as a rice crop and so on

original: de yi zhing la gdab bya ste //
analyzed: de yi zhing la gdab bya ste //
translated: is sown in its field,

original: de bzhin lus kyi khams rnams kyi //
analyzed: de bzhin lus kyi khams rnams kyi //
translated: in the same way, the elements of the body

original: khams pas rnal 'byor sogs su gdab //
analyzed: khams pas rnal 'byor sogs su gdab //
translated: are sown in the elements by the yogi and so on.

original: de yis thams cad der skye ste //
analyzed: de yis thams cad der skye ste //
translated: Everything is born from that,

original: slar yang de yis de nyid skye //
analyzed: slar yang de yis de nyid skye //
translated: and again, it is born from that.

original: skye zhing skye bar goms pa yis /
analyzed: skye zhing skye bar goms pa yis /
translated: By being accustomed to birth after birth,

original: sangs rgyas kun sogs 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun sogs 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: all buddhas and so on arise.

original: 'o na ngan pa'i lus kyi khams rnams su thams cad ngan pa la sogs pas sna tshogs pa'i rdzas skyes pa 'gal lo //
analyzed: 'o na ngan pa'i lus kyi khams rnams su thams cad ngan pa la sogs pas sna tshogs pa'i rdzas skyes pa 'gal lo //
translated: Now, it is contradictory that all the various substances are born from bad elements in a bad body and so on.

original: phung po lnga la sogs pa ni //
analyzed: phung po lnga la sogs pa ni //
translated: The five aggregates and so on

original: rtag tu nad dang zhes bya ba'i tshig gis te /
analyzed: rtag tu nad dang zhes bya ba'i tshig gis te /
translated: are always sick, as stated by the words🔽and so on.

original: de'i phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge ba thams cad ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de'i phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge ba thams cad ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: Therefore, how can the Buddhas and so on arise from the wholesome?

original: gang gis 'khor ba'i rgyun rnams kyi chad par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis 'khor ba'i rgyun rnams kyi chad par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: By what is the continuity of saṃsāra severed?

original: gzhan gyi the tshom de sel bar byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhan gyi the tshom de sel bar byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: The following verse is stated to dispel the doubt of others.

original: de ltar smra ba bden te /
analyzed: de ltar smra ba bden te /
translated: It is true that such is said,

original: 'on kyang sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis dang / thams cad sh'akya thub pa'i bar rnams kyis sam /
analyzed: 'on kyang sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis dang / thams cad sh'akya thub pa'i bar rnams kyis sam /
translated: but the Buddhas of the past, and all the Śākyas up to Śākyamuni,

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa rnams kyis lus kyi dngos po 'dzin pas sangs rgyas nyid du byas pa ste /
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa rnams kyis lus kyi dngos po 'dzin pas sangs rgyas nyid du byas pa ste /
translated: and those of the past and future, have made the body into Buddhahood by taking up the substance of the body.

original: byang chub kyi sa bon gyi gzugs rnams su dag pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sa bon gyi gzugs rnams su dag pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because the forms of the seed of enlightenment are pure.

original: thabs tsam du lus kyi khams byang chub skyed pa po nyid do //
analyzed: thabs tsam du lus kyi khams byang chub skyed pa po nyid do //
translated: The body element is merely a method, the producer of enlightenment.

original: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
translated: Also, it is stated:

original: 'od srungs bu ram gyi zhing ngam s'a lu'i zhing du lung dang ljan ljin gyis dgos pa byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'od srungs bu ram gyi zhing ngam s'a lu'i zhing du lung dang ljan ljin gyis dgos pa byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Kāśyapa, the field of sugarcane or the field of rice is made useful by the weeds.

original: de bzhin du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang phung po dang khams kyis dgos pa byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang phung po dang khams kyis dgos pa byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, the afflictions, aggregates, and constituents of the bodhisattvas will serve their purpose.

original: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa ;
analyzed: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa ;
translated: And it is also said:

original: lus rnams 'byung ba med rnams su //
analyzed: lus rnams 'byung ba med rnams su //
translated: The bodies that do not arise

original: thams cad de phyir 'byung mi 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad de phyir 'byung mi 'gyur //
translated: do not arise at all.

original: de ltar 'khor ba'i ming med nyid //
analyzed: de ltar 'khor ba'i ming med nyid //
translated: Thus, since there is no name of saṃsāra,

original: mya ngan 'das pa ci las 'byung //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa ci las 'byung //
translated: from what does nirvāṇa arise?

original: thams cad chad pa'i stong pa ni /
analyzed: thams cad chad pa'i stong pa ni /
translated: The emptiness of the annihilation of all

original: 'bru yi bdag po'i 'dod par 'gro //
analyzed: 'bru yi bdag po'i 'dod par 'gro //
translated: goes along with the desire of the lord of the seed.

original: sangs rgyas la sogs skye 'gro rnams //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la sogs skye 'gro rnams //
translated: The buddhas and so on, all beings,

original: @254b mngon sum du ni yod pa'o //
analyzed: @254b mngon sum du ni yod pa'o //
translated: are present in a direct perception.

original: de'i phyir 'khor ba yod pas na //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'khor ba yod pas na //
translated: Therefore, since saṃsāra exists,

original: mya ngan 'das par de brjod do //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das par de brjod do //
translated: nirvāṇa is said to be that.

original: lus kyi rnam pa las skyes 'gyur //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam pa las skyes 'gyur //
translated: Arising from the aspect of the body,

original: 'khor ba'i dngos gzhan rnams yod min //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i dngos gzhan rnams yod min //
translated: the other entities of saṃsāra do not exist.

original: de yis mya ngan 'das chos kyang //
analyzed: de yis mya ngan 'das chos kyang //
translated: By that, the phenomena of nirvāṇa

original: rnal 'byor chen po sogs bsgom pa //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po sogs bsgom pa //
translated: are the meditation of the great yoga, and so on.

original: de yis sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku //
analyzed: de yis sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku //
translated: By that, the buddha nature is the kāya.

original: byang chub rgyu yis skyes 'gyur te //🔽'jig rten khams gzhan gang nas kyang //
analyzed: byang chub rgyu yis skyes 'gyur te // 'jig rten khams gzhan gang nas kyang //
translated: It arises from the cause of enlightenment.🔽There is nothing else anywhere in the world

original: sangs rgyas thob bya gzhan med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thob bya gzhan med do //
translated: that can bring about buddhahood.

original: sems 'di rang gi sangs rgyas su //
analyzed: sems 'di rang gi sangs rgyas su //
translated: This mind is one’s own buddha,

original: lus kyi khams las thob par bya //
analyzed: lus kyi khams las thob par bya //
translated: to be attained from the body element.

original: lus ni sprul pa'i mtshan nyid kyi //
analyzed: lus ni sprul pa'i mtshan nyid kyi //
translated: The body is the nature of an emanation,

original: thabs tsam la ni brten nas su //
analyzed: thabs tsam la ni brten nas su //
translated: relying merely on the method.

original: skye zhing yang ni 'gag gyur te //
analyzed: skye zhing yang ni 'gag gyur te //
translated: It arises and ceases,

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bzhin //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bzhin //
translated: like dependent origination.

original: thams cad bdag nyid kun 'gro ste //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid kun 'gro ste //
translated: Everything is the nature of the all-pervading self,

original: bdag dang sna tshogs 'byung ba'ang med //
analyzed: bdag dang sna tshogs 'byung ba'ang med //
translated: without a self or diversity arising.🔽The nature of the illusion of the self

original: sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin bdag / sgyu ma nyid kyis sgyu ma byas //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin bdag / sgyu ma nyid kyis sgyu ma byas //
translated: is created by the illusion itself.

original: zhes so // de ltar 'di'i sku bsrub pa dang srubs pa las byung ba dang bskyed pa dang ldan pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes so // de ltar 'di'i sku bsrub pa dang srubs pa las byung ba dang bskyed pa dang ldan pa gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, it is said that his body arises from churning, is born from churning, and is endowed with generation.

original: rnam gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rnam gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The two, etc.,

original: de'i yi ge'i don gyis te rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba ni srog dang thur sel lo //
analyzed: de'i yi ge'i don gyis te rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba ni srog dang thur sel lo //
translated: means the two, life and downward-voiding.

original: rnam pa gnyis po'i 'di'i rab tu sbyor bas gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis po'i 'di'i rab tu sbyor bas gsungs pa /
translated: The application of these two is stated:

original: gzhu'i sbyor bas zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzhu'i sbyor bas zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “By the application of the bow.”

original: gzhu'i sbyor bas ni la la n'a dang ra sa n'a gnyis bskyod par 'gyur bas phyin ci log gi sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: gzhu'i sbyor bas ni la la n'a dang ra sa n'a gnyis bskyod par 'gyur bas phyin ci log gi sbyor ba ste /
translated: By the application of the bow, the lalanā and rasanā are shaken, and so the application is erroneous.

original: srog 'og tu 'gug cing thur sel gyen du drang ba ste /
analyzed: srog 'og tu 'gug cing thur sel gyen du drang ba ste /
translated: The life-force is drawn downward, and the downward-voiding [vāyu] is drawn upward.

original: ji ltar nus pas so //
analyzed: ji ltar nus pas so //
translated: This is done according to one’s ability.

original: de ltar srog ni gzhu'i dbyug pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar srog ni gzhu'i dbyug pa'o //
translated: In that way, the life-force is the bow,

original: thur sel ni rgyud ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: thur sel ni rgyud ces bya ba ste /
translated: and the downward-voiding [vāyu] is the string.

original: de dag gi dbus kyi mda' ni aa wa dh'u t'i mdar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag gi dbus kyi mda' ni aa wa dh'u t'i mdar 'gyur ro //
translated: The arrow in the middle of those is the central nāḍī.

original: 'dis sngags skyes zhes bya ba ni sems ni g-yo ba'i sbyor bas rtsa gsum mnan pas gtum mo rab tu 'bar ba ste /
analyzed: 'dis sngags skyes zhes bya ba ni sems ni g-yo ba'i sbyor bas rtsa gsum mnan pas gtum mo rab tu 'bar ba ste /
translated: “By that, the mantra-born” means that by pressing the three nāḍīs with the application of moving the mind, the caṇḍālī blazes.

original: sngags kyi sgras byang chub kyi sems kyis 'ong ba ste /
